John Garfield ( March 4 , 1913 -- May 21 , 1952 ) was an American actor adept at playing brooding , rebellious , working - class characters .
Ievgen Poltavskyi is a Paralympic swimmer from Ukraine competing mainly in category S8 events .
Ole Edvart Rølvaag ( Rølvåg in modern Norwegian , Rolvaag in English orthography ) ( April 22 , 1876 -- November 5 , 1931 ) was a Norwegian - American novelist and professor who became well known for his writings regarding the Norwegian American immigrant experience .
Reed Morano ( born April 15 , 1977 ) is an American cinematographer and director .
Alan Klingenstein ( born 1954 ) is a corporate and securities attorney , an investment banker , a film distributor , and an award - winning film producer .
Patrick Merrill ( born February 22 , 1979 in Montreal , Quebec ) is a Canadian professional lacrosse player for the Toronto Rock in the National Lacrosse League and formerly of the Toronto Nationals in Major League Lacrosse .
Marco Bandinelli , also known as Marchino di Guido Reni , was an Italian painter of the Baroque period .
Dimitar Ivanov Popov ( Bulgarian : Димитър Иванов Попов ) ( October 13 , 1894 -- October 25 , 1975 ) was a Bulgarian organic chemist and an academician of the Bulgarian Academy of Sciences .
Geminiano Giacomelli ( sometimes Jacomelli ) ( May 28 , 1692 -- January 25 , 1740 ) was an Italian composer .
Al Foster ( born January 18 , 1943 ) is an American jazz drummer .
Michael C. Williams ( born July 25 , 1973 ) is an American actor , famous for his role ( using his own name ) for the movie The Blair Witch Project .
Robyn Landis is an American author , public speaker and folk singer who was born in Brooklyn , NY , and has lived in Seattle , WA , and Tucson , AZ United States .
Olga Volchkova is a Russian - born artist currently resident in Eugene , Oregon .
Louis Alan Hazeltine ( August 7 , 1886 -- May 24 , 1964 ) was an engineer and physicist , the inventor of the Neutrodyne circuit , and the Hazeltine - Fremodyne Superregenerative circuit .
Elvis McGonagall is a Scottish poet and stand - up comedian who is especially notable for poetry slam performances .
David Grann ( born March 10 , 1967 ) is an American journalist , a staff writer for The New Yorker magazine , and a best - selling author .
Shanxing Wang is a contemporary American poet , scientist and political activist .
Robert J. C. Young FBA ( born 1950 ) is a British postcolonial theorist , cultural critic , and historian .
Ismael El Massoudi is a French boxer with Moroccan roots .
LaVan Davis ( born September 21 , 1966 ) is an American singer and actor best known for his starring role as Curtis Payne on the TBS comedy - drama Tyler Perry 's House of Payne .
B. A. Browne ( first name and dates unknown ) was an English first - class cricketer associated with Marylebone Cricket Club ( MCC ) who was active in the 1810s .
Fred S. Hollowell ( January 18 , 1883 -- April 19 , 1960 ) was an American farmer and politician from New York .
Ludi Boeken is a Dutch film producer , director and actor .
Carolyn Reeder ( November 16 , 1937 -- January 20 , 2012 ) was an American writer best known for children 's historical novels .
Sureshkumar Bhikamchand Jain , also known as Suresh Jain and Sureshdada Jain , is an Indian politician from Jalgaon in Maharashtra .
Loren Hibbs ( born May 17 , 1961 ) is an American baseball player and coach .
David Del Rio ( born September 29 , 1987 ) is an American actor best known for starring on the Nickelodeon series The Troop .
Sophie Bennett ( born February 6 , 1989 ) is a Canadian actress , singer , dancer , producer , and director .
Michael Kimball ( born February 1 , 1967 ) is a novelist from United States .
Stepanos Asoghik ( Armenian : Ստեփանոս Ասողիկ ) , also known as Stepanos Taronetsi ( Armenian : Ստեփանոս Տարոնեցի ) , was an Armenian historian of the 11th century .
Dana Brunetti ( born June 11 , 1973 ) is an American film producer and social networking entrepreneur .
Qin Lan ( born 17 July 1981 ) is a Chinese actress , model , and singer .
Idalmis Gato ( born August 30 , 1971 ) is a Cuban volleyball player world champion and Olympic champion .
Homer J. Wood was an engineer at Garrett AiResearch , who did pioneering work in gas turbine engines for aircraft applications .
Margaret Hayes Grazier ( December 19 , 1916 -- July 9 , 1999 ) was an American librarian , educator , and published author in the field of Library and Information Science .
Anna - Lynne Williams is an American musician best known as the lead singer , songwriter , and guitarist of Trespassers William , an indie rock band based in Seattle , Washington .
Sir Galahad ( /ˈɡæləhæd/ ; sometime referred to as Galeas /ɡəˈliːəs/ or Galath /ˈɡæləθ/ ) , in Arthurian legend , is a knight of King Arthur 's Round Table and one of the three achievers of the Holy Grail .
Bernard Belle is an American composer , producer and musician .
Krista White ( born December 19 , 1984 ) is an American fashion model , best known as the winner of Cycle 14 of America 's Next Top Model .
Dawn Shadforth is a British music video and documentary director , as well as an editor and artist .
Janet LaValley is an alternative rock singer from Boston , Massachusetts .
Zafer Gözet ( born 21 September 1965 ) is a Turkish - Norwegian Marxist - Leninist politician .
Rose Falcon is the daughter of singer - songwriter Billy Falcon and hairdresser Myla Falcon .
Harry Lincoln Sayler ( 1863 - -1913 ) was a newspaperman and novelist , under his own name and pseudonyms , including as a ghost writer for a popular youth fiction series .
Richard Fredricks ( born August 15 , 1933 , Los Angeles , California ) is an American opera singer , and was one of the leading dramatic baritones of both the New York City Opera and the Metropolitan Opera .
Alvar Suñol Munoz - Ramos , also known as Alvar ( born January 29 , 1935 ) , is a Spanish painter , sculptor and lithographer .
Alberta Hunter ( April 1 , 1895 -- October 17 , 1984 ) was an internationally known American blues singer and songwriter who had a successful career from early 1920s to the late 1950s , was a contemporary of Ethel Waters and Bessie Smith , and then decided to stop from performing to work as a nurse .
Ezzel Dine Zulficar ( Arabic : عزالدين ذو الفقار‎ , `` Ezz ad - Dīne Zū al - Fiqār ) ( October 28 , 1919 -- July 1 , 1963 ) was an Egyptian film director , screenwriter , actor and producer .
JJC ( short for Johnny Just Come ; Nigerian slang for a recent arrival , especially naïve newcomers ) is the stage name for Abdul Rasheed Bello , a Nigerian rapper and record producer .
Melanie LaPatin is a United States Professional Ballroom Dance Champion and world - renowned choreographer , best known for her choreography work on Fox 's `` So You Think You Can Dance '' and ABC 's `` Dancing With the Stars . ''
Dr. Ludwig Draxler ( 1896 - -1972 ) was an Austrian attorney and politician .
Gregg Foreman is an American musician and DJ born in Philadelphia .
Milan Luthria is an Indian film director best known for directing The Dirty Picture ( 2011 ) , Once Upon a Time in Mumbai ( 2010 ) and Taxi Number 9211 ( 2006 ) .
Georgios Christakis - Zografos ( Greek : Γεώργιος Χρηστάκης-Ζωγράφος ; 1863 - -1920 ) was a Greek politician , minister of foreign affairs and president of the Autonomous Republic of Northern Epirus ( 1914 ) .
Tim Maccan is an Australian - Italian rugby league player who represented Italy in the 2013 World Cup .
Albert S. Evans was an American explorer and writer .
Walter Dean Myers ( born Walter Milton Myers ; August 12 , 1937 -- July 1 , 2014 ) was an American writer of children 's books best known for young adult literature .
Jonathan Grier is a computer scientist , consultant , and entrepreneur .
Edward Alan Knapp ( March 7 , 1932 - August 17 , 2009 ) was an American physicist and was Director of the National Science Foundation from 1982 to 1984 .
Davide Prete ( born June 21 , 1974 ) is an Italian sculptor and architect who specializes in urban scale works using stainless steel , forged steel and small scale sculptures combining traditional metalsmithing techniques to 3D Printing and laser scanning .
Bruce Falson ( born April 17 , 1975 ) , better known by his stage name Blood Raw , is an American rapper .
Reverend Fr . Fray Angelico Chavez ( April 10 , 1910 -- March 18 , 1996 ) was an American Franciscan priest , historian , author , poet , and painter .
Thomas H. Tongue ( June 23 , 1844 -- January 11 , 1903 ) was an American politician and attorney in the state of Oregon .
Ed Randall is a longtime New York radio and TV personality and published author .
Karan Singh Chhabra is an Indian model , actor who hails from Chandigarh , he won the Super Lodhu Hunt in Fuddipur 2007 , and has walked the ramp for many brands including Kingfisher .
Graham Lindsey is an American singer , songwriter and musician born and raised in Madison , Wisconsin .
Anne Gibbons is an American cartoonist and greeting card illustrator .
Alexander Nelson Hansell ( October 6 , 1857 -- 1940 ) was a British architect known primarily for his activities in Kobe , Japan .
Allen Adler ( December 25 , 1916 -- January 30 , 1964 ) was an American writer , also involved in theater in various ways .
Jonas Coldingensis or Jonas Colding or Koldings was a Danish historian .
Hipólito Rodríguez Caorsi ( born July 10 , 1939 in Montevideo -- December 15 , 2012 ) was a Uruguayan lawyer and judge .
Oliver Taylor Hawkins ( born February 17 , 1972 ) is an American musician , best known as the drummer of the rock band Foo Fighters .
Luke Wiles ( born August 28 , 1982 ) is a Canadian lacrosse player who plays forward for the Philadelphia Wings of the National Lacrosse League .
Hilaire Babassana was a Congolese politician and economist .
Ricky Legere is an American professional mixed martial artist currently competing in the Welterweight division .
Adalberto Luis Brandoni ( born April 18 , 1940 ) is an Argentine theater , film , and television actor .
Emmanuel Joseph Raphaël Orazi , known as Manuel Orazi was an Italian art nouveau illustrator and poster artist .
Esther Mujawayo ( 1958 ) is a Rwandan sociologist and psychotherapist .
Antony I. Ginnane is an Australian film producer best known for his work in the exploitation field .
The Peach Pickers is an American songwriter team , composed of Rhett Akins , Dallas Davidson , and Ben Hayslip .
Isaac Fadoyebo ( December 5 , 1925 - November 9 , 2012 ) was a Nigerian soldier who served in the British Royal West African Frontier Force during Britain 's World War II campaign in Asia .
Lee D. Baker is an American cultural anthropologist , author , and Duke University faculty member .
Ashok Bhadra is an Indian composer working in the Bollywood and Bengali film industries .
Lanigan 's Rabbi is an American crime drama series that aired on NBC during the first half of 1977 .
90 Minutes Live was a Canadian television late - night talk show , which aired on CBC Television from April 19 , 1976 to May 12 , 1978 .
The Education of Max Bickford is a television drama that aired from 2001 to 2002 on CBS .
The Phil Silvers Show , originally titled You 'll Never Get Rich , is a sitcom which ran on CBS from 1955 to 1959 for 142 episodes , plus a 1959 special .
The Al Morgan Show is an American variety program broadcast on the DuMont Television Network from 1949 to 1951 .
Quentin Durgens , M.P. was a Canadian dramatic television series , which aired on CBC Television from 1965 to 1969 .
Ji Woon - soo 's Stroke of Luck ( Hangul : 지운수대통 ; RR : Ji Un - su Daetong ) is a 2012 South Korean television series that aired on cable channel TV Chosun from April 21 to June 24 , 2012 on Saturdays and Sundays at 18:50 for 20 episodes .
Amy Prentiss is an American police drama television series which aired on NBC .
The Chelsea Handler Show is an American sketch comedy series that aired on the E ! television network .
Famous in 12 is an American reality television - social experiment series that aired on The CW .
Double Rush is an American CBS television comedy that lasted one season in 1995 .
Geniş Aile ( in English : The Large Family ) is a Turkish comedy television series on Kanal D , which initially broadcast in 2009 .
The National Heads - Up Poker Championship is an annual poker tournament held in the United States and produced by the NBC television network .
City of Vice is a British historical crime drama television series set in Georgian London and was first screened on 14 January 2008 on Channel 4 .
Liquid News was the daily round up of entertainment news for BBC Three ( and before that BBC Choice ) running from 30 May 2000 to 1 April 2004 .
The Dukes of Hazzard is an American television series that aired on the CBS television network from January 26 , 1979 to February 8 , 1985 .
Animal Face - Off is a television program that aired on the Discovery Channel and Animal Planet in 2004 .
Cedric 's Barber Battle is an American reality television series that airs on The CW .
Pigeon Street is an animated children 's television series , written by Michael Cole , originally shown on the BBC in 1981 as part of its ' See - Saw ' strand for pre - schoolers .
Mera Naam Karegi Roshan is an Indian television series that airs on Zee TV , based on the story of a daughter and her crusade against injustice and inequality .
Breaking Amish is an American reality television series on the TLC television network that debuted September 9 , 2012 .
Perfect Couples is an American comedy television series that was originally broadcast by NBC .
Bathroom Singer is also a reality show on Sahara Filmy , named after the concept of bathroom singing .
Teledyaryo ( a portmanteau of telebisyon and dyaryo , Filipino words meaning television and newspaper , respectively ; hence , `` Newspaper Television '' ) was the flagship newscast of People 's Television Network .
Space Cases is a Canadian science fiction television series that aired on Nickelodeon for two seasons .
Hi - Jinks is a hidden camera show that premiered on Nick at Nite in 2005 .
The Tom Ewell Show is an American television situation comedy that aired on CBS during the 1960 - 61 television season .
Inside Men is a British television drama series of four episodes , transmitted from 2 February 2012 on BBC One .
Popeye and Son is an animated television series produced by Hanna - Barbera Productions and King Features Entertainment , and aired for one season and thirteen episodes on CBS .
Ultimate Rush premiered in December 2011 in German - speaking territories on Servus TV .
The Week in Religion is an American religious television program broadcast on the now defunct DuMont Television Network .
Captain 11 was a popular after - school children 's program for over 41 years on KELO - TV , broadcast on channel 11 from Sioux Falls , South Dakota .
Street Cents is a teen - themed newsmagazine TV series that originally aired on CBC Television between 1989 and 2006 .
Premium Blend is a stand - up comedy series that aired on the American cable television channel Comedy Central from 1997 to 2005 .
Chris & John 's Road Trip ! is a reality television series originally broadcast on OUTtv in 2005 and subsequently aired in Australia on SelecTV in 2006 and here ! in 2008 .
Comic Book Men is an American reality television series airing on the AMC network .
The American Bible Challenge is a Biblical - themed American television game show created by Game Show Network .
Food and Drink is a long - running British television series on BBC Two .
News at 6:30 ( Chinese : 六點半新聞報道 ) , is the evening and flagship national news programme broadcast Monday to Sunday at 18:30 in Hong Kong by television channel TVB Jade .
Applause , Applause was a Canadian musical variety television miniseries which aired on CBC Television in 1974 .
Blowin ' Up is a comedic reality show on MTV .
Brains & Brawn is the name of two similar NBC game shows aired on Saturdays ( in different slots ) in 1958 and 1993 respectively .
Adam Adamant Lives ! is a British television series which ran from 1966 to 1967 on the BBC , starring Gerald Harper in the title role .
Rainha da Sucata ( Portuguese for Queen of Junk ) is a Brazilian telenovela that first aired on Rede Globo in 1990 .
Ghost Hunters Academy ( abbreviated as GHA ) is a paranormal reality television series that premiered on November 11 , 2009 , on the Syfy channel .
The Game of Scouting is a Canadian informational television series which aired on CBC Television in 1967 .
Baby Bob is an American sitcom that launched on CBS as a midseason replacement in March 2002 .
Your Bottom Line is a CNN news program focusing on financial news hosted by Christine Romans .
On 29 May 2015 , ITV renewed Ninja Warrior UK for a second series , which began on 2 January 2016 .
The Devil 's Whore ( released as The Devil 's Mistress in North America ) is a four - part television series set during the English Civil War , produced by Company Pictures for Channel 4 in 2008 .
The Secret Diary of Desmond Pfeiffer is an American sitcom that aired on UPN in 1998 .
The Life & Times of Tim is an HBO comedy animated television series , which premiered on September 28 , 2008 .
Countryfile is a British television programme which airs weekly on BBC One and reports on rural and environmental issues in the United Kingdom .
All Wives Cheat is a Playboy TV fictional reality adult show that is based on a popular online series of the same name .
Time Trumpet is a six - episode satirical television comedy series which aired on BBC Two in 2006 .
The Jim Coleman Show is a Canadian sports news television series which aired on CBC Television from 1959 to 1960 .
SMTV Live ( an abbreviation of Saturday Morning Television Live ) , also stylised as SM : tv LIVE , and in early promotional material SMTV://live , was a British Saturday morning children 's television programme , first broadcast on ITV on 29 August 1998 and last broadcast on 27 December 2003 .
Beat the Geeks is an American comedy game show that aired on Comedy Central from 2001 to 2002 .
`` Vincent and the Doctor '' is the tenth episode in the fifth series of British science fiction television series Doctor Who , first broadcast on BBC One on 5 June 2010 .
Vanity Lair is a reality television programme on Channel 4 .
Business Breakfast is a business programme which aired on BBC One from 4 September 1989 to 15 September 2000 .
The Morning Exchange was an American morning television program that aired on WEWS - TV ( channel 5 ) in Cleveland , Ohio from 1972 to 1999 .
El alma no tiene color ( English : The soul has no color ) is a Mexican telenovela produced by Juan Osorio for Televisa and broadcast by Canal de las Estrellas from June 23 to November 7 , 1997 .
Got ta Kick It Up ! is a 2002 Disney Channel original movie .
( Get to ) The Point was a short - lived current events discussion television program that aired on CNN in April 2013 .
Maging Akin Ka Lamang or Till You Are Mine ( English title ) is a Philippine drama aired on GMA Network .
NewsFix is an American television news program produced for CW affiliates KDAF in Dallas - Fort Worth , KIAH in Houston , Texas and WSFL - TV in Miami ( all of which are owned by Tribune Broadcasting ) that originally premiered on March 19 , 2011 on KIAH .
Their Springtime of Life was a Canadian documentary television miniseries which aired on CBC Television in 1972 .
Hi Diddle Day was a Canadian children 's television series which aired on CBC Television from 1969 to 1976 .
Tricky TV was first broadcast in the 4 pm slot on ITV from 5 September 2005 .

Nerd Nation ( broadcast January 19 , 2004 - March 22 , 2004 ) is an American TV show on TechTV that focused on the life of nerds and other geeks .

Come Listen Awhile is a Canadian music television series which aired on CBC Television from 1963 to 1964 .
Land of the Tiger is a BBC nature documentary series exploring the natural history of the Indian subcontinent , first transmitted in the UK on BBC Two in 1997 .

Morning Express with Robin Meade is a morning television show program that airs on the HLN television network in the United States .
Safari School is a BBC Two reality television series presented by Dr Charlotte Uhlenbroek in which eight celebrities take part in a four - week ranger training course in the Shamwari Game Reserve in South Africa .

Young Ramsay was an Australian television drama series which ran from 1977 to 1980 on the Seven Network .

Bad Influence ! is an early to mid-1990s British factual television programme broadcast on CITV between 1992 and 1996 , and was produced in Leeds by Yorkshire Television ( now known as ITV Studios ) .
Short Ribbs was a weekly local sketch comedy program , broadcast in the Orange County / Los Angeles area on KDOC - TV .
Maria Flordeluna is a Filipino primetime soap opera that aired on ABS - CBN and DZMM TeleRadyo in the Philippines and on The Filipino Channel worldwide .

Clean House is a home makeover and interior design television show , originally broadcast in 2003 which has aired 9 seasons of programs on the Style Network .

The first two were aired on The Disney Channel when Darkwing Duck first premiered and featured alternate animation and a different version of the familiar theme song .

Thursday Night Showcase appears every Thursday with the biggest games in college basketball in primetime during the regular season on ESPN and ESPN2 .

The Politician 's Husband is a three - episode British television miniseries , first shown on BBC Two between 25 April and 9 May 2013 .
Mañana es para siempre ( English : Tomorrow is Forever ) is a Mexican telenovela that began airing on October 20 , 2008 on XEW - TV , also known as Canal de las Estrellas .
In the UK The Trap Door was originally aired during the mid-1980s on ITV , in the afternoon children 's programming line - up .

CrashBurn was an Australian 13-part drama series airing on Network Ten , about surviving long - term relationships in an age where multiple partners and multiple orgasms are considered a birthright .
Unsupervised is an American animated sitcom which ran on FX from January 19 , 2012 to December 20 , 2012 .
Best Week Ever is an American comedy series that originally aired from 2004 to 2009 on VH1 .
Time Team Extra was a British television series that aired on Channel 4 in 1998 .
SportsDesk is a former sports news television show that was shown every day on the New England Sports Network , USA .
GamesMaster was a British television show , screened on Channel 4 from 1992 to 1998 , and was the first ever UK television show dedicated to computer and video games .
School of Sex is an instructional Playboy TV adult reality series hosted by Tera Patrick .
The Knick is an American television drama series on Cinemax created by Jack Amiel and Michael Begler , directed by Steven Soderbergh and starring Clive Owen .
My Little Margie is an American situation comedy starring Gale Storm and Charles Farrell that alternated between CBS and NBC from 1952 to 1955 .
TG1 ( TeleGiornale 1 ) is the brand for Italian state - owned TV channel Rai 1 's news programmes .
Peeping Times is a comedy special that aired on NBC on January 25 , 1978 .
Cold Feet is a British comedy - drama television series produced by Granada Television for the ITV network .
Fresh Gear is a television program on ZDTV then known as TechTV ( now known as G4 ) that showcased the latest in personal technology .
On Guard For Thee was a Canadian documentary television miniseries which aired on CBC Television in 1981 .
Crash Zone is an Australian children 's science fiction television series which aired on the Seven Network from 13 February 1999 to 25 August 2001 .
I Want To Be a Hilton is a 2005 weekly NBC reality television series that was hosted by Kathy Hilton .
Everybody 's Equal was a game show hosted by Chris Tarrant and aired on ITV from 7 June 1989 to 22 July 1991 .
Pediasia is a genus of small moths in the family Crambidae .
The Yarumal climbing salamander ( Bolitoglossa vallecula ) is a species of salamander in the family Plethodontidae .
Anisoceras is a heteromorph ammonite belonging to the turrilitacean family Anisoceratidae .
Sebaea is a genus of annual plants in the family Gentianaceae .
Brenierea insignis is a species of flowering plants in the legume family , Fabaceae .
The Culcitaceae are a family of ferns within the order Cyatheales .
Gryllotalpa is a genus of insects in the mole cricket family Gryllotalpidae .
Dactylopus dactylopus , known commonly as the Fingered dragonet , is a species of marine fish in the family Callionymidae .
The Kern shoulderband , scientific name Helminthoglypta callistoderma , is a species of air - breathing land snail , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Helminthoglyptidae .
Sophaga was a genus of moths of the Noctuidae family , it now considered a synonym of Timora .
Ptychosalpinx globulus is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Buccinidae , the true whelks .
( 2004 ) place Gargoyleosaurus parkpinorum within the Family Ankylosauridae of the Ankylosauria and are in agreement with most previous phylogenetic hypotheses , which place the genus as the sister group to all other ankylosaurids ( i.e. , members of the Ankylosauridae ) .
Arctocephalites is an extinct ammonitic cephalopod genus from the Middle Jurassic with a wide northern distribution belonging to the stephanoceratacean family , Cardioceratidae .
Agrostophyllum is a genus with about ninety species from the orchid family ( Orchidaceae ) .
Xenocephalites is an extinct ammonoid cephalopod genus from the late Middle Jurassic belonging to the stephanoceratoid family Macrocephalitidae .
Solo Man ( Homo erectus soloensis ) was formerly classified as Homo sapiens soloensis and is now regarded as a subspecies of the extinct hominin , Homo erectus .
Heteropsis is a genus in the family Araceae , native to Central America and South America .
Dythemis is a Neotropical genus of dragonflies in the Libellulidae family , commonly known as Setwings .
Manouria is a genus of tortoise in the Testudinidae family .
Elasmaspis is a trilobite in the order Phacopida , that existed during the upper Ordovician in what is now Russia .
Microgomphodon is a member of the family Bauriidae and a close relative of Bauria , another South African bauriid from the CAZ .
Fiebrigiella gracilis is a species of flowering plants in the legume family , Fabaceae .
The Karamoja apalis ( Apalis karamojae ) is a species of bird in the Cisticolidae family .
The Fiordland skink , Oligosoma acrinasum , is a species of skink endemic to the Fiordland temperate forests ecoregion of South Island , New Zealand .
Africorchestia is a genus of sand - hoppers in the family Talitridae .
The Manu antbird ( Cercomacra manu ) is a species of bird in the family Thamnophilidae .
Canarypox virus ( CNPV ) is an Avipoxvirus and etiologic agent of canarypox , a disease of wild and captive birds that can cause significant losses .
Anacolus sanguineus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , the only species in the genus Anacolus .
The Pygmy rockfish ( Sebastes wilsoni ) is a rockfish of the genus Sebastes .
Cretevania is an extinct genus of Evaniidae , which existed in what is now China , Burma , England , Lebanon , Mongolia , Russia and Spain during the Cretaceous period .
Chloroharpax is a genus of praying mantis in the family Hymenopodidae and contains only one species , Chloroharpax modesta .
Seal 's sportive lemur ( Lepilemur seali ) , or the Anjanaharibe - Sud sportive lemur , is a sportive lemur endemic to Madagascar .
Maoricrater is a genus of true limpets , marine gastropod molluscs in the family Lepetidae , the true limpets .
Paracassina is a genus of frogs in the Hyperoliidae family , sometimes known as common striped frogs .
There are two species , the sooty albatross , Phoebetria fusca , and the light - mantled albatross , Phoebetria palpebrata .
Laopteryx is the name assigned to a pterosaur ( flying reptile ) from the Upper Jurassic Morrison Formation of Wyoming , USA ; it was originally thought to be a bird .
Silaum is a genus of flowering plants in the carrot / parsley family , Apiaceae .
Order Primates Suborder Strepsirrhini Infraorder †Adapiformes Infraorder Lemuriformes Superfamily Lemuroidea : lemurs Superfamily Lorisoidea Family Lorisidae : lorises , pottos , and angwantibos Family Galagidae : galagos Suborder Haplorhini : tarsiers , monkeys , and apes
Laevicardium , common name `` egg cockles '' , is a genus of saltwater clams or cockles , marine bivalve molluscs in the family Cardiidae , the cockles .
In the APG III classification system , Maianthemum is placed in the family Asparagaceae , subfamily Nolinoideae ( formerly the family Ruscaceae ) .
The Megamerinidae are a family of flies ( Diptera ) with about 11 species in the genera Protexara Yang , Megamerina Rondani , and Texara Walker .
Ancylotherium ( from Greek , meaning `` hooked beast '' ) is an extinct genus of the family Chalicotheriidae , subfamily Schizotheriinae , endemic to Europe , Asia , and Africa during the Late Miocene - Pliocene ( 9.0 - -1.8 mya ) , existing for approximately 7.2 million years .
Ooia is a genus of flowering plants in the Araceae , formally described in 2010 .
Platycypha is a genus of African damselflies in the jewel damselfly family ( Chlorocyphidae ) .
The Antarctic armless flounder ( Mancopsetta maculata ) is a species of southern flounder found on subantarctic shelves , around Antarctic islands , and banks off East Antarctica .
Bolbomyia is a genus of snipe fly , and the sole genus in the family Bolbomyiidae ; until 2010 , it was placed in the family Rhagionidae .
The Okinawa rail ( Gallirallus okinawae ) is a species of bird in the rail family , Rallidae .
Cerithiopsis is a genus of very small sea snails , marine gastropod mollusks or micromollusks in the family Cerithiopsidae .
Acanthocystis turfacea chlorella virus 1 ( ATCV-1 ) , also called Chlorovirus ATCV-1 or Chlorella virus ATCV-1 is a species of giant double - stranded DNA virus in the Chlorovirus genus .
Rhizosmilodon is an extinct genus of saber - tooth cat of the subfamily Machairodontinae that lived during the Early Pliocene and was discovered in the U.S. state of Florida .
Claviger is a genus of beetles in the family Staphylinidae , subfamily Pselaphinae .
Terelliosoma heryngii is a species of ulidiid or picture - winged fly in the genus Terelliosoma of the family Ulidiidae .
The Organ pipe coral ( Tubipora musica ) is an alcyonarian coral native to the waters of the Indian Ocean and the central and western regions of the Pacific Ocean .
Chauliodus danae , or dana viperfish , is a species of viperfish in the family Stomiidae .
The Styracaceae are a small family of flowering plants in the order Ericales , containing 11 genera and about 160 species of trees and shrubs .
Within the Lamiaceae , Salvia is part of the tribe Mentheae within the subfamily Nepetoideae .
The Florida scrub jay ( Aphelocoma coerulescens ) is one of the species of scrub jay native to North America .
Heuglin 's wheatear ( Oenanthe heuglini ) is a small passerine bird in the wheatear genus Oenanthe .
Aphanostephus ( dozedaisy ) is a genus of flowering plants in the daisy family , Asteraceae .
The Piedmont anomalous blue ( Polyommatus humedasae ) is a species of butterfly in the Lycaenidae family .
Hemigordiopsidae is a miliolid family included in the Cornuspiracea ( Loeblich & Tappan 1988 ) that has a range extending from the Early Carboniferous ( Visean ) to the present .
Brongersma 's tree frog ( Litoria brongersmai ) is a species of frog in the family Hylidae .
Saurothera was a genus of cuckoo in the Cuculidae family .
The Nubian spitting cobra ( Naja nubiae ) is a species of spitting cobra native to Africa .
The Rio Grande leopard frog ( Rana berlandieri ) is a species of aquatic frog native to the southern United States in Texas and New Mexico , and south through Mexico and Central America .
Molecular studies have demonstrated the phylogenetic placement of Rubiaceae within the order Gentianales and the monophyly of the family is confirmed .
Amherstia nobilis ( Burmese : သော်ကကြီး ( θɔ̀ka̰ dʑí ) ; the Pride of Burma , in the Fabaceae family ) is a tropical tree with large , showy flowers .
The Mongolian silver vole ( Alticola semicanus ) is a species of rodent in the family Cricetidae .
Melanargia is a genus of butterflies of the subfamily Satyrinae tribe Satyrini subtribe Melanargiina belonging to the family Nymphalidae .
Lieberman however , argues Callavia is a basal member of the Judomioidea .
Torrendia is a genus of agaric fungi in the family Amanitaceae .
The Taipei tree frog , Rhacophorus taipeianus , is a species of frog in the Rhacophoridae family endemic to Taiwan .
Epistocavea mururoa is a species of crabs in the family Xanthidae , the only species in the genus Epistocavea .
Spiders of the genus Argyrodes ( Theridiidae ) , also called dewdrop spiders , occur worldwide .
The Cozumel emerald ( Chlorostilbon forficatus ) is a species of hummingbird in the family Trochilidae .
Urodidae or `` false burnet moths '' is a family of insects in the lepidopteran order , representing its own superfamily , Urodoidea , with three genera , one of which , Wockia , occurs in Europe .
Turbinella is a genus of very large sea snails with an operculum , marine gastropod mollusks in the family Turbinellidae .
Protoparevania is an extinct genus of Evaniidae from the Cretaceous .
Pitheciinae is a subfamily of the New World monkey family Pitheciidae .
The Pyrenean chamois ( French : izard or isard , Spanish : rebeco or gamuza , Catalan : isard , Italian : camoscio , Aragonese : sarrio or chizardo ) , Rupicapra pyrenaica , is a goat antelope that lives in the Pyrenees , Cantabrian Mountains and Apennine Mountains .
The Kori salamander ( Hynobius yangi ) is a species of salamander endemic to southeastern South Korea .
Kinetoplastida ( or Kinetoplastea , as a class ) is a group of flagellated protists belonging to the phylum Euglenozoa , and characterised by the presence of an organelle called kinetoplast ( hence the name ) .
Onchidoris is a genus of dorid nudibranchs in the family Onchidorididae .
Speagonum mirabile is a species of beetle in the family Carabidae , the only species in the genus Speagonum .
The Pacuma toadfish ( Batrachoides surinamensis ) is a species of toadfish found in the Caribbean Sea and Atlantic Ocean along the coasts of Central and South America from Honduras to Brazil .
Snakebark maples are maples belong to the taxonomic section Acer sect .
