Ricinocarpos is a plant genus of the family Euphorbiaceae first described as a genus in 1817 .
Tarsiger is a genus of six species of birds in the family Muscicapidae .
The Transvaal flat gecko ( Afroedura transvaalica ) is a species of gecko endemic to Southern Africa .
The Kolar leaf - nosed bat ( Hipposideros hypophyllus ) is a species of bat in the family Hipposideridae .
Bacteridiella is a genus of small sea snails , marine gastropod mollusks in the family Pyramidellidae , the pyrams and their allies .
Anemonia is a genus of sea anemones belonging to the family Actiniidae
Geranopterus is an extinct genus of Eocoraciidae that lived during the late Eocene to early Miocene in Europe .
The Cameroon sunbird ( Cyanomitra oritis ) is a species of bird in the Nectariniidae family .
The Williamson 's marsupial frog ( Gastrotheca williamsoni ) is a species of frog in the Hemiphractidae family .
The Dubois 's seedeater ( Sporophila ardesiaca ) is a species of bird in the family Thraupidae .
Mallaspis scutellaris is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , the only species in the genus Mallaspis .
The Conasauga logperch ( Percina jenkinsi ) is a species of fish in the Percidae family .
The Philippine sailfin lizard , crested lizard , sail - fin lizard , sailfin water lizard , or soa - soa water lizard ( Hydrosaurus pustulatus ) is an oviparous lizard living only in the Philippines .
The Proterocameroceratidae were the first of the Endocerida .
The Nyanza barb ( Barbus nyanzae ) is a ray - finned fish species in the family Cyprinidae .
Malpighiaceae Malpighiaceae - description , taxonomy , phylogeny , and nomenclature Psychopterys Anderson , W. R. , and S. Corso .
The Colubrinae are a subfamily of the Colubridae family of snakes .
Darwin 's frog ( Rhinoderma darwinii ) , also called the southern Darwin 's frog is a rhinodermatid frog native to the forest streams of Chile and Argentina .
The Congrinae are a subfamily of eels in the Congridae family .
Tympanobasis ( Ancient Greek : Τύμπανο + βάσις ) is a genus of moths of the Noctuidae family .
The Altamaha lance , scientific name Elliptio shepardiana , is a species of freshwater mussel , an aquatic bivalve mollusk in the family Unionidae , the river mussels , naiads or unionids .
The Venezuelan suntiger ( Psalmopoeus irminia ) is a striking tarantula species from Venezuela and hence considered a New World species .
The Uncompahgre fritillary ( Boloria acrocnema ) is a species of butterfly in the Nymphalidae family .
Forrest 's mountain vole ( Neodon forresti ) is a species of rodent in the family Cricetidae found within China in northwest Yunnan .
Algansea is a genus of ray - finned fish in the family Cyprinidae , distributed in inland waters of Mexico .
Xenorhabdus is a genus of motile , gram - negative bacteria from the family of the Enterobacteriaceae .
Phymateus is a genus of grasshoppers belonging to the Pyrgomorphidae family .
Tasmaphena is a genus of medium - sized , predatory , air - breathing land snails , carnivorous terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusks in the family Rhytididae .
Venerupis is a genus of marine bivalve molluscs in the family Veneridae , commonly known as carpet shells .
White spot syndrome virus is the lone virus ( and type species ) of the genus Whispovirus ( white spot ) , which is the only genus in the family Nimaviridae .
Metadentobunus formosae is a species of harvestmen in a monotypic genus in the family Sclerosomatidae .
Ctenolophus is a spider genus in the family Idiopidae found in South Africa .
Evgeny Kurochkin argued in 1996 that Alexornis formed a natural group , the Alexornithidae , with Kizylkumavis and a second type of central Asian bird , Sazavis .
The Madagascan sandgrouse ( Pterocles personatus ) is a species of bird in the Pteroclididae family .
Mesocolpodes coptoderoides is a species of beetle in the family Carabidae , the only species in the genus Mesocolpodes .
Pseudochrodes suturalis is a species of beetle in the family Silvanidae , the only species in the genus Pseudochrodes .
Triboniophorus is a genus of air - breathing land slugs , terrestrial pulmonate gastropod molluscs in the family Athoracophoridae , the leaf - veined slugs .
Parin 's spinyfin , Diretmichthys parini , is a spinyfin of the monotypic genus Diretmichthys .
Verbesina , or crownbeard , is a genus of flowering plants , in the daisy family ( Asteraceae ) .
The Egyptian slit - faced bat ( Nycteris thebaica ) is a species of slit - faced bat broadly distributed throughout Africa and the Middle East .
The Leucospidae ( sometimes incorrectly spelled Leucospididae ) are a small , specialized group within the Chalcidoidea , composed exclusively of ectoparasitoids of aculeate wasps or bees .
Russell assigned Archaeornithomimus to the Ornithomimidae .
Crassicantharus is a genus of sea snails , marine gastropod mollusks in the family Buccinidae , the true whelks
Tabanus is a genus of biting horseflies of the family Tabanidae .
Baillonella toxisperma ( also called African pearwood , djave nut , or moabi ) is a species of tree in the family Sapotaceae , and the only species in the genus Baillonella .
The Chiapan deer mouse ( Peromyscus zarhynchus ) is a species of rodent in the family Cricetidae .
Pseudolabis is an extinct genus of terrestrial herbivore the family Camelidae , endemic to North America from the Oligocene through Miocene 24.8 - -20.6 mya , existing for approximately 4.2 million years .
Cephalodiscida is one of two orders in the class Pterobranchia , which are small , worm - shaped animals .
Polycentrus is a genus of fish belonging to the Polycentridae family .
Neurotrichini is a tribe within the subfamily Talpinae of the mole family .
The Macquarie parakeet ( Cyanoramphus erythrotis ) , also known as the Macquarie Island parakeet , is an extinct parrot from subantarctic Macquarie Island , an outlying part of Tasmania , Australia , in the Southern Ocean .
Metatrophis is a genus of plant in the nettle family , Urticaceae .
Amphimenes is a genus of beetles in the family Carabidae , the ground beetles .
Plagiocheilus is a genus of flowering plant in the Asteraceae family .
The Eudaminae are a subfamily of skipper butterflies ( family Hesperiidae ) .
Thaumatichthys is a genus of deep - sea anglerfish in the family Thaumatichthyidae , with three known species .
Also , several species are currently placed in several other genera of Carangidae that were originally described under Seriola .
The Prince Regent gudgeon ( Hypseleotris regalis ) is a species of sleeper goby endemic to Australia , where it is only known to occur in clear , rocky pools in the Prince Regent Reserve in Western Australia .
Catjang ( Vigna unguiculata subsp . cylindrica ) is a subspecies of cowpea .
Novisuccinea is a genus of air - breathing land snails , terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusks in the family Succineidae , the ambersnails .
Syllepte hemichionalis is a moth species in the genus Leucinodes of the family of Crambidae .
The Quechuan mouse opossum ( Marmosa quichua ) is a South American opossum species of the family Didelphidae .
The Himalayan white - browed rosefinch ( Carpodacus thura ) is a true finch species ( family Fringillidae ) .
Luschan 's salamander or the Lycian salamander ( Lyciasalamandra luschani ) is a species of salamander in the Salamandridae family found in Greece and Turkey .
In 1955 , Parioxys was placed as the sole member of the newly erected family Parioxyidae .
Megalania ( Megalania prisca or Varanus priscus ) is an extinct giant goanna or monitor lizard .
Adam 's horseshoe bat ( Rhinolophus adami ) is a species of bat in the family Rhinolophidae .
The Calopterygidae are a family of damselflies , the suborder Zygoptera .
The Mistratoan yellow - shouldered bat ( Sturnira mistratensis ) , is a species of leaf - nosed bat indigenous to the western Andes , in the Mistrato municipality in Risaralda , Colombia .
Silverstone 's salamander ( Bolitoglossa silverstonei ) is a species of salamander in the family Plethodontidae .
Platychasmatinae is a small East Asian subfamily of the moth family Notodontidae .
( 2014 ) recovered Aurornis outside Avialae ; it was recovered as a troodontid closely related to Anchiornis , Xiaotingia and Eosinopteryx .
The Kei flying fox ( Pteropus keyensis ) is a species of megabat in the Pteropus genus found in the Kai Islands of Indonesia .
Plicatura is a fungal genus in the order Agaricales .
Necydalinae is a small subfamily of the longhorn beetle family ( Cerambycidae ) , historically treated as a tribe within the subfamily Lepturinae , but recently recognized as a separate subfamily .
The Lily Shoals elimia , scientific name Elimia annettae , is a species of freshwater snails with an operculum , aquatic gastropod mollusks in the family Pleuroceridae .
The Upemba mud turtle ( Pelusios upembae ) is a species of turtle in the Pelomedusidae family .
Mordella is the type genus of the tumbling flower beetle family ( Mordellidae ) , its subfamily Mordellinae and the tribe Mordellini .
Sphenocoelus is an extinct genus of brontothere of the subfamily Dolichorhininae , family Brontotheriidae , endemic to North America during the Middle Eocene epoch ( 46.2 - -42 mya ) , existing for approximately 4.2 million years .
Adyte assimilis is a marine polychaete scale worm in the family Polynoidae .
Cyrtodactylus is a diverse genus of Asian geckos , commonly known as bent - toed geckos or bow - fingered geckos .
Comesperma is a genus of shrubs , herbs and lianas in the family Polygalaceae .
Agrimonia ( from the Greek ἀργεμώνη ) , commonly known as agrimony , is a genus of 12 - -15 species of perennial herbaceous flowering plants in the family Rosaceae , native to the temperate regions of the Northern Hemisphere , with one species also in Africa .
Amaryllideae are a tribe of subfamily Amaryllidoideae ( family Amaryllidaceae ) .
Amphibulimidae is a taxonomic family of land snails , semi - slugs , terrestrial pulmonate gastropod molluscs in the superfamily Orthalicoidea .
Speotrechus mayeti is a species of beetle in the family Carabidae , the only species in the genus Speotrechus .
Dendromurinae is a subfamily of rodents in the family Nesomyidae and superfamily Muroidea .
The Asiatic long - tailed climbing mouse ( Vandeleuria oleracea ) is a species of rodent found in South and South - east Asia .
The Shoshone sculpin ( Cottus greenei ) is a species of fish in the Cottidae family .
Carr and Hlavin ( 2010 ) resurrect Dunkleosteidae and place Dunkleosteus , Eastmanosteus , and a few other genera from Dinichthyidae within it .
Oscadytes rovirai is a species of beetle in the family Carabidae , the only species in the genus Oscadytes .
The Madagascan cuckoo ( Cuculus rochii ) , also known as the Madagascar lesser cuckoo , is a species of cuckoo in the Cuculidae family .
Mountelgonia is a genus of moths belonging to the family Cossidae , Metarbelidae .
The Australian garden orb weaver spider ( Eriophora transmarina ) is a very common species of spider with many variants in size , shape , and colour across the coastal regions of the eastern states of Australia .
The Réunion swamphen , Réunion gallinule or oiseau bleu ( Porphyrio coerulescens ) is a hypothetical species of extinct rail from Réunion , Mascarenes only known from reports of travellers .
The Para dog - faced bat ( Cynomops paranus ) , is a South American bat species of the family Molossidae .
The Saunders 's tern ( Sternula saundersi ) is a species of tern in the family Sternidae .
Chlorolestes is a genus of damselflies in the family Synlestidae .
Spartiniphaga was a genus of moths of the Noctuidae family , it is now considered to be a synonym of Photedes .
The Arabian red fox ( Vulpes vulpes arabica ) is a subspecies of the red fox native to Arabia , specifically Dhofar and Al Hajar Mountains in Oman and they are also found in UAE Syria , Jordan and Israel to Saudi Arabia and Yemen .
Godinotia is an extinct genus of strepsirrhine primate belonging to the Adapidae family .
The Cambodian laughingthrush ( Garrulax ferrarius ) is a species of bird in the Leiothrichidae family .
The Pallas 's sandgrouse ( Syrrhaptes paradoxus ) is a medium large bird in the sandgrouse family named after the German zoologist Peter Simon Pallas .
The Jico deer mouse ( Habromys simulatus ) is a species of rodent in the family Cricetidae found only in Mexico .
The Tanganyika clown ( Eretmodus cyanostictus ) is a species of fish in the Cichlidae family .
Cabot 's tern ( Thalasseus acuflavidus ) is a bird in the family Sternidae recently separated from the Sandwich tern ( Thalasseus sandvicensis ) .
Dittoceras is a genus of plant in family Apocynaceae first described as a genus in 1883 .
Xyleborini are a tribe of ambrosia beetles ( alternatively called subtribe Xyleborina of tribe Scolytini ) , highly specialized weevils of the subfamily Scolytinae .
Serinethinae is a subfamily of the hemipteran family Rhopalidae , sometimes known as soapberry bugs .
Miller 's saki ( Pithecia milleri ) , also known as Miller 's monk saki , is a species of saki monkey , a type of New World monkey .
Tolypocladium ophioglossoides , also known by two of its better known synonyms Elaphocordyceps ophioglossoides and Cordyceps ophioglossoides and commonly known as the goldenthread cordyceps , is a species of fungus in the family Ophiocordycipitaceae .
Pappea capensis is a South African tree in the family Sapindaceae .
Platyoides is a genus of spiders belonging to the family Trochanteriidae .
Prochilodus is a genus of freshwater fish from the family Prochilodontidae .
In 2010 a new proposed classification system for the Bivalvia was published by Bieler , Carter & Coan revising the classification of the Bivalvia , including the subclass Pteriomorphia .
Amakusaplana is a genus of free - living marine turbellarian flatworms in the family Prosthiostomidae .
Hamaticolax is a genus of parasitic copepods belonging to the family Bomolochidae .
Together the two genera make up the family Campynemataceae sensu Angiosperm Phylogeny Group ( APG ) , within the Liliales order .
The Spanish dancer , scientific name Hexabranchus sanguineus ( literally meaning `` blood - colored six - gills '' ) , is a dorid nudibranch , a very large and colorful sea slug , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Hexabranchidae .
The Orthosiini are a mid - sized tribe of noctuid moths in the subfamily Hadeninae .
Alvarado 's salamander or Moravia de Chirripo salamander ( Bolitoglossa alvaradoi ) is a species of salamander in the family Plethodontidae .
Hannaphota distincta is a species of beetle in the family Carabidae , the only species in the genus Hannaphota .
The Nimba otter shrew ( Micropotamogale lamottei ) is a dwarf otter shrew and belongs to the mammal family Tenrecidae .
Apteralcidion lapierrei is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , the only species in the genus Apteralcidion .
Gavialidium is a genus of insects found in Malaysia , belonging to the Tetrigidae family of Orthopterans .
The Hawaiian hopseed looper moth ( Scotorythra paratactis ) is a species of moth in the Geometridae family .
Spatalla is a genus containing 20 species of flowering plants , commonly known as `` spoons '' , in the Proteaceae family .
The Meek 's lorikeet ( Charmosyna meeki ) is a species of parrot in the Psittaculidae family .
The Shelley 's sunbird ( Cinnyris shelleyi ) is a species of bird in the Nectariniidae family .
The Norway bullhead ( Micrenophrys lilljeborgii ) is a coastal fish of the family Cottidae , found in Northern Europe .
Nava 's wren ( Hylorchilus navai ) Sumichrast 's wren ( Hylorchilus sumichrasti )
Rhinecanthus is a triggerfish genus from the Indo - Pacific .
Aciphylla is a genus of about 40 species of plants in the Apiaceae family , endemic to New Zealand and Australia .
The Leuciscinae , commonly known as true minnows , are a large subfamily of the freshwater fish family Cyprinidae .
Xyletininae is a subfamily of Beetles in the family Anobiidae .
The Allen 's gallinule ( Porphyrio alleni ) , formerly known as the lesser gallinule is a small waterbird of the family Rallidae .
The Kafue mole - rat ( Fukomys kafuensis ) is a species of rodent in the family Bathyergidae .
Tarunius punctatus is a species of beetle in the family Monotomidae , the only species in the genus Tarunius .
Poliodes is a genus of moths in the Sphingidae family , containing one species , Poliodes roseicornis , which is known from dry bush in Ethiopia , Somalia and Kenya .
The Eastern smooth frog or Victorian smooth froglet ( Geocrinia victoriana ) is a species of frog in the Myobatrachidae family .
Dicranophora is a genus of two mold species in the family Mucoraceae .
Musseromys is a genus of rodent in the family Muridae .
Codoceras is a nautiloid genus belonging to the Polyelasmoceratidae , an Oncocerida family .
The Chinese white - toothed shrew ( Crocidura rapax ) is a species of mammal in the family Soricidae .
The Stresemann 's bushcrow ( Zavattariornis stresemanni ) , also known as Abyssinian pie , bush crow , Ethiopian bushcrow , or by its generic name Zavattariornis , is a rather starling - like bird , which is currently thought to be member of the crow family , Corvidae , though this is uncertain .
Tyndarimorpha areolata is a species of beetle in the family Buprestidae , the only species in the genus Tyndarimorpha .
The Endothyracea is a superfamily in the foraminiferal order , Fusulinida ( or as often , suborder Fusulinina ) known from the upper Devonian to the Lower Permian .
The Malayan forest gecko , Cyrtodactylus pulchellus , is a species of gecko found in Southeast Asia .
The Sphenacodontoidea evolved from earlier Sphenacodontia such as Haptodus via a number of transitional stages of small , unspecialised pelycosaurs .
Plagiostyles is a plant genus in the family Euphorbiaceae first described as a genus in 1897 .
Paralpenus is a genus of moth in the family Arctiidae from the Afrotropics .
Cedrus ( common name Cedar ) is a genus of coniferous trees in the plant family Pinaceae .
Geograpsus is a genus of crabs in the family Grapsidae , containing five species :
The Breyer 's long - tailed seps ( Tetradactylus breyeri ) is a species of lizard in the Cordylidae family .
Vulcaniella is a genus of moth in the family Cosmopterigidae , containing the following species :
It belongs to the subfamily Faboideae , and was recently assigned to the informal monophyletic Pterocarpus clade within the Dalbergieae .
The Ryukyu wood pigeon ( Columba jouyi ) , otherwise known as the silver - banded or silver - crescented pigeon is an extinct species of bird in the Columba genus in the family Columbidae .
The Korean crevice salamander ( Karsenia koreana ) is a lungless salamander .
Opisthorchiida is an order of flatworms in the subclass Digenea .
Chaetocarpus is a plant genus of the family Euphorbiaceae first described as a genus in 1854 .
The Venus flytrap ( also referred to as Venus 's flytrap or Venus ' flytrap ) , Dionaea muscipula , is a carnivorous plant native to subtropical wetlands on the East Coast of the United States in North Carolina and South Carolina .
Phoca is a genus of the earless seals , within the family Phocidae .
Microbarypus silvicola is a species of beetle in the family Carabidae , the only species in the genus Microbarypus .
The Admiralty Island cuscus or Manus Island spotted cuscus ( Spilocuscus kraemeri ) is a species of marsupial in the family Phalangeridae .
Licaria is a flowering plant genus in the family Lauraceae , endemic of Central America and South America .
Eufalloides holmesi is a species of beetle in the family Latridiidae , the only species in the genus Eufalloides .
The La Selle red - legged frog or Furcy robber frog ( Eleutherodactylus furcyensis ) is a species of frog in the Eleutherodactylidae family .
Francoa is a genus of the Melianthaceae family which consists of herbs endemic to Chile .
Prophenorites marojejyanus is a species of beetle in the family Carabidae , the only species in the genus Prophenorites .
Zoysieae is a tribe of grasses in subfamily Chloridoideae , with around 250 species in four genera .
Neomphaloidea is a superfamily of deep - sea snails or limpets , marine gastropod mollusks previously regarded as in the clade Vetigastropoda ( according to the taxonomy of the Gastropoda by Bouchet & Rocroi , 2005 ) , but now classified in its own clade the Neomphalina .
Johnson grass or Johnsongrass , Sorghum halepense , is a plant in the grass family , Poaceae , native to the Mediterranean region , but grows throughout Europe and the Middle East .
The Junin crake or Junin rail ( Laterallus tuerosi ) is a species of bird in the family Rallidae .
Parabembras is a genus of sprat - like flatheads , the only genus in the family Parabembridae .
The Mozambique tilapia ( Oreochromis mossambicus ) is a tilapiine cichlid fish native to southern Africa .
Pasawioops is an extinct genus of dissorophoid euskelian temnospondyl within the family Amphibamidae .
Macutula is a spider genus of the Salticidae family ( jumping spiders ) from Brazil .
The Bulwer 's petrel ( Bulweria bulwerii ) is a small petrel in the family Procellariidae , and is one of two species in the genus Bulweria ( Bonaparte , 1843 ) .
Nodipecten is a genus of large scallops , marine bivalve molluscs in the family Pectinidae , the scallops .
Baird 's sparrow ( Ammodramus bairdii ) is a species of North American birds in the family Emberizidae of order Passeriformes .
Rockinghamia is a plant genus of the spurge family ( Euphorbiaceae ) , first described as a genus in 1966 .
Sage 's rock rat ( Aconaemys sagei ) is a species of rodent in the family Octodontidae .
Most of the species now recognized as being members of Kriegeriales were for a long time placed as incertae sedis ( meaning that the exact placement is unknown ) in class Microbotryomycetes .
Butherium erythropus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , the only species in the genus Butherium .
The Naticinae are a subfamily of medium to large - sized predatory sea snails , marine gastropod molluscs in the family Naticidae , the moon snails .
Dysderoidea are members of the Haplogynae clade : spiders with simpler copulatory organs ( palpal bulbs and epigynes ) than other araneomorphs .
The Madura horseshoe bat ( Rhinolophus madurensis ) is a species of bat from the family Rhinolophidae .
Coelotrochus is a genus of small sea snails , marine gastropod mollusks in the family Trochidae , the top snails .
The Kashmir stag ( Cervus elaphus hanglu ) , also called hangul , is a subspecies of red deer native to India .
Antipathidae is a family of the order Antipatharia containing the following genera :
Holosteum is a genus of plants in the Pink family ( Caryophyllaceae ) with 3 or 4 species native from southern Europe through central and south western Asia and in Africa .
The Nyiro shrew ( Crocidura macowi ) is a species of mammal in the family Soricidae .
Austromuellera is a genus of only two known species of medium - sized trees , constituting part of the plant family Proteaceae .
Plinia is a genus of flowering plants in the myrtle family , Myrtaceae described by Linnaeus in 1753 .
The Rusty - bellied brush - furred rat ( Lophuromys sikapusi ) is a species of rodent in the family Muridae .
Nerillida is an order of annelid worms in the class Polychaeta .
Bracken ( Pteridium ) is a genus of large , coarse ferns in the family Dennstaedtiaceae .
The Darjeeling woodpecker ( Dendrocopos darjellensis ) is a species of bird in the Picidae family .
The Cinderella fat - tailed mouse opossum ( Thylamys cinderella ) is a species of opossum in the family Didelphidae .
The Echinostomida are an order of flatworms , belonging to the large group Digenea .
Liphyrinae is a butterfly subfamily within the family Lycaenidae , whose members are also known as gossamer - winged butterflies .
Nuculanoida is an order of very small saltwater clams , marine bivalve mollusks in the subclass Protobranchia .
Carangoides is a genus of tropical to subtropical marine fishes in the jack family , Carangidae .
Antelientomon is a genus of hexapods in the order Protura , and the only genus in the family Antelientomidae .
Frankites is an extinct genus of cephalopod from the Triassic period included in the Trachyceratidae , a family of mostly evolute ammonites , coiled so as all whorls are showing , and commonly ornamented with flexious , tuberculate ribs .
Liorhyssus is a genus of scentless plant bugs belonging to the family Rhopalidae , subfamily Rhopalinae .
Aseroe is a small genus of basidiomycete fungi of the family Phallaceae , though sometimes placed in the separate family Clathraceae .
The Wallacean cuckooshrike ( Coracina personata ) is a species of bird in the Campephagidae family .
Nephrophyllidium is a monotypic genus of aquatic flowering plants in the family Menyanthaceae .
Proserpinellidae is a taxonomic family of land snails with an operculum , terrestrial gastropod mollusks in the superfamily Helicinoidea ( according to the taxonomy of the Gastropoda by Bouchet & Rocroi , 2005 ) .
Sinozolus yuae is a species of beetle in the family Carabidae , the only species in the genus Sinozolus .
Before the reclassification of aedine genera , Skusea pembaensis was known as Aedes pembaensis .
Neptune plant or Air fern is a name given to a product that is composed of a species of marine animal called Sertularia argentea , also known as the `` sea fir '' .
Amphicyclotulus is a genus of tropical land snails with gills and an operculum , terrestrial gastropod mollusks in the family Neocyclotidae ( according to the taxonomy of the Gastropoda by Bouchet & Rocroi , 2005 ) .
Sphaerium is a genus of very small freshwater clams , aquatic bivalve mollusks in the family Sphaeriidae , known as the fingernail clams .
Clidemia is a genus of flowering plants in the glory bush family , Melastomataceae .
Cicatrizocera bilistrata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , the only species in the genus Cicatrizocera .
Cucumber ( Cucumis sativus ) is a widely cultivated plant in the gourd family , Cucurbitaceae .
The Mitchell gudgeon ( Kimberleyeleotris hutchinsi ) is a species of sleeper goby endemic to the Kimberley region of Australia , where it is only known from the Mitchell River system .
Müller 's Bornean gibbon ( Hylobates muelleri ) , also known as the grey gibbon , is a primate in the gibbon family , Hylobatidae .
Halichondria is a genus of marine demosponges belonging to the family Halichondriidae .
Exocentroides is a genus of beetles in the family Cerambycidae , containing the following species : subgenus Exocentroides Exocentroides flavovarius Breuning , 1957 Exocentroides multispinicollis Breuning , 1957 Exocentroides unispinicollis Breuning , 1957 subgenus Trichexocentroides Exocentroides flavipennis Breuning , 1957
Nannophryne is a small genus of true toads , family Bufonidae , from South America .
The Tallapoosa pebblesnail , scientific name Somatogyrus pilsbryanus , is a species of very small freshwater snail with an operculum , an aquatic gastropod mollusk in the family Hydrobiidae .
The tooth - billed pigeons are the only genus ( Didunculus ) of the subfamily Didunculinae , in the pigeon and dove family , ( Columbidae ) .
Tivela stultorum , also known as the Pismo clam , is a species of large , edible , saltwater clam , a marine bivalve mollusk in the family Veneridae , the Venus clams .
Hamulinidae is an extinct ammonoid cephalopod family belonging to the order Ammonitida .
The Arkansas darter ( Etheostoma cragini ) is a species of small ray - finned fish in the perch family , Percidae .
Abbasites was included in the Otoitidae , the ancestral family of the Stephanocerataceae , according to Westermann ( 1965 ) and Imlay ( 1984 ) but was previously placed in the Hildoceratacean family Hammatoceratidae by Arkell et al .
The Saddle - backed Mauritius giant tortoise ( Cylindraspis inepta ) is an extinct species of tortoises in the Testudinidae family .
In the Cronquist system ( of 1981 ) it is used for an order ( in subclass Commelinidae ) and circumscribed as : order Restionales family Flagellariaceae family Joinvilleaceae family Restionaceae family Centrolepidaceae The APG II system ( 2003 ) assigns the plants involved to the order Poales .
Holocryphia is a monotypic genus of fungi within the family Cryphonectriaceae containing the sole species Holocryphia eucalypti .
Grand Comoro day gecko ( Phelsuma v - nigra comoraegrandensis Meier , 1986 ) is a small diurnal subspecies of geckos .
Ditrysinia is a plant genus of the family Euphorbiaceae first described as a genus in 1825 .
Pharoideae is a subfamily of the true grass family Poaceae , containing the single tribe Phareae with the two genera Leptaspis and Pharus .
Opodiphthera is a genus of moths from the Saturniidae family that are endemic to Australia .
Lepidagathis is a genus of plants in the family Acanthaceae .
Tigasis is a Neotropical genus of Grass Skippers in the family Hesperiidae .
The Pacific lamprey ( Entosphenus tridentatus or Lampetra tridentata ) is an anadromous parasitic lamprey from the Pacific Coast of North America , and Asia .
Picturesque dragonet , Synchiropus picturatus , is a brightly colored member of the dragonet family native to the Indo - West Pacific :
`` Waxwing '' and `` Bohemian waxwing '' were first recorded in 1817 , the former as a reference to Vieillot 's separation of this bird from the `` chatterers '' .
The Ruwenzori batis ( Batis diops ) is a species of bird in the Platysteiridae family .
Ancylini is a tribe of small , freshwater , air - breathing limpets , aquatic pulmonate gastropod mollusks in the family Planorbidae , the ram 's horn snails and their allies .
The New Zealand falcon or kārearea ( Falco novaeseelandiae ) is New Zealand 's only endemic falcon and the only remaining bird of prey endemic to New Zealand .
The Himalayan whiskered bat ( Myotis siligorensis ) is a species of vesper bat .
Kaprosuchus is a member of the family Mahajangasuchidae along with closely related Mahajangasuchus insignis from the Upper Cretaceous of Madagascar .
Betula uber ( Virginia Round - leaf Birch ) is a rare species of tree in the birch family .
FishBase places Gobiesocidae as the only family in the order Gobiesociformes , under the superorder Paracanthopterygii ; whereas more official classifications within the United States , for example ITIS , place them in the suborder Gobiesocoidei of the order Perciformes , under superorder Acanthopterygii .
Gjellerupia is a genus of plants in the family Opiliaceae described as a genus in 1912 .
The Solenogastres ( less often referred to as Neomeniomorpha ) , common name the solenogasters , are one subclass of small , worm - like , shell - less molluscs ( Aplacophora ) , the other subclass being the Caudofoveata ( Chaetodermomorpha ) .
Cheirurus is the type genus of Cheiruridae .
The Biak gerygone ( Gerygone magnirostris hypoxantha ) is a subspecies of the large - billed gerygone , but it is sometimes considered a distinct species .
Nemobiinae is a subfamily of Gryllidae , the true crickets .
Banksia obovata , commonly known as Wedge - leaved Dryandra , is a shrub endemic to Western Australia .
The Hastings River mouse ( Pseudomys oralis ) is a species of rodent in the family Muridae .
The Florida lance , scientific name Elliptio waltoni , is a species of freshwater mussel , an aquatic bivalve mollusk in the family Unionidae , the river mussels .
The Santa Marta parakeet ( Pyrrhura viridicata ) is a species of parrot in the Psittacidae family .
The Fusulinacea is a superfamily in the Fusulinida in which the test is spherical , discoida , or fusiform ; commonly coiled , less often uncoliing in the late stage , numerous chambers per whorl ; test wall of microgranular calcite ( as for the order ) in one to four layers .
The Lesser Antillean macaw or Guadeloupe macaw ( Ara guadeloupensis ) is a hypothetical extinct species of macaw that is thought to have been endemic to the Lesser Antillean island region of Guadeloupe .
The Réunion bulbul ( Hypsipetes borbonicus ) , also known as olivaceous bulbul , is a passerine endemic to Réunion .
Laniatores is the largest suborder of the arachnid order Opiliones with over 4,000 described species worldwide .
Bugtirhinus was a genus of rhinoceros of the tribe Elasmotheriini endemic to Asia during the Miocene living from 20 - -16.9 mya existing for approximately 3.1 million years .
The San Joaquin pocket mouse or Salinas pocket mouse ( Perognathus inornatus ) is a species of rodent in the family Heteromyidae .
The Pahranagat pebblesnail also known as the Pahranagat Valley turban snail , scientific name Fluminicola merriami , is a species of very small or minute freshwater snail with an operculum , an aquatic gastropod mollusk in the family Lithoglyphidae .
The Florida red - bellied cooter or Florida redbelly turtle ( Pseudemys nelsoni ) is a species of the genus Pseudemys .
The Walindi fairy - wrasse , Cirrhilabrus walindi , is a species of wrasse native to the coral reefs of the Pacific Ocean .
Raoiella is a genus of mite belonging to the family Tenuipalpidae .
The Sulawesi yellow bat ( Scotophilus celebensis ) is a species of vesper bat .
Bocoa is a genus of flowering plants in the legume family , Fabaceae ( Leguminosae ) .
Neocyema erythrosoma is a species of pelagic fish , a deep - water bobtail snipe eel in the family Cyematidae .
The Salim Ali 's swift ( Apus salimalii ) , is a small bird , superficially similar to a house martin .
Alloblennius is a genus of combtooth blennies ( family Blenniidae ) found in the western and northeastern Indian Ocean .
Cran 's bully ( Gobiomorphus breviceps ) is a species of sleeper goby endemic to New Zealand , where it is only found in fresh waters .
Richeriella is a plant genus of the Phyllanthaceae family .
Molecular research comparing DNA sequences now place Lichenomphalia close to the redefined genus Arrhenia , which together with several other genera not traditionally considered to be related , fall within the newly redefined Hygrophoraceae .
Cabares is a Neotropical genus of in the family Hesperiidae ( Eudaminae ) .
The Rocky Mountain locust ( Melanoplus spretus ) is an extinct species of locust that ranged through the western half of the United States and some western portions of Canada until the end of the 19th century .
The African clawless otter ( Aonyx capensis ) , also known as the Cape clawless otter or groot otter , is the second - largest freshwater species of otter .
Perucharidius andinus is a species of beetle in the family Carabidae , the only species in the genus Perucharidius .
The Arthoniales is an order of the class Arthoniomycetes within the phylum Ascomycota .
The Golfodulcean poison frog ( Phyllobates vittatus ) is a species of frog in the Dendrobatidae family endemic to Costa Rica .
Loxops is a Hawaiian honeycreeper genus in the finch family , Fringillidae .
The Hornyhead turbot , Pleuronichthys verticalis , is a flatfish of the family Pleuronectidae .
It is the sole genus in the family Griseliniaceae ; in the past it was often placed in Cornaceae but differs from that in many features .
Anomalomyrmini is a tribe of Leptanillinae ants with three extant genera .
Myrospermum frutescens , the cercipo , is a species of flowering plant in the legume family , Fabaceae .
Kauria is a rare genus of moth in the family Geometridae , found most commonly in the Appalachian Mountains .
Marsupial moles are a family ( Notoryctidae ) of cladotherian mammals of the order Notoryctemorphia .
The Eurasian water shrew ( Neomys fodiens ) , known in the United Kingdom as the water shrew , is a relatively large shrew , up to 10 cm ( 4 in ) long , with a tail up to three - quarters as long again .
Ceratodalia is a genus of moth in the family Geometridae , containing only one species , Ceratodalia gueneata , which is found in western North America , ranging from British Columbia and Alberta to Colorado and California .
Saduria is a genus of benthic isopod crustaceans in the family Chaetiliidae , containing the following species :
Microcycas is a genus of cycads in the family Zamiaceae containing only one species , Microcycas calocoma , endemic to a small area in western Cuba in Pinar del Río Province .
Bennelongia is a genus of ostracod crustacean in the family Cyprididae .
Serpula ( also known as calcareous tubeworm , serpulid tubeworm , fanworm , or plume worm ) is a genus of sessile , marine annelid tube worms that belongs to the Serpulidae family .
Anemone deltoidea is a species of flowering plant in the buttercup family known by the common names Columbian windflower and western white anemone .
Lycopus ( waterhorehound , gypsywort , or bugleweed ) is a genus in the family Lamiaceae .
The African jewelfish ( Hemichromis bimaculatus ) , also known as jewel cichlid or jewelfish , is from the family cichlidae .
Gobius ater , Bellotti 's goby , is a species of goby native to the Mediterranean Sea from the Balearic Islands and the Gulf of Lion to Nice and Sardinia .
The Colombian electric ray ( Diplobatis colombiensis ) is a species of fish in the Narcinidae family endemic to Colombia .
Massetognathinae is an extinct subfamily of cynodonts in the family Traversodontidae .
Although they have often been treated as a separate family , the Aphidiidae , the Aphidiinae are a lineage within the Braconidae .
Frost 's arboreal alligator lizard ( Abronia frosti ) is a species of lizard endemic to Central America .
The Mona coqui , ( coqui de la Mona or coqui de Mona ) , Eleutherodactylus monensis , is a species of frog in the Eleutherodactylidae family endemic to Mona , Puerto Rico .
Midwife toads ( Alytes ) are a genus of frogs in the Alytidae family ( formerly Discoglossidae ) , and are found in most of Europe and northwestern Africa .
Kufengoceratina is one of four subfamilies in the Marathonitidae families .
Lytoceratidae is a taxonomic family of ammonoid cephalopods belonging to the suborder Lytoceratina , characterized by very evolute shells that generally enlarge rapidly , having whorls in contact but mostly overlapping very sightly , or not at all .
Icticephalus and other former scaloposaurids are now classified as basal members of Baurioidea .
Senghasiella is a genus of flowering plants in the orchid family , Orchidaceae .
Bassleroceras is the type genus of the Bassleroceratidae which Furnish and Glenister ( 1964 ) included in the Ellesmerocerida , but which Flower ( 1967 ) placed in the Tarphycerida .
Iberotrechus bolivari is a species of beetle in the family Carabidae , the only species in the genus Iberotrechus .
Velindastus discrepans is a species of beetle in the family Carabidae , the only species in the genus Velindastus .
Antipionycha puncticollis is a species of beetle in the family Carabidae , the only species in the genus Antipionycha .
The Heuglin 's francolin ( Pternistis icterorhynchus ) is a species of bird in the Phasianidae family .
Dicranopteris ( forkedfern ) is a genus of tropical ferns of the family Gleicheniaceae .
Heroini is a fish tribe from the Cichlasomatinae subfamily in the cichlid family .
The Chilean woodstar ( Eulidia yarrellii ) is a small bird in the hummingbird family , Trochilidae .
Mursiopsis is an extinct genus of box crabs belonging to the family Calappidae .
The Cape clawless otter ( Aonyx capensis capensis ) , sub - species of ( A. capensis ) or generally referred to as African clawless otter is found in Sub - Saharan Africa near permanent bodies of freshwater or can be seen to occupy along the sea coast ( 2 ) .
The Nusatenggara short - nosed fruit bat ( Cynopterus nusatenggara ) is a species of megabat within the family Pteropodidae found in Indonesia .
The Ansell 's epauletted fruit bat ( Epomophorus anselli ) is a species of megabat in the family Pteropodidae .
Eucomis is a genus of flowering plants in the family Asparagaceae , subfamily Scilloideae , native to southern Africa .
The Cape silvertip nudibranch , Janolus capensis , is a beautiful species of nudibranch , or sea slug .
Pleuraspidotherium is an extinct genus of condylarth of the family Pleuraspidotheriidae , that lived during the Paleocene epoch in the modern Europe .
The Buru cuckooshrike ( Coracina fortis ) is a species of bird in the Campephagidae family .
Amphiprion clarkii , known commonly as Clark 's anemonefish and yellowtail clownfish , is a marine fish belonging to the family Pomacentridae , the clownfishes and damselfishes .
Hairy - footed gerbil ( Gerbillurus paeba ) Namib brush - tailed gerbil ( Gerbillurus setzeri ) Dune hairy - footed gerbil ( Gerbillurus tytonis ) Bushy - tailed hairy - footed gerbil ( Gerbillurus vallinus )
Molecular research , based on cladistic analysis of DNA sequences , places Rhizoctonia within the family Ceratobasidiaceae .
Cidaroida is an order of primitive sea urchins , the only living order of the subclass Perischoechinoidea .
The Japanese white - eye ( Zosterops japonicus ) , also known as the mejiro ( メジロ , 目白 ) , is a small passerine bird in the white - eye family .
Many botanists do not recognize this family and place Hoplestigma in Boraginaceae sensu lato or in Cordiaceae .
The Atiu swiftlet ( Aerodramus sawtelli ) is a species of bird in the swift family , endemic to Atiu in the Cook Islands .
Vertigo gouldii , common name the variable vertigo , is a species of minute air - breathing land snail , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Vertiginidae , the whorl snails .
Orientia is a genus of bacteria in family Rickettsiaceae .
Andaman Islands day gecko ( Phelsuma andamanense ) is a species of geckos .
Meliosma is a genus of flowering plants in the family Sabiaceae , native to tropical to warm temperate regions of southern and eastern Asia and the Americas .
Xantus 's hummingbird , Basilinna xantusii ( syn . Hylocharis xantusii ) , is a medium - sized hummingbird endemic to Baja California .
The Heliconiinae , commonly called heliconians or longwings , are a subfamily of the brush - footed butterflies ( family Nymphalidae ) .
Sweet corn ( Zea mays convar . saccharata var . rugosa ; also called sugar corn , dent corn and pole corn ) is a variety of maize with a high sugar content .
Kikihia is a genus of cicada in the family Cicadidae , endemic to New Zealand , with a single Australian species ( K. convicta ) .
Procariama is an extinct Monotypic genus of giant flightless predatory birds , reaching 1 m ( 3.3 ft ) tall , in the family Phorusrhacidae or `` terror birds '' which lived in Argentina .
Mantidae is the largest family of the order Mantodea , commonly known as praying mantises ; most are tropical or subtropical .
Marasmianympha is a genus of moths of the grass moth family ( Crambidae ) .
Madecacesta gaudroni is a species of beetle in the family Buprestidae , the only species in the genus Madecacesta .
Bembidion is the largest genus of beetles in the family Carabidae by number of species .
Cansjera is a genus of plants in the family Opiliaceae described as a genus with this name in 1789 .
Xeniaria is a genus of earwigs , in the family Arixeniidae , the suborder Arixeniina , and the order Dermaptera .
Dicranostigma , also known as the eastern horned poppies , is a genus in the poppy family Papaveraceae , the species of which are native to the Himalaya and western China .
Shennongtherium is an extinct genus of rhinoceros from the Miocene time period .
The Chilean mockingbird ( Mimus thenca ) locally known as tenca is a species of bird in the Mimidae family .
Capripoxvirus is a genus of viruses in the subfamily Chordopoxvirinae and the family Poxviridae .
Japeuthria is a monospecific genus of sea snails , marine gastropod mollusks in the family Buccinidae , the true whelks .
The Savannah sparrow ( Passerculus sandwichensis ) is a small American sparrow .
Hemimacronyx is a proposed genus of birds in the pipit and wagtail family Motacillidae .
Curtoceras is a genus in the tarphycerid family Trocholitidae found widespread in the late Early and Middle Ordovician of North America and northern Europe .
The Tenerife speckled lizard , Gallotia intermedia , ( Spanish : Lagarto Canario Moteado ) is a recently discovered lacertid ( wall lizard ) of Tenerife in the Canary Islands .
The Peruvian tern ( Sternula lorata ) is a species of tern in the family Sternidae .
The Colombian spider monkey ( Ateles fusciceps rufiventris ) , is a subspecies of the Black - headed spider monkey , a type of New World monkey , found in Colombia and Panama .
The Mexican amberwing ( Perithemis intensa ) is a dragonfly of the family Libellulidae , native to the southwestern United States and Mexico .
Sarcophaga is a genus of true flies , the type of the flesh - fly family ( Sarcophagidae ) .
Coninae , or as it is more recently ( February 2015 ) represented as a family , Conidae , common names the cone snails , cone shells or cones , is a taxonomic group of small to large predatory sea snails with cone - shaped shells , marine gastropod mollusks in the superfamily Conoidea .
Burton 's vlei rat ( Otomys burtoni ) is a species of rodent in the family Muridae .
Black - backed swamphen ( Porphyrio indicus ) is a species of swamphen occurring from southeast Asia to Sulawesi and Borneo .
Pleurodiscus is the only genus in the family Pleurodiscidae .
The Upper Zambezi labeo ( Labeo lunatus ) is a species of cyprinid fish native to southern Africa .
The Ichthyosauriformes are a group of marine reptiles , belonging to the Ichthyosauromorpha , that lived during the Mesozoic .
Mauremys is a genus of turtles in the family Geoemydidae ( formerly called Bataguridae ) .
Barathrodemus is a genus of cusk - eels found in deep waters .
The North African elephant shrew or North African sengi ( Elephantulus rozeti ) is a species of elephant shrew in the family Macroscelididae .
Smallhead stickleback ( Gasterosteus microcephalus ) is a fish species , which widespread in the basin of the Pacific Ocean :
The Ugandan musk shrew ( Crocidura mutesae ) is a species of mammal in the family Soricidae .
Cyttus is the sole genus in the family Cyttidae a family of large , showy , deep - bodied zeiform marine fish .
Cairina is a genus of ducks in the bird family Anatidae .
Trichoferus campestris is a genus of beetle in the family Cerambycidae .
Schivereckia is a genus of the botanical family Brassicaceae .
The Mandalay spitting cobra ( Naja mandalayensis ) , also called the Burmese spitting cobra or Mandalay cobra , is a species of spitting cobra endemic to the dry zone in central Myanmar .
The Fea 's petrel ( Pterodroma feae ) , is a small seabird in the gadfly petrel genus , Pterodroma .
In taxonomy , Coelastrella is a genus of green algae , specifically of the Scenedesmaceae .
Ammodaucus leucotrichus is a species of flowering plant in the Apiaceae family and the sole member of the genus Ammodaucus .
Callerebia is a genus of the Nymphalidae family endemic to the Himalayas .
Camelids are members of the biological family Camelidae , the only currently living family in the suborder Tylopoda .
Bellium is a genus of flowering plants in the daisy family , Asteraceae , native to the Mediterranean region .
Thamalakane barb ( Barbus thamalakanensis ) is a species of ray - finned fish in the genus Barbus .
Alwynulus is a genus of trilobite in the order Phacopida , which existed in what is now Scotland .
In 2010 , Bieler , Carter & Coan proposed a new classification system for the Bivalvia which combines the taxodont Arcoida with the dysodont Limnoida Mytiloida , Ostreoida and Pteroida as the Pteriomorphia .
Acontiinae is a subfamily of moth family Noctuidae .
Symplocaceae is a family of flowering plants in the order Ericales , including two genera , Symplocos and Cordyloblaste , totalling about 320 species native to Asia , Australia and the Americas .
Zappey 's flycatcher ( Cyanoptila cumatilis ) is a songbird in the Old World flycatcher family Muscicapidae .
Ringicula is a genus of minute deepwater sea snails , marine gastropod mollusks or micromollusks belonging to the family Ringiculidae .
Eudendrium is a large genus of hydroids ( Hydrozoa ) , one of two in the family Eudendriidae .
Oribatida ( formerly Cryptostigmata ) , also known as moss mites or beetle mites , are an order of mites , in the `` chewing Acariformes '' clade Sarcoptiformes .
Fregolia listropteroides is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , the only species in the genus Fregolia .
The Yucatan yellow bat , Rhogeessa aeneus , is a species of bat found in the Yucatán Peninsula in Mexico , and possibly also in Belize and Guatemala .
Pottiales is an order of mosses in the subclass Dicranidae .
Of these , the first two appear to have sister clade status , allowing resolution into two classes , Enoplea and Chromadorea , and division of the former into two subclasses corresponding to Clades I and II respectively , the Enoplia and Dorylaimia .
Furacopyge is a trilobite in the order Phacopida ( family Dalmanitidae ) , that existed during the lower Devonian in what is now Spain .
Grimsbyoceras is a nautiloid genus included in the Oncocerida order of the family Acleistoceratidae that lived during the Middle Devonian .
The White - banded wolf snake ( Lycodon septentrionalis ) , also known as the Northern large - toothed snake , is a species of colubrid snake found in Asia .
The Chinese crested tern ( Thalasseus bernsteini ) is a seabird of the tern family , Sternidae , closely related to the Sandwich tern , T. sandvicensis , and the lesser crested tern , T. bengalensis .
Leptolambda is an extinct genus of pantodonts in the family Barylambdidae from North America .
The Waccamaw silverside ( Menidia extensa ) is a rare species of fish in the family Atherinopsidae .
Couepia is a genus of flowering plants in the family Chrysobalanaceae described as a genus in 1775 .
Monostilifera is a suborder of nemertean worms belonging to the class Enopla , a class of worms characterized by the presence of a peculiar armature of spines or plates in their proboscis .
Qiniella is a genus of non - biting midges in the diptera subfamily Orthocladiinae of the family Chironomidae .
Chromalveolata is a eukaryote supergroup present in a major classification of 2005 , then regarded as one of the six major groups within the eukaryotes .
The Tasmanian numbfish ( Narcine tasmaniensis ) is a species of electric ray in the family Narcinidae .
Oenoptera is a genus of moths of the Noctuidae family , found in Sri Lanka ( Hampson ) and French Guiana ( Schaus ) .
Dyakiidae is a family of air - breathing land snails terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusks in the superfamily Dyakioidea ( according to the taxonomy of the Gastropoda by Bouchet & Rocroi , 2005 ) .
Phycella is a genus of herbaceous , perennial bulbous flowering plants belonging to the family Amaryllidaceae , subfamily Amaryllidoideae .
Scotoplanes , commonly known as the sea pig , is a genus of deep - sea holothurian echinoderm of the family Elpidiidae , order Elasipodida .
Leptophobia is a Neotropical ecozone genus of butterflies in the family Pieridae .
Amylocorticium is a genus of resupinate ( crust - like ) fungi in the Amylocorticiaceae family .
Euryomyrtus is a genus of shrubs , in the family Myrtaceae , all of which are endemic to Australia .
Kapcypridopsis is a genus of ostracod crustacean in the family Cyprididae , subfamily Cypridopsinae .
Spathiphyllum is a genus of about 40 species of monocotyledonous flowering plants in the family Araceae , native to tropical regions of the Americas and southeastern Asia .
Wright 's skink ( Trachylepis wrightii ) is a species of skink in the Scincidae family .
The Philippine pygmy squirrel ( Exilisciurus concinnus ) is a species of rodent in the family Sciuridae .
Galtoceras is genus of the Oncocerida and of the oncocerid family Acleistoceratidae .
Disperis is a genus of plants in the orchid family , Orchidaceae .
Dartfishes are a subfamily , Ptereleotrinae , of goby - like fishes in the family Microdesmidae of the order Perciformes .
Tectariaceae is a family of Leptosporangiate ferns in the order Polypodiales .
Sequoioideae ( redwoods ) is a subfamily in the family Cupressaceae , with three genera .
Gnathopalystes is a genus of huntsman spiders in the family Sparassidae .
Inkayacu is a genus of extinct penguin .
Psychrolutes is a genus of fish of the family Psychrolutidae ( fathead sculpins ) .
The Spanish sparrow or willow sparrow ( Passer hispaniolensis ) is a passerine bird of the sparrow family Passeridae .
Omophagus artus is a species of beetle in the family Carabidae , the only species in the genus Omophagus .
The Dime forest tree frog , Leptopelis vannutellii , is a species of frog in the Arthroleptidae family endemic to Ethiopia .
The Chinese white - browed rosefinch ( Carpodacus dubius ) is a true finch species ( family Fringillidae ) .
Lafonius is an extinct genus dvinosaurian temnospondyl within the family Trimerorhachidae .
The American red fox ( Vulpes vulpes fulvus ) , commonly known as the eastern American red fox is a North American subspecies of the red fox ( Vulpes vulpes ) .
Amanita muscaria var . persicina , commonly known as the peach - colored fly agaric , is a basidiomycete fungus of the genus Amanita .
The Chinese trumpetfish , Aulostomus chinensis , is a demersal marine fish belonging to the family Aulostomidae .
Cabrera 's vole ( Microtus cabrerae ) is a species of rodent in the family Cricetidae .
The Nubian woodpecker ( Campethera nubica ) is a species of bird in the Picidae family .
The Old World silversides are a family , Atherinidae , of fish in the order Atheriniformes .
The Clapperton 's francolin ( Pternistis clappertoni ) is a species of bird in the Phasianidae family .
The Ewaso Nyiro labeo ( Labeo percivali ) is an African species of freshwater fish in the Cyprinidae family .
Ash 's lark ( Mirafra ashi ) is a species of lark in the Alaudidae family .
The New Britain thicketbird or Bismarck thicketbird ( Megalurulus grosvenori ) is a bird species .
If taxonomic ranks are used , it may therefore be best to treat the latter as a division and divide the Apocrita into some 6 infraorders representing lineages of about equal standing , one of which would unite the Aculeata and the Ichneumonoidea .
Phaenaulax nanus is a species of beetle in the family Carabidae , the only species in the genus Phaenaulax .
The Philippine trogon ( Harpactes ardens ) is a species of bird in the Trogonidae family .
Michelinoceras named by Foeste in 1932 is the ancestral and characteristic genus of the Michelinoceratidae , established and described by Flower in 1946 ; derived from empty siphuncle Baltoceratidae .
Kallstroemia is a genus of flowering plants in the caltrop family , Zygophyllaceae .
The Jacobin cuckoo , pied cuckoo , or pied crested cuckoo ( Clamator jacobinus ) is a member of the cuckoo order of birds that is found in Africa and Asia .
The Cape porcupine or South African porcupine , ( Hystrix africaeaustralis ) , is a species of Old World porcupine native to central and southern Africa .
Errazurizia ( dunebroom ) is a genus of flowering plants in the legume family , Fabaceae .
Dicropsocus is a genus in the Epipsocidae family , with three described species , all endemic to New Guinea and the neighbouring islands .
Most recent authors of taxonomic treatises have maintained the family Limnanthaceae but placed it in the order Geraniales , including Thorne ( 1976 ) Cronquist ( 1988 ) , who nevertheless states that Limnanthaceae are , `` without ... obvious affinities ... '' and Takhtajan ( 1980 ) .
Bothrocerambyx nevermanni is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , the only species in the genus Bothrocerambyx .
Jell & Adrain ( 2003 ) went so far as to lump Phillipsiidae into the family Proetidae , however other workers since like Lerosey - Aubril and Feist ( 2005 ) have continued to recognize Phillipsiidae as a distinct and separate family within Proetida .
The Uganda nothobranch ( Nothobranchius ugandensis ) is a species of fish in the Aplocheilidae family .
Hindsia is a genus of about 11 species of shrubs in the family Rubiaceae , native to tropical South America , mainly in Brazil .
Siphoviridae is a family of double - stranded DNA viruses in the order Caudovirales .
The Middle East blind mole - rat or Palestine mole - rat ( Spalax ehrenbergi ) ( also known as Nannospalax ehrenbergi ) is a species of rodent in the family Spalacidae .
Onobops is a genus of very small aquatic snails , operculate gastropod mollusks in the family Cochliopidae or in the Hydrobiidae .
Ctenomys flamarioni , Flamarion 's tuco - tuco or tuco - tuco of the dunes , is a South American rodent species of the family Ctenomyidae .
The Ash Meadows pebblesnail ( Pyrgulopsis erythropoma ) is a species of freshwater snail with a gill and an operculum , aquatic gastropod mollusk in the family Hydrobiidae .
Zaphir 's shrew ( Crocidura zaphiri ) is a species of mammal in the family Soricidae .
Micronecta is a genus of aquatic insects in the Corixidae family .
For this reason , reconstructions usually depict Prenocephale as sharing the basic body plan common to all of the other Pachycephalosauria : a stout body with a short , thick neck , short forelimbs and tall hind legs .
Entomopoxvirinae is a subfamily of viruses , in the family Poxviridae .
The El Pepino tree frog , Hyloscirtus torrenticola , is a species of frog in the Hylidae family found in Colombia and Ecuador .
Samsonia is a genus of Gram - negative bacteria in the family Enterobacteriaceae .
Enneapterygius pallidoserialis , known commonly as the Pale white - spotted triplefin is a species of triplefin blenny in the genus Enneapterygius .
Kostermanthus is a genus of plant in the family Chrysobalanaceae described as a genus in 1979 .
The Lichtenstein 's sandgrouse ( Pterocles lichtensteinii ) is a species of bird in the Pteroclididae family , which is named after Martin Lichtenstein .
Oxygonum is a genus of plants in the family Polygonaceae with about 30 species .
Prosopidicola is a monotypic genus of fungi within the family Cryphonectriaceae containing the sole species Prosopidicola mexicana .
Centropyge colini , the Cocos - Keeling angelfish , or Colin 's angelfish is a small marine angelfish measuring up to 9 cm , it is predominantly yellow with the upper quarter of its body being bright blue in colour .
The West African lungfish ( Protopterus annectens ) , also known as the Tana lungfish , is a species of African lungfish .
Icius is a genus of jumping spiders described by Simon in 1876 , belonging to the Order Araneae , Family Salticidae .
The Nile Delta toad or Damietta toad ( Amietophrynus kassasii ) is a species of toad in the family Bufonidae .
The Kittlitz 's murrelet , ( Brachyramphus brevirostris ) is a small alcid found in the waters off Alaska and Eastern Siberia .
Even after splitting the very wide Rana into smaller taxons , frogs now in Quasipaa continued to belong to the true frog family ( Ranidae ) , at times as subfamily Dicroglossinae , until Dicroglossinae was raised to the family level ( i.e. , Dicroglossidae ) .
Haematostemon is a genus of plant of the family Euphorbiaceae first described as a genus in 1919 .
Patersonia is a genus of flowering plants in the Iridaceae commonly known as native iris or native flag .
Ostraciidae is a family of squared , bony fish belonging to the order Tetraodontiformes , closely related to the pufferfishes and filefishes .
The St Kilda field mouse ( Apodemus sylvaticus hirtensis ) is a subspecies of wood mouse that is endemic to the Scottish archipelago of St Kilda , which is 40 miles west of Benbecula in the Outer Hebrides , and 100 miles ( 160 km ) from mainland Scotland .
The Yinnietharra rock dragon ( Ctenophorus yinnietharra ) is a species of lizard in the Agamidae family .
Guichenia is a trilobite in the order Phacopida ( family Dalmanitidae ) , that existed during the middle Ordovician in what is now France .
The Kanawha darter ( Etheostoma kanawhae ) is a species of darter endemic to the southeastern United States .
The Maya Mountains frog ( Rana juliani ) is a species of frog in the Ranidae family found in Belize and possibly Guatemala .
The Halmahera flowerpecker ( Dicaeum schistaceiceps ) is a species of bird in the Dicaeidae family .
The Banks flying fox ( Pteropus fundatus ) is a species of megabat in the family Pteropodidae .
Adenolisianthus is a plant genus in the Gentian family ( Gentianaceae ) , tribe Helieae .
Gilliesieae is a tribe of herbaceous geophyte plants belonging to the subfamily Allioideae of the Amaryllis family ( Amaryllidaceae ) .
Notodontinae is the nominate subfamily of the moth family Notodontidae .
The Mexican gray squirrel ( or red - bellied squirrel ) ( Sciurus aureogaster ) is a tree squirrel in the genus Sciurus endemic to Guatemala and in eastern and southern Mexico , and is an introduced species in the Florida Keys , Cuba , Jamaica and Hispaniola .
The Pacific swift ( Apus pacificus ) is a bird which breeds in eastern Asia .
Ixalotriton is a genus of salamander in the family Plethodontidae .
Buhler 's coryphomys ( Coryphomys buehleri ) is an extinct species of giant rat .
Mastacembelus is a genus of many species of spiny eel fish from the family Mastacembelidae .
The Japanese short - tailed bat ( Eptesicus ( Eptesicus ) japonensis ) is a species of bat belonging to the family Vespertilionidae .
Carinotetraodon is a genus of small freshwater pufferfish found in South and Southeast Asia .
Stempfferia carcina , the Dark Furry Epitola , is a butterfly in the Lycaenidae family .
Gurney 's pitta ( Hydrornis gurneyi ) is a medium - sized passerine bird .
Rocellaria is a genus of saltwater clams , marine bivalve molluscs in the family Gastrochaenidae .
Small red scorpionfish ( Scorpaena notata ) is a venomous Scorpionfish , common in marine subtropical waters .
Allorchestes is a genus of amphipods with relatively small gnathopods , in the family Dogielinotidae ; it contains the following species :
Habragonum amamioshimense is a species of beetle in the family Carabidae , the only species in the genus Habragonum .
Within the Weymouthiidae , Mallagnostus belongs to a clade that further includes Tannudiscus , Jinghediscus and the Agnostina .
Eidothea is a genus of two species of rainforest trees in New South Wales and Queensland , in eastern Australia , constituting part of the plant family Proteaceae .
Banksia comosa , commonly known as Wongan Dryandra , is a shrub endemic to Western Australia .
Siliquaria , common name the slit worm snails , is a genus of sea snails , marine gastropod molluscs in the family Siliquariidae .
Pupillidae is a family of mostly minute , air - breathing , land snails , terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusks or micromollusks in the superfamily Pupilloidea .
The Peiratinae are a subfamily of assassin bugs ( Reduviidae ) known as corsairs .
Pagetia is a genus of very small trilobites , assigned to the Agnostida order , Eodiscidae family , that had a global distribution and lived during the Middle Cambrian .
The Kenya sparrow , also known as the Kenya rufous sparrow ( Passer rufocinctus ) is a sparrow found in Kenya and Tanzania .
In 2009 , the new tribe Platycarpheae was established for Platycarpha and Platycarphella .
The Smallfin worm - eel ( Pseudomyrophis micropinna , also known as the Plain worm eel ) is an eel in the family Ophichthidae ( worm / snake eels ) .
Brachmia is a genus of the twirler moth family ( Gelechiidae ) .
Canut 's horseshoe bat ( Rhinolophus canuti ) is a species of bat in the family Rhinolophidae .
Mastigostyla is a genus of flowering plants in the family Iridaceae , first described as a genus in 1928 .
Archidactylina is a genus of copepods that contains only the species Archidactylina myxinicola , and is the only genus in the family Archidactylinidae .
Nematolepis is a genus of shrubs and small trees in the family Rutaceae .
Isoperla is a genus in the family Perlodidae , also known as the perlodid stoneflies , stripetails or springflies .

The Pecora are an infraorder of even - toed hoofed mammals with ruminant digestion ( Ruminantia , a clade within the Artiodactyla ) .
Urodacus is a genus of scorpion belonging to the subfamily Urodacinae .
The Romblon hawk - owl ( Ninox spilonotus ) is a species of owl in the family Strigidae .
The Manu parrotlet ( Nannopsittaca dachilleae ) or Amazonian parrotlet is a recently described species of parrotlet native to the western Amazon basin , from southern Peru to northwest Bolivia .
The Spirillinida are an order of Foraminifera in which the test , or shell , primitively consists of an enrolled open tube , coming after the proloculus , wound planospirally or conically , commonly composed of an optically single crystal of calcite .
The Taiwan yuhina ( Yuhina brunneiceps ) , formerly known as `` Formosan yuhina '' , is a small songbird endemic to the island of Taiwan .
The Ochlockonee arcmussel , Alasmidonta wrightiana , was a species of freshwater mussel , an aquatic bivalve mollusk in the family Unionidae , the river mussels .
Asilinae is a large subfamily of the family Asilidae .
The Anatolia Lycian salamander , Lyciasalamandra antalyana , is a species of salamander in the Salamandridae family found only in Turkey .
The East African spiny - tailed lizard ( Cordylus tropidosternum common name : dwarf sungazer ) , also known as the tropical girdled lizard , is an arboreal or rupicolous ( rock - dwelling ) lizard found in dry forests of East Africa .

Dale Clevenger ( born 1940 in Chattanooga , Tennessee ) was the Principal Horn of the Chicago Symphony Orchestra from 1966 until his retirement in June , 2013 .

Adrian Goldberg ( born in Harborne , Warwickshire ) is an English journalist , radio and television presenter .

Ivan Krylov was born in Moscow , but spent his early years in Orenburg and Tver .

Leonard Lance was born in Easton , Pennsylvania , into a political family .

Mikael Daez was born in metro Manila to a family with eight siblings .
Manning currently runs a vocal studio on Music Row in Nashville TN `` Brett Manning Studios '' where he teaches along with his associate teachers Shelby Rollins , Jeff Mathena and Jason Catron .
Huang Hongtao began his football career with second - tier football club Guangzhou Apollo in the 1990 Chinese league season where he was part of the team that came runners - up and won promotion to the top tier .
Scott Snibbe ( born 1969 in New York City ) is an interactive media artist , researcher , and entrepreneur .
Maurizio Crozza ( born 5 December 1959 , in Genoa ) is an Italian comedian , actor and television presenter .
Emmit King ( born March 24 , 1959 in Bessemer , Alabama ) is a retired track and field sprinter from the United States , who twice was a member of the American Relay Team for the Summer Olympics ( 1984 and 1988 ) but he did n't compete .
Bruce Olson was born in 1941 in Saint Paul , Minnesota , the younger of two sons of Marcus and Inga Olson .
John - Paul Kelly , known as J.P. Kelly , is a professional poker player from Aylesbury , England .
Gregor Reisch ( born at Balingen in Württemberg , about 1467 ; died at Freiburg , Baden , 9 May 1525 ) was a German Carthusian humanist writer .
Dmitry Fofonov ( Kazakh : Дмитрий Фофонов ; born 15 August 1976 in Almaty ) is a former Kazakh professional road bicycle racer who was fired from UCI ProTeam Crédit Agricole for doping .
David Chiang Da - wei ( born Chiang Wei - nien on 29 June 1947 in Shanghai , Republic of China ) is a Hong Kong actor , director and producer .
Carel Sandon ( born 29 March 1983 , in Lubumbashi , Zaire ) is an Italian professional lightweight boxer .
Heinrich of Saxe - Weissenfels , Count of Barby ( b. Halle , 29 September 1657 - d. Barby , 16 February 1728 ) , was a German prince of the House of Wettin and count of Barby .
Erik Spiekermann ( born May 30 , 1947 in Stadthagen , Lower Saxony ) is a German typographer and designer .
Wynonie Harris ( August 24 , 1915 -- June 14 , 1969 ) , born in Omaha , Nebraska , was an American blues shouter and rhythm and blues singer of upbeat songs , featuring humorous , often ribald lyrics .
Robert - Georg Freiherr von Malapert , the second oldest of six children , was born on 7 August 1912 in Darmstadt .
Sabyasachi Mukherjee ( born 1974 ) is an Indian fashion designer from Kolkata .
Fernando Godoy ( born 1 May 1990 in Buenos Aires ) is an Argentine professional footballer who plays for Superleague Greece club Atromitos F.C. as a Midfielder .
Alberto Agnesi ( born November 21 , 1977 in Guadalajara , Jalisco ) is a Mexican telenovela and stage actor .
Martin Weinek ( born June 30 , 1964 in Leoben , Styria ) is an Austrian actor , character actor , wine producer , entrepreneur and entertainer , perhaps best known for his role in the television series Inspector Rex ( as Inspector Fritz Kunz ) .

The Master of the Virgo inter Virgines was a North Netherlandish painter and designer of woodcuts active around Delft between 1483 and 1498 .

Slavko Labović ( born November 17 , 1962 , in Kolašin , PR Montenegro , FPR Yugoslavia ) is a Serbian - Danish actor most popular for the role as a Serbian gangster in the Pusher trilogy .
A native of Sens in the Bourgogne région , Édouard Charton trained as a lawyer , receiving his degree at the age of 20 .
Igor Sartori ( born January 8 , 1993 , in Rio de Janeiro ) is a Brazilian born Striker , he currently plays for Red Bull Brasil , on loan from Flamengo .
Artem Simonyan ( born 20 February 1995 in Saint - Petersburg , Russia ) is an Armenian footballer who plays as a right winger for Zürich .
Erik Verlinde was born in the Dutch village of Woudenberg on January 21 , 1962 , together with his identical twin brother , Herman Verlinde .
Ma Yansong ( Chinese : 马岩松 ; pinyin : Mǎ Yánsōng ; born in 1975 in Beijing ) is a Chinese architect and founder of MAD architects .
Yvan Lebourgeois ( born October 26 , 1962 in Noyers - Bocage ) is a French retired football defender .
Primož Kozak was born in Ljubljana , in what was then the Kingdom of Yugoslavia , to a prominent left liberal intellectual family .
Scott Calderwood ( born 11 March 1978 in Birmingham , England ) is a retired Scottish professional footballer , the son of Jimmy Calderwood .
Vujadin Popović ( 14 March 1957 , Popovići , Bosnia and Herzegovina ) is a Bosnian Serb who participated in the War in Bosnia and Herzegovina .
Betiana Blum ( born in Charata , Chaco in 1939 as Bety Ana Blum ) is an Argentine actress .
Gregory Burke ( born 1968 ) is a Scottish playwright from Rosyth , Fife , Scotland .
Alden Nowlan was born into rural poverty in Stanley , Nova Scotia , adjacent to Mosherville , and close to the small town of Windsor , Nova Scotia , along a stretch of dirt road that he would later refer to as Desolation Creek .
Natnael Berhane ( born 5 January 1991 in Asmara ) is an Eritrean professional road bicycle racer for UCI Professional Continental team MTN - Qhubeka .
Andrea Gadaldi ( born August 25 , 1907 in Leno ) was an Italian professional football player and coach .
Jana Doleželová ( born 23 June 1981 in Šternberk , Czechoslovakia ) is a Czech actress , model , pharmacist and beauty pageant titleholder who won Miss Czech Republic as a 22-year - old and was a semi - finalist in Miss World 2004 in China .
Viktoria Wolffhardt ( born 26 June 1994 in Tulln an der Donau ) is an Austrian slalom canoeist who has competed since 2009 .
Roald Dahl was born in 1916 at Villa Marie , Fairwater Road , in Llandaff , Cardiff , Wales to Norwegian parents , Harald Dahl and Sofie Magdalene Dahl ( née Hesselberg ) .
Dick Platt was an English footballer who played as a right back for Huyton Quarry , Tranmere Rovers and Northampton Town .
Milan Božić ( born January 23 , 1982 , Toronto ) is a Canadian football player of Serbian origin .
Adam Mickiewicz was born 24 December 1798 , either at his paternal uncle 's estate in Zaosie ( now Zavosse ) near Navahrudak ( in Polish , Nowogródek ) or in Navahrudak itself in what was then part of the Russian Empire and is now Belarus .
Giovanni Antonio Guadagni was born in 1674 into a wealthy noble family in Florence which was at the time under the rule of the House of Medici .
Born in Privas ( Ardèche ) , Marcel Astier was the son of parliamentarian François Astier .
Sam Chegini ( Persian : سام چگینی ) is an award winning Iranian artist born in Tehran in 1992 in an artistic family .
David Isay grew up in New Haven , Connecticut , and Manhattan , New York .
Guido Beck ( August 29 , 1903 -- October 21 , 1988 ) was a physicist born in what was then the town of Reichenberg in the Kingdom of Bohemia ( Austria - Hungary ) , and is now Liberec in the Czech Republic .
Adolphe Kégresse ( 1879 , Héricourt , Haute - Saône - 1943 ) was a French military engineer , inventor of the half - track and dual clutch transmission .
Manoel Miluir Macedo Cunha ( born 15 April 1948 in Pedro Avelino ) is a Brazilian professional football manager .
Enrico Toccacelo ( born 14 December 1978 in Rome ) is an Italian auto racer with karting , GT and Formula 3000 experience .
Rajab Mwinyi ( born January 10 , 1984 in Bujumbura ) is a Burundian midfield player who plays for Simba SC in Dar es Salaam .
Ruslana Pysanka ( Ukrainian : Руслана Писанка ) , born Ruslana Ihorivna Pysanko on 17 November 1965 in Kiev , is a Ukrainian actress and cinematographer .
Günter Weigand ( born in 1924 in Olsztyn , East Prussia ) is a self - proclaimed `` social lawyer '' ( Sozialanwalt ) , economist and amateur prosecutor who became victim of a judicial and psychiatric scandal .
Kim Deitch ( born May 21 , 1944 in Los Angeles ) is an American cartoonist who was an important figure in the underground comix movement of the 1960s , remaining active in the decades that followed with a variety of books and comics , sometimes using the pseudonym Fowlton Means .
Naseem Pashtoon Sharifi , a businessman , and major independent newspaper , media and advertising company owner , in Kandahar is reported to have been driven out of Afghanistan by these methods and went public with major and detailed accusations against Qayum Karzai and his associates .
Farideh Mostafavi studied Islamic studies at home as well as in several maktabs of Qom in the 1970s .
Arthur Cullin was a British actor of the silent era who was born in Kensington , London .
Jonathan Antoine ( born 13 January 1995 ) , is a classically - trained concert tenor from Hainault , Essex .
Dragutin Ristić ( born 5 August 1964 in Pula ) is a Croatian former footballer who played as a striker , currently coach of Kras .
Kourosh Bagheri ( Persian : كوروش باقری‎ , born January 1 , 1977 in Kermanshah ) is a former Iranian weightlifter who won the gold medal in the Men 's 94 kg weight class at the 2001 World Weightlifting Championships .
Jimmy Fagg ( born 1929 in Gravesend , Kent ) is an English stand - up comedian , musician and actor .
Perri Lister was born in London , England on 10 April 1959 , the daughter of Bert Lister , a stage manager , dresser and chauffeur , by his third wife , stage actress Gail Kendall .
Agustín Viana ( born 23 August 1983 in Chicago ) is an American - born Uruguayan professional footballer who plays for Danubio of the Uruguayan Primera División .
Cratylus is mentioned in Aristotle 's Metaphysics in a passage which seems to imply that Cratylus was an established and active philosopher in Athens during the mid - late 5th century , and that Plato himself became briefly interested in his work prior to aligning with Socrates .
Agustín Canalda ( born 18 April 1977 , in Buenos Aires ) is an Argentine rugby union footballer .
Ahmad Salamatian ( born 1941 , Isfahan ) is a former Iranian politician .
Monty Roberts was born in Salinas , California and is the son of horse trainer Marvin E Roberts , who authored his own self - published book called `` Horse and Horseman Training '' in 1957 .
Jochen Schümann ( born 8 June 1954 in East Berlin ) is a German sailor and olympic champion .
Bibiana Steinhaus ( born 24 March 1979 in Bad Lauterberg ) is a German football referee .
Glen Crowe ( born 25 December 1977 in Dublin ) is an Irish professional football forward who currently plays for Malahide United in the Leinster Senior League .
Myra Keaton was born Myra Edith Cutler in Modale , Iowa ; the daughter of Frank Luke Cutler ( 1849 - -1935 ) and Sarah Elizabeth ( née Shaffer ; 1850 - -1887 ) .

Frederick Benteen was born August 24 , 1834 , in Petersburg , Virginia to Theodore Charles Benteen and his wife Caroline ( Hargrove ) Benteen .
Mark Fitzloff ( born February 3 , 1971 in Milwaukee , Wisconsin ) is an American advertising creative director .
Elaine Joyce Pinchot was born in Kansas City , Missouri of Hungarian ancestry .
Theodore Ziolkowski ( born 1932 in Birmingham , Alabama ) , is a scholar in the fields of German studies and comparative literature .
Rahmane Barry ( born 30 June 1986 in Dakar ) is a Senegalese football player who is speculated to be a free agent at present .
Cristóvão Borges dos Santos , or simply Cristóvão ( born 9 June 1959 in Salvador , Bahia ) is a former Brazilian football player at the position of Midfielder .

Edwin Markham was born in Oregon City , Oregon , and was the youngest of 10 children ; his parents divorced shortly after his birth .

Raphaël Nadé ( born 18 October 1980 in Abidjan , Côte d'Ivoire ) is a professional footballer who holds dual nationality with Côte d'Ivoire and France .
Ben Spies ( /ˈbɛn ˈspiːz/ ; born July 11 , 1984 in Memphis , Tennessee ) , also known as `` Elbowz '' due to his riding style where his elbows protrude outward , is a former professional motorcycle road racer who turned pro in 2000 .
Terry Wallis ( born April 7 , 1964 ) is an American man living in the Ozark Mountains of Arkansas who on June 11 , 2003 , regained awareness after spending 19 years in a minimally conscious state .
João Felipe Schmidt Urbano ( born 19 May 1993 ) , known as João Schmidt , is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays for São Paulo FC as a defensive midfielder .
Joan Blackham ( born 1946 in Wolverhampton , Staffordshire , England ) is a prolific British actress with a long stage , film and television career .
Gothenburg - based Swedish composer , sound designer , and multi - instrumentalist Magnus Birgersson created Solar Fields in the late 1990s .
Courtney Adams ( born June 5 , 1981 in Houston , Texas ) is an artist based in Hamburg , Germany .
Peter Ludvig Panum ( 19 December 1820 -- 2 May 1885 ) was a Danish physiologist and pathologist born in Rønne .
Khalil Abdul - Rahman , professionally known as DJ Khalil , is an American hip hop and soul music producer from Los Angeles , California .

Fanny Salvini - Donatelli , whose real name was Francesca Lucchi , was born in Florence to a prosperous family .

Darryl Way ( born 17 December 1948 , in Taunton , Somerset ) is a British rock and classical musician who was a founding member of Curved Air and co - writer of their only hit single , `` Back Street Luv '' .
