Fireworks , Should We See It from the Side or the Bottom ? ( 打ち上げ花火、下から見るか ? 横から見るか ? ) , usually called Fireworks , is a 1993 Japanese film by writer / director Shunji Iwai .
I Killed My Mother ( French : J'ai tué ma mère ) is a 2009 Quebec biographical drama film written and directed by Xavier Dolan .
Johnny Suede is a 1991 American film the directorial debut of Tom DiCillo , and stars Brad Pitt and Catherine Keener , with early appearances of Samuel L. Jackson and Nick Cave .
Woman Between Wolf and Dog ( Dutch : Een vrouw tussen hond en wolf , French : Femme entre chien et loup ) is a 1979 Belgian - French drama film directed by André Delvaux .
Cara sposa ( Dear Wife ) is a 1977 Italian comedy film directed by Pasquale Festa Campanile .
Cabezas cortadas ( Portuguese : Cabeças Cortadas ) is a 1970 Spanish - Brazilian drama film directed by Glauber Rocha .
S.O.S. Eisberg ( S.O.S. Iceberg ) is a 1933 German - US drama film directed by Arnold Fanck and starring Gustav Diessl , Leni Riefenstahl , Sepp Rist , Gibson Gowland , Rod La Roque , and Ernst Udet .
Robert Chiappetta and Glen Whitman co - wrote `` And Those We 've Left Behind '' , while Brad Anderson directed .
Nina 's Journey ( Swedish : Ninas resa , Polish : Podróż Niny ) is a 2005 Polish - Swedish drama film written and directed by Lena Einhorn .
An Episode in the Life of an Iron Picker ( Bosnian : Epizoda u životu berača željeza ) is 2013 Bosnian drama film directed by Danis Tanović .
The Man Who Quit Smoking ( Swedish : Mannen som slutade röka ) is a 1972 Swedish comedy film directed by Tage Danielsson , starring Gösta Ekman , Grynet Molvig , Carl - Gustaf Lindstedt and Gunn Wållgren .
Underworld U.S.A. ( also known as Underworld USA ) is a 1961 American neo - noir film produced , written and directed by Samuel Fuller .
Poverty and Nobility ( Italian : Miseria e nobiltà ) is a 1954 Italian comedy film directed by Mario Mattoli and starring Totò .
Thirty Seconds of Love ( Italian : Trenta secondi d'amore ) is a 1936 Italian romantic comedy film directed by Mario Bonnard and starring Nino Besozzi , Elsa Merlini and Enrico Viarisio .
Return to Ithaca ( French : Retour à Ithaque ) is a 2014 comedy - drama film directed by Laurent Cantet .
Kärlekens decimaler ( English : Love decimals ) is a 1960 Swedish drama film directed by Hasse Ekman .
A Short Film About Love ( Polish : Krótki film o miłości ) is a Polish romantic drama film directed by Krzysztof Kieślowski and starring Grażyna Szapołowska and Olaf Lubaszenko .
The Isle is a 2000 South Korean film written and directed by Kim Ki - duk .
The Girl from Monday is a 2005 American film directed by Hal Hartley .
Curse of the Golden Flower ( Chinese : 滿城盡帶黃金甲 ; pinyin : Mǎnchéngjìndàihuángjīnjiǎ ) is a 2006 Chinese epic drama film written and directed by Zhang Yimou .
Cry - Baby is a 1990 American teen musical romantic comedy film written and directed by John Waters .
Lola Colt ( also known as Black Tigress and Lola Baby ) is a 1967 Spaghetti Western film directed by Siro Marcellini .
The Lady of Monza ( Italian : La monaca di Monza , also known as The Awful Story of the Nun of Monza and The Nun of Monza ) is a 1969 Italian historical drama film directed by Eriprando Visconti .
Love Me Not ( Hangul : 사랑따윈 필요없어 ; RR : Sarang ddawin piryo eopseo ; literally `` Love and Such Is Not Necessary '' ) is a 2006 South Korean romance film directed by Lee Cheol - ha and starring Moon Geun - young and Kim Joo - hyuk .
Grandpa 's Journey ( Swedish : Morfars resa ) is a 1993 Swedish drama film directed by Staffan Lamm .
The Monuments Men is a 2014 American - German war film directed by George Clooney , written and produced by Clooney and Grant Heslov .
The Auntie from Chicago ( Greek : Η θεία από το Σικάγο ; also known Aunt from Chicago ) is a 1957 Greek theatrical comedy film directed by Alekos Sakellarios and produced by Finos Films .
All About Eve is a 1950 American drama film written and directed by Joseph L. Mankiewicz , and produced by Darryl F. Zanuck .
Bubba Ho - Tep is a 2002 American comedy horror film written , co - produced and directed by Don Coscarelli .
Poor Cow is a 1967 British drama film , directed by Ken Loach and based on Nell Dunn 's novel of the same name .
Elskere ( English : Lovers ) is a 1963 Norwegian drama film directed by Nils R. Müller , starring Ingerid Vardund and Wenche Myhre .
Sex Quartet ( Italian : Le fate , ' the fairies ' ) is a 1966 Italian comedy film directed by Mario Monicelli , Mauro Bolognini , Antonio Pietrangeli and Luciano Salce .
Things to Come ( also known in promotional material as H. G. Wells ' Things to Come ) is a 1936 British black - and - white science fiction film from United Artists , produced by Alexander Korda , directed by William Cameron Menzies , and written by H. G. Wells .
Häxan ( Danish title : Heksen ; English title : The Witches or Witchcraft Through the Ages ) is a 1922 Swedish - Danish silent film written and directed by Benjamin Christensen .
The Queen of Navarre ( Italian : La regina di Navarra ) is a 1942 Italian historical film directed by Carmine Gallone and starring Elsa Merlini , Gino Cervi and Renato Cialente .
The Eagleman Stag is a 9-minute long stop motion animated film by Michael Please .
Dove vai tutta nuda ? , internationally released as Where Are You Going All Naked ? , is a 1969 Italian comedy film directed by Pasquale Festa Campanile .
Keep Your Powder Dry is a 1945 drama film starring Lana Turner , Susan Peters , and Laraine Day as women who join the Women 's Army Corps during World War II . The film was directed by Edward Buzzell and written by George Bruce and Mary C. McCall , Jr.
Fred Olen Ray was the producer for all three of Steve Latshaw 's films , and Patrick Moran , who played Jack - O , had writing credits on all three as well .
Karin Daughter of Ingmar ( Swedish : Karin Ingmarsdotter ) is a 1920 Swedish silent drama film directed by Victor Sjöström .
The Birch Wood ( Polish : Brzezina ) is a 1970 Polish drama film directed by Andrzej Wajda based on a novel by Jarosław Iwaszkiewicz .
Dangerous Number is a 1937 American comedy film directed by Richard Thorpe and written by Carey Wilson .
Luna e l'altra is a 1996 Italian fantasy film directed , written and starred by Maurizio Nichetti .
Guilty as Sin is a 1993 courtroom drama thriller film written by Larry Cohen , directed by Sidney Lumet and produced by Martin Ransohoff .
Time Bandits is a 1981 British fantasy film co - written , produced , and directed by Terry Gilliam , and starring Sean Connery , John Cleese , Shelley Duvall , Ralph Richardson , Katherine Helmond , Ian Holm , Michael Palin , David Warner , and Craig Warnock .
Tiny Times 3 ( Chinese : 小时代:刺金时代 ) is a 2014 Chinese film written and directed by Guo Jingming and a sequel to 2013 's film Tiny Times 2 .
Summer Lovers is a 1982 romance film written and directed by Randal Kleiser , starring Peter Gallagher , Daryl Hannah and Valerie Quennessen .
It was written and directed by Gregory Widen , and is the first motion picture of The Prophecy series including four sequels .
Reign Over Me is a 2007 American drama film written and directed by Mike Binder , and produced by his brother Jack Binder .
Humain , trop humain is a French documentary film by Louis Malle about the operations of a Citroën car production plant .
Les Amants du Pont - Neuf ( French pronunciation : ​(lez‿amɑ̃ dy pɔ̃ nœf ) ) is a 1991 French film directed by Leos Carax , starring Juliette Binoche and Denis Lavant .
In My Skin ( French : Dans ma peau ) is a 2002 New French Extremity film written by , directed by , and starring Marina de Van .
Secret Agent Super Dragon ( also known as New York chiama Superdrago , which translates as New York calls Superdragon ) is a 1966 French , Spanish and Italian international co - production Eurospy film , directed by Giorgio Ferroni and starring Ray Danton as the titular secret agent .
Flight of Fury is a 2007 American action film directed by Michael Keusch , and written by Joe Halpin and Steven Seagal , who also starred in the lead role .
Side Street Story ( Italian : Napoli milionaria ( ˈnaːpoli miljoˈnaːrja ) , meaning `` Millionaire Naples '' ) is a 1950 Italian comedy film directed by Eduardo De Filippo .
Set Fire to the Stars is a 2014 British semi - biographical drama film directed by Andy Goddard in his directorial debut .
`` The Year of the Fin '' was written by creator Mitch Glazer and directed by Carl Franklin .
Cléo from 5 to 7 ( French : Cléo de 5 à 7 ) is a 1962 Left Bank film by Agnès Varda .
The Iron Crown ( Italian : La corona di ferro ) is a 1941 Italian adventure written and directed by Alessandro Blasetti , starring Massimo Girotti and Gino Cervi .
Christopher 's House ( Swedish : Kristoffers hus ) is a 1979 Swedish drama film directed by Lars Lennart Forsberg .
Manhandled is a 1949 film noir directed by Lewis R. Foster , and starring Dorothy Lamour , Dan Duryea , and Sterling Hayden , and based on the 1945 novel The Man Who Stole a Dream by L. S. Goldsmith .
Son cartas de amor ( Spanish : Novios para las muchachas ) is a 1943 Argentine comedy film directed by Luis César Amadori and starring Amelia Bence .
The Man Who Loves ( Italian : L'uomo che ama ) is a 2008 Italian romance - drama film directed by Maria Sole Tognazzi .
Thalapathi ( English : Commander ) is a 1991 Indian Tamil crime - drama film written and directed by Mani Ratnam and produced by G. Venkateswaran .
Jazzgossen ( `` The jazz boy '' ) is a 1958 Swedish musical film directed by Hasse Ekman .
The Elusive Pimpernel is a 1950 British period adventure film by the British - based director - writer team of Michael Powell and Emeric Pressburger , based on the novel The Scarlet Pimpernel ( 1905 ) by Baroness Emmuska Orczy .
Last Known Address ( French : Dernier domicile connu ) is a 1970 French - Italian film directed by José Giovanni .
A Mysterious Portrait ( French : Le Portrait mystérieux ) , also known as The Mysterious Portrait , is an 1899 French short silent film directed by Georges Méliès .
Facing Windows ( Italian : La finestra di fronte ) is a 2003 Italian movie directed by Ferzan Özpetek .
Higglety Pigglety Pop ! or There Must Be More to Life is a 2010 live - action / animated short film about the fictional adventures of Maurice Sendak 's pet dog Jennie , based on his 1967 children 's book of the same name .
The inspiration of Sia , le rêve du python is a seventh - century myth of the Wagadu people of Western Africa , which was adapted into the play La légende du Wagudu vue par Sia Yatabéré by Mauritanian writer Moussa Diagana .
Looking for Fidel is a documentary film by Oliver Stone , released in 2004 .
Multiple Maniacs is a 1970 American comedy film by American cult filmmaker John Waters ; his second feature film .
Sue Lost in Manhattan , also known as Sue , is a 1998 American drama film directed by Amos Kollek .
Drôle de Félix ( named The Adventures of Felix in English ; the title literally means Comedy of Félix or Amazing Félix ) is a 2000 French film , a road movie written and directed by Olivier Ducastel and Jacques Martineau .
Hail the Artist ( French : Salut l'artiste , Italian : L'idolo della città ) is a 1973 French - Italian comedy film directed by Yves Robert .
The Cable Guy is a 1996 American satirical black comedy film directed by Ben Stiller , who also co - stars in the film .
The Man Who Understood Women is a 1959 American drama film written and directed by Nunnally Johnson from a novel by Romain Gary , and starring Henry Fonda , Leslie Caron , Renate Hoy and Cesare Danova .
The Battle of the Villa Fiorita is a 1965 British - American drama film , based on the novel by Rumer Godden , directed by Delmer Daves .
The Bitter Tears of Petra von Kant ( German : Die bitteren Tränen der Petra von Kant ) is a 1972 German film directed by Rainer Werner Fassbinder , based on his own play .
Brotherhood of Blades ( Chinese : 绣春刀 ; pinyin : Xiùchūndāo ) is a 2014 Chinese wuxia film directed by Lu Yang .
Stop Making Sense is a 1984 concert movie featuring a live performance by Talking Heads .
On May 10 , 2012 , two weeks after Columbia Pictures and Sony Pictures Animation announced production of The Smurfs 2 , Variety reported that writers Karey Kirkpatrick and Chris Poche were developing a script for The Smurfs 3 , which was set for release on July 24 , 2015 , and later rescheduled for August 14 , 2015 .
Friends with Money is a 2006 comedy - drama film written and directed by Nicole Holofcener .
The Inbetweeners Movie is a 2011 British coming - of - age comedy film based on the E4 sitcom The Inbetweeners , written by series creators Damon Beesley and Iain Morris and directed by Ben Palmer .
The Miracle of Morgan 's Creek is a 1944 screwball comedy film written and directed by Preston Sturges , starring Eddie Bracken and Betty Hutton , and featuring Diana Lynn , William Demarest and Porter Hall .
Esther Kahn is the first English - language film by the French director Arnaud Desplechin .
Kull the Conqueror is a 1997 fantasy film about the Robert E. Howard character Kull starring Kevin Sorbo .
Brancaleone at the Crusades ( Italian : Brancaleone alle Crociate ) is an Italian comedy film directed by Mario Monicelli in 1970 , the sequel of the famous L'armata Brancaleone .
Me , Me , Me ... and the Others ( Italian : Io , io , io ... e gli altri ) is a 1966 Italian comedy film directed by Alessandro Blasetti .
Maryam and Mitil ( Persian : مریم و میتیل‎ ) is a 1993 Iranian written and directed by Fathali Oveisi , starring Afsaneh Bayegan , Hamid Jebeli , Hamideh Kheirabadi , Niyaz Taremi , Parviz Shafi'Zadeh and Mohammad Varshochi .

Ma petite entreprise ( English : My Little Business ) is a 1999 French film directed by Pierre Jolivet and written by Jolivet and Simon Michaël .
OceanWorld 3D is a 2009 documentary by Jean - Jacques Mantello .
Body Heat is a 1981 American neo - noir erotic thriller film written and directed by Lawrence Kasdan .
The Sucker ( French : Le Corniaud , French pronunciation : ​(lə kɔʁˈnjo ) ) is a French , Italian and Spanish comedy film by Gérard Oury starring Louis de Funès and Bourvil .
The Homestretch is a 1947 American drama film directed by H. Bruce Humberstone and written by Wanda Tuchock .
Tarzan Escapes is a 1936 Tarzan film based on the character created by Edgar Rice Burroughs .
Flickan från tredje raden ( English : The Girl from the Third Row ) is a 1949 Swedish comedy film directed by Hasse Ekman .
How I Won the War is a black comedy film directed and produced by Richard Lester , released in 1967 , based on a novel of the same name by Patrick Ryan .
Geri 's Game is a 1997 computer animated short film made by Pixar , written and directed by Jan Pinkava .
Death Carries a Cane ( Italian title : Passi di danza su una lama di rasoio ; UK title : Maniac At Large ) is a 1973 Italian giallo film directed by Maurizio Pradeaux .
The Nines ( stylized as The NIN9S ) is a 2007 science fantasy film written and directed by John August and starring Ryan Reynolds , Hope Davis , Melissa McCarthy , and Elle Fanning .
The Invisible War is a 2012 documentary film written and directed by Kirby Dick and produced by Amy Ziering and Tanner King Barklow about sexual assault in the United States military .
One Night at McCool 's is a 2001 American crime comedy film written by Stan Seidel , directed by Harald Zwart , and starring Liv Tyler , Matt Dillon , Paul Reiser , John Goodman , Michael Douglas , and Andrew Silverstein .
Tetro is a 2009 American - Argentine drama film written , directed and produced by Francis Ford Coppola and starring Vincent Gallo , Alden Ehrenreich and Maribel Verdú .
Office Romance ( Russian : Служебный роман , translit . Sluzhebnyy roman ) is a Soviet comedy film directed by Eldar Ryazanov .
Fellow Citizen ( Persian : همشهری , Hamshahri‎ ) is a 1983 Iranian documentary film directed by Abbas Kiarostami .
Shopgirl is a 2005 American romantic drama film directed by Anand Tucker and starring Steve Martin , Claire Danes , and Jason Schwartzman .
The Beautiful Person ( French : La belle personne ) is a 2008 French drama television film directed by Christophe Honoré .
Daddy 's Little Girls is a 2007 romantic comedy - drama film written and directed by Tyler Perry and produced by Perry and Reuben Cannon .
I camionisti ( The Truckers ) is a 1982 Italian comedy film directed by Flavio Mogherini and starred by the comedy duo Gigi e Andrea .
Milana ( Rendezvous ) is a 2007 Indian Kannada language drama film co - written and directed by Prakash , starring Puneeth Rajkumar , Pooja gandhi and Parvathy in the lead roles .
The Music According to Antonio Carlos Jobim ( Portuguese : A Música Segundo Tom Jobim ) is a 2012 Brazilian documentary film , directed by Nelson Pereira dos Santos and Dora Jobim that tells the history of the singer and songwriter Tom Jobim .
Kings of the Road ( German : I m Lauf der Zeit ) is a 1976 German road movie directed by Wim Wenders .
Teesri Manzil ( English : `` Third Floor '' ) is a 1966 Bollywood musical thriller directed by Vijay Anand and produced by Nasir Hussain .
Brice de Nice is a 2005 French comedy film directed by James Huth , written by Huth , Jean Dujardin , and Karine Angeli , and starring Dujardin .
The Master of Disguise is a 2002 Australian / British / American comedy fantasy film directed by Perry Andelin Blake in his directorial debut and written by Dana Carvey and Harris Goldberg .
Lui è peggio di me ( He is worse than me ) is a 1984 Italian comedy film directed by Enrico Oldoini .
The Princess of Montpensier ( French : La princesse de Montpensier ) is a 2010 French period romance film directed by Bertrand Tavernier , inspired by a short story anonymously published by Madame de La Fayette .
10:30 P.M. Summer is a 1966 American drama film directed by Jules Dassin , husband of star Melina Mercouri .
Under the Roofs of Paris ( French : Sous les toits de Paris ) is a 1930 French film directed by René Clair .
Natura contro ( English : Against Nature ) , also known in English as The Green Inferno and Cannibal Holocaust II , is a 1988 Italian cannibal film directed by mondo director Antonio Climati .
The Avenger of Venice ( Italian : Il ponte dei sospiri , Spanish : El puente de los suspiros , French : Le pont des soupirs ) is a 1964 Italian - French - Spanish adventure film written and directed by Carlo Campogalliani and starring Brett Halsey and Gianna Maria Canale .
Robot Stories is a 2003 American independent anthology science fiction comedy - drama film written and directed by Greg Pak .
The Criminal Life of Archibaldo de la Cruz ( original Spanish title : Ensayo de un Crimen ) is a 1955 Mexican film by Spanish - born writer - director Luis Buñuel .
A Dangerous Toy ( originally titled Il giocattolo ) is a 1979 Italian crime drama film written and directed by Giuliano Montaldo .
The Last Step ( Persian : پله آخر ) is Ali Mosaffa 's second feature film following Portrait of a Lady Far Away ( 2005 ) featuring Leila Hatami , Ali Mosaffa , and Alireza Aghakhani .
For One Thousand Dollars Per Day ( Italian : Per mille dollari al giorno , Spanish : Por mil dólares al día , also known as Renegade Gunfighter ) is a 1966 Italian - Spanish Spaghetti Western film directed by Silvio Amadio .
Watering the Flowers ( French : L'Arroseur ) was an 1896 French short comedy film directed by Georges Méliès .
Delamu ( simplified Chinese : 茶马古道:德拉姆 ; traditional Chinese : 茶馬古道:德拉姆 ; pinyin : Cha ma gudao : de la mu ) is an award winning 2004 documentary film directed by the acclaimed Fifth Generation Chinese filmmaker , Tian Zhuangzhuang .
Winter Holidays ( Italian : Vacanze d'inverno ) is a 1959 Italian comedy film directed by Camillo Mastrocinque and Giuliano Carnimeo ( collaborating director ) , based on story by Oreste Biancoli .
Addams Family Reunion is a 1998 film based on The Addams Family television series ( which was in turn based on the cartoons of Charles Addams ) .
Glumov 's Diary ( Дневник Глумова ) , a 1923 Soviet short silent film , is the first film directed by Sergei Eisenstein .
Bryllupsfesten ( English : The wedding party ) is a 1989 Norwegian comedy film written by Petter Vennerød , and directed by Vennerød and Svend Wam , starring Knut Husebø and Eli Anne Linnestad .
Poojai ( English : Veneration ) is a 2014 Indian Tamil masala film directed by Hari and produced by Vishal , who himself plays the lead role alongside an ensemble cast featuring Shruti Haasan , Sathyaraj , Raadhika Sarathkumar and Mukesh Tiwari .
The Curse of the Jade Scorpion is a 2001 crime comedy film written by , directed by , and starring Woody Allen .
Crime at the Chinese Restaurant ( Italian : Delitto al ristorante cinese ) is a 1981 Italian `` poliziottesco''-comedy film directed by Bruno Corbucci .
I Vitelloni ( Italian pronunciation : ( i vitelˈloːni ) ) is a 1953 Italian comedy - drama directed by Federico Fellini from a screenplay by Fellini , Ennio Flaiano and Tullio Pinelli .
Made in Britain is a 1983 British television play written by David Leland , and directed by Alan Clarke , about a 16-year - old racist skinhead named Trevor , and his constant confrontations with authority figures .
The Seven Year Itch is a 1955 American romantic comedy film based on a three - act play with the same name by George Axelrod .
The Inheritance or Fuckoffguysgoodday ( Czech : Dědictví aneb Kurvahošigutntag ) is a 1992 Czechoslovak comedy film directed by Věra Chytilová .

Bank Shot is a 1974 film directed by Gower Champion and written by Wendell Mayes .
La sbandata is a 1974 commedia sexy all'italiana film directed by Alfredo Malfatti ( supervised by Salvatore Samperi ) .
Tiny Furniture is a 2010 American independent comedy - drama written by , directed by , and starring Lena Dunham .
London River is a 2009 British drama film , written and produced by Franco - Algerian film director Rachid Bouchareb .
All These Women ( Swedish : För att inte tala om alla dessa kvinnor ) , originally released as Now About These Women in the UK , is a 1964 Swedish comedy film directed by Ingmar Bergman .

My New Partner is a 1984 French comedy film directed by Claude Zidi , starring Philippe Noiret and Thierry Lhermitte .
The Opium Den ( Italian : La fumeria d'oppio ) is a 1947 Italian crime film directed by Raffaello Matarazzo and starring Emilio Ghione Jr. , Mariella Lotti and Emilio Cigoli .

István Batházi ( born 16 December 1978 in Budapest ) is a male medley swimmer from Hungary , who competed three times for his native country at the Summer Olympics in 1996 and 2000 .

Suzanne Miller ( September 10 , 1950 -- December 20 , 2013 ) , better known by her ring name Vivian St. John , was an American female professional wrestler .
Adrienne A. Jones ( born November 20 , 1954 ) is the current Speaker Pro Tem of the Maryland House of Delegates , the first African - American female to serve in that position in Maryland .
Laura duPont ( May 4 , 1949 -- February 20 , 2002 ) was a female American tennis player .

Yoshiko Inoue ( born April 26 , 1988 , in Yamaguchi ) is a female wrestler from Japan .

Heterotaxalus schwarzeri is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Heterotaxalus .
Fragum unedo is a species of cockle , a marine bivalve mollusc in the family Cardiidae , commonly known as the Pacific strawberry cockle .
Tuberculobasis guarani is a species of damselfly in the family Coenagrionidae first identified in São Paulo , Brazil .
Indirana brachytarsus is a species of frog found in the Western Ghats ( including the Anaimalai Hills ) of India .
Oberea auricollis is a species of flat - faced longhorn beetle in the tribe Saperdini in the genus Oberea , discovered by Aurivillius in 1922 .
Ciconia is a genus of birds in the stork family .
Cellana craticulata is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Nacellidae , one of the families of true limpets
Heteroscodra is a genus of tarantulas which are native to West Africa and Central Africa .
Trigona fuscipennis is a stingless bee species that originates in Mexico but is also found in Central and South America .
Euhelopus is a genus of titanosauriform sauropod dinosaur that lived between 129 and 113 million years ago during the Early Cretaceous in what is now Shandong Province in China .
Camponotus americanus is a species of carpenter ant .
Tricleidus is an extinct genus of cryptoclidid plesiosaur known from only specimen ( BMNH R3539 ) from the middle Jurassic of United Kingdom .
Vitis xunyangensis is an Old World species of wild grape native to temperate China ( Shaanxi province ) .
Gymnodiscus is a genus of South African flowering plants in the sunflower family .
Anodonthyla hutchisoni is a species of microhylidae frog .
Crocidura cranbrooki is a species of shrew from Northern Myanmar .
Quassia amara ( amargo , bitter - ash , bitter - wood ) is a species in the genus Quassia , with some botanists treating it as the sole species in the genus .
Haplophyton crooksii is a plant species native to Arizona , New Mexico , Texas and northern Mexico .
Quedenfeldtia is a small genus of attractive gecko species , commonly known as atlas day geckos .
The Australian humpback dolphin ( Sousa sahulensis ) is a species of humpback dolphin and the fourth recognized humpback dolphin species chronologically .
Amblyomma triguttatum , commonly known as the kangaroo tick , is a species of tick in the genus Amblyomma native to Australia .
The Asiatic salamanders ( family Hynobiidae ) are primitive salamanders found all over Asia , and in European Russia .
Pseudoceros susanae is a marine flatworm species that belongs to the Pseudocerotidae family .
Stryphnodendron adstringens ( Portuguese : barbatimão ) is a species of legume in the genus Stryphnodendron found in Brazil .
Atelopus vogli was a species of harlequin frog in the family Bufonidae .
Longitarsus andalusicus is a species of beetle from the Chrysomelidae family that can be found in Belgium , Germany , Great Britain , France , and the Netherlands .
Parides burchellanus is a species of swallowtail butterfly ( family Papilionidae ) .
Monachoides incarnatus ( syn . Perforatella incarnata ) is a species of air - breathing land snail in the terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk family Hygromiidae , the hairy snails and their allies .
Aristea bakeri is a plant species in the family Iridaceae .
Macleaya microcarpa is a species of flowering plant in the poppy family Papaveraceae .
Couma is a genus of flowering plants in the family Apocynaceae first described as a genus in 1775 .
Bifurcaria is a genus of brown algae seaweeds found on rocky North American and European shores and tidepools of the Atlantic Ocean .
Heterotheca brandegeei is a rare Mexican species of flowering plant in the aster family .
Litoporus saul is a cellar spider species found in French Guiana .
Strophanthus is a genus of flowering plants in the family Apocynaceae , first described as a genus in 1802 .
Fervidobacterium islandicum is a species of extremely thermophilic anaerobic bacteria , first isolated from an Icelandic hot spring .
†Ctenoglypta newtoni was a species of small air - breathing land snails , terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusks in the family Euconulidae , the hive snails .
Acanthonotozomellidae is a family of amphipod crustaceans .
Campaea perlata , the pale beauty , is a species of moth in the family Geometridae .
Dironidae is a family of nudibranchs , marine gastropod molluscs , in the clade Euthyneura .
Astragalus aspindzicus , the Aspindzian astragalus , is a species of milkvetch that is endemic to the Meskheti region in southern Georgia .
Ploiaria metapterina is a species of true bug found in SE Australia .
Brachinus crepitans is a species of ground beetle in the Brachininae subfamily that can be found everywhere in Europe , except for Monaco , Norway , San Marino , Vatican City , and some islands such as Cyclades , Gibraltar , Iceland , Madeira , Malta , North Aegean , Novaya Zemlya , and Savage Islands .
Streptanthus bracteatus is a species of flowering plant in the mustard family known by the common names bracted jewelflower and bracted twistflower .
Gephyrosaurus is a genus of early Rhynchocephalia first described and named in 1980 by Susan E. Evans .
Astragalus ertterae is a rare species of milkvetch known by the common name Walker Pass milkvetch .
Citrus ichangensis , the Ichang papeda ( Chinese : 宜昌橙 ) , is a slow - growing species of the Citrus subg .
It contains only one species , Endromarmata lutipalpis , which is found in Mali and Senegal .
Smilosuchus ( meaning `` chisel crocodile '' ) is an extinct genus of leptosuchomorph phytosaurid from the Late Triassic of North America .
Causeyella , is a genus of millipedes comprising three species :
Rhinophis punctatus , or Müller 's earth snake , is a species of snake in the Uropeltidae family .
Tarantulas comprise a group of large and often hairy arachnids belonging to the Theraphosidae family of spiders , of which approximately 900 species have been identified .
Aspicilia ( sunken disk lichen ) is a genus of mostly crustose areolate lichens that grow on rock .
Xenocrasoides soukai is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , the only species in the genus Xenocrasoides .
Pundamilia is a small genus of haplochromine cichlids endemic to East Africa , primarily in Lake Victoria .
Zerene is a genus of butterflies in the family Pieridae commonly called dogfaces .
Trinervitermes trinervoides is a species of termite from family Termitidae from Africa .
Chlorostrymon is a genus of butterfly in the family Lycaenidae . The members ( species ) of this genus are found in the Nearctic ecozone and the Neotropical ecozone .
Polytolypa is a monotypic genus of fungus containing the single species Polytolypa hystricis .
Anemone baicalensis is a species of flowering plant in the genus Anemone .
Dimorphandra mollis , the Fava d'anta , is a tree species in the genus of Dimorphandra .
Abutilon fruticosum is a widespread species of flowering plant in the mallow family known by the common names Texas Indian mallow , pelotazo , and sweet Indian mallow .
Calvatia sculpta , commonly known as the sculpted puffball , the sculptured puffball , the pyramid puffball , and the Sierran puffball , is a species of puffball fungus in the Agaricaceae family .
Leptolalax croceus ( orange - bellied leaf - litter toad ) is a species of toad in the family of Megophryidae , discovered in the Central Vietnam in 2010 .
Hyotissa mcgintyi , also known as Parahyotissa mcgintyi is a species of medium - sized saltwater `` oyster '' , a marine bivalve mollusk in the family Gryphaeidae .
Pseudomancopsetta andriashevi , the Pygmy flounder , is a species of southern flounder known from deep waters off of the southern coast of Chile as well as from around the Crozet Islands and Prince Edward Islands where it occurs at depths of from 200 to 365 metres ( 656 to 1,198 ft ) .
The Gorongoza gerbil , Gerbilliscus inclusus , is a species of gerbil found in Mozambique , Tanzania , and Zimbabwe .
This is the origin of the genus name Novirhabdovirus .
Odaraia is a genus of crustacean arthropod from the Middle Cambrian .
It contains the single species Anaemosia albida , which is found in Malawi .
Clitellaria ephippium is a species of ' Soldier Fly ' ( so named for the thorns that armor the body ) belonging to the family Stratiomyidae .
Zanha golungensis is a species of fruit plants from Sapindaceae family that can be found in Cameroon and Zimbabwe .
Coprinopsis variegata , commonly known as the scaly ink cap or the feltscale inky cap , is a species of fungus in the family Psathyrellaceae .
Oenothera californica , known by the common name California evening primrose , is a species of flowering plant in the evening primrose family .
Bjoernstadia kasuluensis is a moth in the Cossidae family , and the only species in the genus Bjoernstadia .
Agonum corvus is a species of ground beetle from Platyninae subfamily .
The Austrolithoideae are a subfamily of Coralline alga .
Microchela is an extinct genus of prawn , which contains a single species Microchela rostrata .
Aeshna canadensis , the Canada darner , is a species of dragonfly in the family Aeshnidae .
However , the species Notonecta undulata has only been documented and studied in southern Manitoba , Saskatchewan , Alberta and the western United States .
Tropidaster is an extinct genus of sea star that lived in the Early Jurassic .
Aegopinella nitidula ( previously known as Retinella nitidula ) is a species of small land snail , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Oxychilidae , the glass snails .
Rotadiscus is a genus of discoidal animal known from the Cambrian Chengjiang biota and classified with the eldoniids .
Colobosaura is a monotypic genus of lizard , endemic to South America , in the family Gymnophthalmidae .
Pyuridae is a family of Tunicates .
Dendrocalamus strictus is a bamboo species belonging to the Dendrocalamus genus .
Triplophysa gejiuensis ( Gejiu blind loach ) is a species of stone loach endemic to China .
Artemisia cana is a species of sagebrush native to western and central North America , a member of the sunflower family .
Streptomyces alanosinicus is a bacterium species from the genus of Streptomyces which was isolated from soil in Brazil .
Probainognathidae is an extinct family of carnivorous therapsids which lived during the Upper Triassic .
Lamprologus ornatipinnis is a species of cichlid endemic to Lake Tanganyika where it prefers areas with sandy substrates or , sometimes rocky areas .
Pseudoradiarctia is a genus of moth in the family Arctiidae from Afrotropics .
Diurodrilus is a genus of tiny marine animals that has traditionally been assigned to the annelid worms , although this affinity is not certain .
It contains only one species , Issikiocrania japonicella , which is found in Japan .
Disa borbonica is a species of plant in the orchid family of the genus Disa .
Clostridium tetani is a rod - shaped , anaerobic species of pathogenic bacteria , of the genus Clostridium .
Pimelea ligustrina , commonly known as tall rice - flower , is a shrub species in the family Thymelaeaceae .
Nodipecten magnificus is a species of bivalve in the Pectinidae family .
Michaelophorus dentiger is a species of moth in the genus Michaelophorus , known from Argentina , Brazil , British Guyana , Cuba , Curaçao , Honduras , Ecuador , Nicaragua , Paraguay , and Venezuela .
Antedon is a genus of free - swimming , stemless crinoids .
Crypsis alopecuroides is a species of grass known by the common name foxtail pricklegrass .
Vaccinium myrtillus is a species of shrub with edible fruit of blue color , commonly called `` bilberry '' , `` whortleberry '' or European blueberry .
Denmoza is a genus of cactus found in Argentina , comprising only 2 species .
Vatica guangxiensis is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family endemic to China .
Acrobasis tricolorella , the destructive prune worm or tricolored acrobasis moth , is a species of snout moth in the genus Acrobasis .
Sturisoma guentheri is a species of armored catfish endemic to Peru where it occurs in the upper Amazon basin .
Campanula collina , common name blue dwarf bellflower , is a species of flowering plant in the genus Campanula of the family Campanulaceae , native to the Caucasus and north - eastern Turkey .
Astronium balansae is a species of flowering tree in the cashew family , Anacardiaceae , that is native to Argentina and Paraguay .
Vanda insignis is a species of orchid endemic to the Lesser Sunda Islands .
Trochus calcaratus , common name the actor top shell , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Trochidae , the top snails .
Formica pratensis , the black - backed meadow ant , is a species of European red wood ant in the family Formicidae .
Attagenus punctatus is a species of beetles found in Europe and the Near East .
Holmiidae is a family of trilobites , that lived during the Lower Cambrian ( Atdabanian ) .
Chalcothea is a genus of flower chafer belonging to the family scarab beetles .
Nyssa sylvatica 's genus name ( Nyssa ) refers to a Greek water nymph ; the species epithet sylvatica refers to its woodland habitat .
Entimus is a genus of broad - nosed weevils belonging to the family true weevil and the Entiminae subfamily .
Trialestes is an extinct genus of Late Triassic crocodylomorph that lived in South America .
Coincya wrightii , known as Lundy cabbage , is a species of primitive brassicoid , endemic to the island of Lundy off the southwestern coast of England , where it is sufficiently isolated to have formed its own species , with its endemic insect pollinators .
Ectopioglossa is a far eastern genus of potter wasps .
The Valcouroceratidae is an oncocerid family from the middle and upper Ordovician , mainly of North America , consisting of genera characterized by exogastricly curved cyrtoconic and breviconic shells that change ontogeneticially from compressed to depressed or subtriangular and in which the siphuncle in ventral and actinosiphonate .
Nidimys occultus is a multituberculate which existed in the United States during the Edmontonian faunal stage of the upper Cretaceous period , and the only species in the genus Nidimys .
Caiman wannlangstoni is an extinct species of caiman that lived in Amazonia during the Middle and Late Miocene .
Tricardia is a monotypic genus of flowering plants in the borage family containing the single species Tricardia watsonii , which is known by the common name threehearts .
Nesiarchus nasutus , the Black gemfish , is a species of snake mackerel found in tropical and subtropical waters in most parts of the world , though not in east Pacific and north Indian waters .
Anadenidae is a taxonomic family of air - breathing land slugs , terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusks in the superfamily Arionidae ( according to the taxonomy of the Gastropoda by Bouchet & Rocroi , 2005 ) .
The Marantaceae are a family , the arrowroot family , of flowering plants known for its large starchy rhizomes .
The Ecdeiocoleaceae comprise a family of flowering plants .
Squalius ghigii , or Ladigesocypris ghigii , is a species of freshwater fish in the Cyprinidae family , also known as the gizani or ghizáni .
The genus Dendrolycopodium is a clubmoss genus that some taxonomists have segregated from Lycopodium .
Gymnothamnion elegans ( syn . Callithamnion elegans Schousboe ex C.Agardh 1828 ) is a red alga species in the genus Gymnothamnion found in South Africa from Bakoven on Cape Peninsula to KwaZulu - Natal .
Megalophota leonella is a species of snout moth , and the only species in the genus Megalophota .
Crichtonsaurus is a dubious genus of herbivorous ankylosaurid ankylosaur dinosaur .
The Mexican small - eared shrew ( Cryptotis mexicana ) is a species of mammal in the family Soricidae .
Abyssochrysos melanioides is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Abyssochrysidae .
Echinacea atrorubens , called the Topeka Purple Coneflower , is a North American species of plants in the sunflower family .
Boswellia papyrifera is a species of flowering plant that is native to Ethiopia , Eritrea and Sudan .
Grimmia antarctici is a species of moss that grows in areas of Antarctica such as the Windmill Islands .
Parmarion martensi is a species of air - breathing land semislug , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Ariophantidae .
Muhlenbergia utilis is a species of grass known by the common name Aparejograss .
Peniocereus striatus is a species of cactus known by several common names , including gearstem cactus , cardoncillo , jacamatraca , sacamatraca , and dahlia - rooted cactus .
The Sonoran green toad ( Anaxyrus retiformis , in Spanish `` sapo verde de Sonora '' or `` sapo verde sonorense '' ) is a species of toad in the family Bufonidae .
Bistolida diauges , common name : the square - spotted cowry , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Cypraeidae , the cowries .
Pseudagrion melanicterum , the Black - and - yellow Sprite , is a species of damselfly in the family Coenagrionidae .
The sole species is Acrobotrys discolor , which is endemic to Colombia .
Risiocnemis seidenschwarzi is a species of damselfly in the family Platycnemididae and the only known species in the genus Risiocnemis .
Alpheidae is a family of caridean snapping shrimp characterized by having asymmetrical claws , the larger of which is typically capable of producing a loud snapping sound .
Brachycephalus izecksohni is a species of frog in the Brachycephalidae family endemic to Brazil .
Clavelina sabbadini is a species of tunicate ( sea squirt ) , in the genus Clavelina ( the `` little bottles '' ) .
Paronychia argyrocoma , the Silvery nailwort is a plant species native to the eastern United States .
Bothrops ammodytoides is a venomous pit viper species endemic to Argentina .
Benthophilus ctenolepidus is a species of goby widespread along the southern coasts of the Caspian Sea : in the Gorgansky Bay , also from Absheron to Astara at south .
Choiaella is an extinct genus of demosponge ranging from the Chengjiang lagerstatten until the Lower Silurian .
Mexipyrgus is a genus of very small freshwater snails , aquatic gastropod mollusks in the family Cochliopidae .
Erechtites is a genus of flowering plants in the daisy family known commonly as fireweeds or burnweeds .
Dictyna hamifera is spider species found in Finland and Russia .
Eupauloecus is a genus of spider beetles found in western North America .
The Apiosporaceae are a family of fungi in the Ascomycota .
Eriogonum mohavense is a species of wild buckwheat known by the common name Western Mojave buckwheat .
Calochortus venustulus is a Mexican species of plants in the lily family native to central and eastern Mexico and bearing yellow flowers .
Hesperolinon micranthum is a species of flowering plant in the flax family known by the common name smallflower dwarf flax .
Nannophrys ceylonensis , commonly known as the Sri Lanka rock frog or the Ceylon streamlined frog , is a species of frog .
Kolopsis is an extinct genus of diprotodontid marsupials from Australia and Papua New Guinea .
Amblema plicata , common name the Threeridge , is a species of freshwater mussel , an aquatic bivalve mollusk in the family Unionidae , the river mussels .
Arctostaphylos myrtifolia is a rare species of manzanita known by the common name Ione manzanita .
Pseudocroniades is a Neotropical genus of Firetips in the family Hesperiidae . The genus is monotypic .
Phaedrolosaurus is a genus of theropod dinosaur , based on a single tooth possibly from the Valanginian - Albian - age Lower Cretaceous Lianmugin Formation of Wuerho , Xinjiang , China .
The Fiji parrotfinch ( Erythrura pealii ) is a species of estrildid finch endemic to Fiji that was formerly considered to be a subspecies of the red - headed parrotfinch .
Hoplocarida is a subclass of crustaceans .
Rosenbergia rufolineata is a species of longhorn beetles in the subfamily Lamiinae .
Elymus elymoides is a species of wild rye known by the common name squirreltail .
Ptychochromoides itasy is a species of cichlid fish from central Madagascar .
It is the only species in the genus Nothomicrodon , but shows none of the features of a hoverfly larva , and the genus may instead belong in the Phoridae .
Quercus chrysolepis , commonly termed canyon live oak , canyon oak , golden cup oak or maul oak , is a North American species of evergreen oak that is found in Mexico and in the western United States , notably in the California Coast Ranges .
Limenavis is a prehistoric bird genus from the Late Cretaceous .
Periclimenes imperator , known as the emperor shrimp , is a species of shrimp with a wide distribution across the Indo - Pacific .
Nicolletia , common name hole - in - the - sand plant , is a small genus of flowering plants in marigold tribe within the sunflower family .
Rossia pacifica , also known as the stubby squid , is a species of bobtail squid native to the northern Pacific Ocean .
Allium tenuicaule is an Asian species of wild onion found in Pakistan , Afghanistan , Iran , Uzbekistan and Tajikistan .
Prosopis strombulifera is a species of mesquite or algarrobo , a shrub in the legume family .
Ribes sardoum , commonly called Sardinian currant , is a species of plant in the gooseberry family .
Pseudopharsalia flavostictica is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Pseudopharsalia .
Nemipterus bipunctatus , the Delagoa threadfin bream , is a species of threadfin bream native to Indian oceanic seas .
Epinephelus albomarginatus ( captain fine , white - edged grouper or white - edged rockcod ) is a species of fish in the Serranidae family .
Geminiraptor is a genus of troodontid dinosaur .
Allomyrina is a genus of rhinoceros beetle .
Columbicola extinctus , also known as the passenger pigeon chewing louse , is an extant species of phtilopterid louse that was once believed to have been extinct with its only known host , the passenger pigeon , prior to its rediscovery living on band - tailed pigeons .
Horabagrus nigricollaris is a species of catfish endemic to India .
Adelostigma is a genus of flowering plants in the daisy family described as a genus in 1864 .
Pentasteria is an extinct genus of sea star that lived from the Early Jurassic to the Early Cretaceous .
Potentilla cristae is a rare species of cinquefoil known by the common name crested cinquefoil .
Pseudonemesia parva is a species of spider in the Microstigmatidae family .
The genus contains the single species Graciliscincus shonae ( Sadlier 's skink or gracile burrowing skink ) , found in New Caledonia .
Potamonautes rukwanzi is a species of crustacean in the family Potamonautidae .
Chlorogalum grandiflorum is a species of flowering plant known by the common name Red Hills soap plant .
Chondrometopum arcuatum is a species of ulidiid or picture - winged fly in the genus Chondrometopum of the family Tephritidae .
Pachyrhabda is a genus of moth in the family Stathmopodidae .
Blasiaceae is a family of liverworts with only two species :
Eucarlia is a genus of spirobolidan millipedes containing six species ; most of which are endemic to the island nation of Seychelles , and one native to the Indonesian island of Sulawesi .
Erythrina flabelliformis , common name chilicote or Western coral bean , is a plant species native to central and northwestern Mexico and the southwestern United States .
Branchiobdellida are an order of leech - like clitellates that are mostly exoparasites of crayfish .
The Eumolpinae are a subfamily of the leaf beetles , or Chrysomelidae . They are oval , and convex in form , and measure up to 10 mm in size .
Fojia is a monotypic genus of skinks : the sole species is Fojia bumui , also known as the fojia skink .
Tombusviridae is a family of single - stranded positive sense RNA plant viruses .
Rhynchogadus hepaticus is a species of morid cod known only from the Mediterranean Sea where it occurs in the Gulf of Naples and near to Messina .
Aegopogon is a genus of New World plants in the grass family .
Abax parallelepipedus is a species of ground beetle native to Europe and the Nearctic .
Ligustrum expansum is a plant species native to China and Vietnam .
Pyralosis polycyclophora is a species of snout moth in the genus Pyralosis .
Sesarma reticulatum , the purple marsh crab or simply marsh crab , is a crab species native to the salt marshes of the eastern United States .
Synodontis schall , the Wahrindi , is a species of upside - down catfish widespread in northern Africa .
Jobinia is a genus of flowering plants of the family Apocynaceae first described in 1885 .
Tienosuchus is a dubious extinct genus of gavialoid crocodilian .
Elliot 's laughingthrush ( Trochalopteron elliotii ) is a bird species in the Leiothrichidae family .
Neotrigonia is a genus of living saltwater clams , marine bivalve mollusks in the family Trigoniidae , which otherwise consists only of fossil genera .
Afrocylindromorphus platysomus is a species of beetles in the family Buprestidae , the only species in the genus Afrocylindromorphus .
Conoppia palmicinctum is a species of mite in the family Cepheidae .
Coreus is a genus of leaf - footed bug in the Coreinae subfamily .
Saccoglossus is a genus of acorn worm ( Class Enteropneusta ) .
Nymphalis , commonly known as Tortoiseshells , or Anglewing butterflies is a genus of brush - footed butterflies .
Idotea linearis is a species of elongated isopod crustacean .
Eriogonum ternatum is a species of wild buckwheat known by the common name ternate buckwheat .
Sarcococca saligna ( sweet box or Christmas box ) is a species of flowering plant in the family Buxaceae .
Paradecolya inexspectata is a species of insect , belonging to the family of Tettigonioidea .
Laurentaeglyphea neocaledonica is a species of glypheoid lobster , and the only species in the genus Laurentaeglyphea .
Cicindela hirticollis is a species of tiger beetle that is commonly found in sand bars and sandy beaches , is medium sized , is about 2 - -14 mm ( 0.08 - -0.55 in ) long , and is active in the summer .
Loxerebia is a butterfly genus of the Satyrinae . The genus is confined to China ( including Tibet ) , Mongolia , Burma , Thailand and Laos .
Cotoneaster cambricus ( Wild Cotoneaster ; Welsh : Creigafal y Gogarth `` rock apple of Gogarth '' ) is a species of Cotoneaster endemic to the Great Orme peninsula in north Wales .
Aztekium ritteri is a species of cactus , in the genus Aztekium .
Zygoballus nervosus is a species of jumping spider which occurs in the eastern United States and Canada .
Agyneta palustris is a species of sheet weaver found in China .
Festuca rubra is a species of grass known by the common name red fescue or creeping red fescue .
The New Zealand stiff - tailed duck ( Oxyura vantetsi ) is an extinct duck species from New Zealand which is known only from subfossil remains .
Phalaris paradoxa is a species of grass in genus Phalaris .
Cyathea henryi is a species of tree fern native to India and Yunnan in China , where it grows submontane and montane forest at an altitude of 600 - 1200 m. The trunk of this plant is erect and may be 5 - 7 m tall or more .
Staphylococcus ( from the Greek : σταφυλή , staphylē , `` grape '' and κόκκος , kókkos , `` granule '' ) is a genus of Gram - positive bacteria .
Hemiphractus helioi is a species of frog in the Hemiphractidae family .
Parasomatidia kaszabi is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Parasomatidia .
Navarretia breweri is a species of flowering plant in the phlox family known by the common name Brewer 's navarretia .
Chromis acares is a species of damselfish native to the Pacific Ocean .
Eoarthropleura was a genus of millipede - like creatures which lived between the Late Silurian and Late Devonian periods .
Palleon is a genus of small chameleons erected in 2013 for a small clade formerly assigned to the genus Brookesia .
Isodontosaurus is an extinct genus of iguanian lizard from the Late Cretaceous of Mongolia .
Anteros acheus is a species of butterflies of the Riodinidae family , found in Brazil , Surinam and Bolivia .
Maylandia emmiltos is a species of cichlid endemic to Lake Malawi where it is only known from the Mpanga Rocks near Chilumba .
Lotus procumbens is a species of legume known by the common name silky deerweed .
Lepidium jaredii is a species of flowering plant in the mustard family known by the common name Jared 's pepperweed .
Phyllochoreia is a genus of grasshopper endemic to the Western Ghats of India and Sri Lanka .
Zethalia zelandica , common name the wheel shell , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Trochidae , the top snails .
Stylidium humphreysii is a species of trigger plant endemic to desert regions of Western Australia .
Erythroxylum coca is one of two species of cultivated coca .
Polygonum marinense is a rare North American species of flowering plants in the buckwheat family known by the common name Marin knotweed .
Strophiceras is an extinct cephalopod genus from the Order Nautilida , which includes , in a separate family , Nautilus and Allonautilus .
Tonestus , common name serpentweed , is a genus of North American flowering plants in the aster family .
Leccinum aurantiacum , is a species of fungus in the genus Leccinum .
Chrysopogon aciculatus ( syn . Andropogon aciculatus ) is a species of grass native to the tropics of Asia , Polynesia , and Australia at low elevations .
Buchanania platyneura is a species of flowering plant in the family Anacardiaceae .
Echinoscelis hemithia is a species of moth in the family Cosmopterigidae .
Lizardfishes are benthic marine and estuarine bony fishes that comprise the aulopiform fish family Synodontidae .
Harpadon translucens ( Bombay duck , glassy Bombay duck , or ghost grinner ) is a species of lizardfish that lives in the mainly in the Indo - West Pacific .
Carex siderosticta is a species of sedge native to East Asia .
Tachina tricincta is a species of fly in the genus Tachina of the family Tachinidae that is endemic to Austria .
Chamaesaracha is a genus of perennial herbs in the nightshade family which are known commonly as five eyes .
Palaeoteuthomorpha is a superorder of primitive coleoid cephalopods , containing the Boletzkyida , characterized by an orthoceroid - like phragmocone early in ontogeny and a teuthid living chamber later in ontogeny .
A single species , Archetypomys erlianensis , has been described from Inner Mongolia .
Heterotheca pumila , called the alpine goldenaster , is a North American species of flowering plant in the aster family .
The Great Plains toad ( Anaxyrus cognatus ) is a relatively large species of true toad .
Neocrepidodera nobilis is a species of flea beetle from Chrysomelidae family that can be found in France , Italy , and Switzerland .
Legionella longbeachae is one species of the family Legionellaceae .
Pucciphippsia is a genus of Arctic plants in the grass family , reported from Greenland , Svalbard , and Magadan .
Cyathea borneensis is a species of tree fern native to southern parts of Thailand and Cambodia , as well as the Malay Peninsula and Borneo , where it grows in lowland forest at an altitude of 400 - 1100 m. The trunk is erect and usually up to 2 m tall or more .
The Peloridiidae or moss bugs are a family of true bugs , comprising eighteen genera and thirty - four species .
The only species recognized is Synoum glandulosum , known commonly as Scentless Rosewood .
Tyrannosauridae ( or tyrannosaurids , meaning `` tyrant lizards '' ) is a family of coelurosaurian theropod dinosaurs which comprises two subfamilies containing up to eleven genera , including the eponymous Tyrannosaurus .
Therizinosauridae ( `` reaper lizards '' ) is a family of advanced herbivorous or omnivorous theropod dinosaurs .
Eupatorieae is a tribe of over 2000 species of plants in the aster family .
Eriogonum gypsophilum is a rare species of wild buckwheat known by the common names Seven River Hills buckwheat and gypsum wild buckwheat .
Brisaster latifrons is a species of sea urchins of the family Schizasteridae .
Metapelma archetypon is an extinct species of parasitic wasp in the Eupelmidae genus Metapelma .
Leptotyphlops guayaquilensis , or the Guayaquila blind snake , is a species of snake in the Leptotyphlopidae family .
Lobatus goliath , previously known as Eustrombus goliath and Strombus goliath , common name the goliath conch , is a species of very large edible sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Strombidae , the true conchs .
Psephosauriscus is an extinct genus of placodont reptile from the Middle Triassic of Israel and Egypt .
Agaricus impudicus , is a mushroom of the genus Agaricus , a familiar genus with many edible species .
Sinictinogomphus clavatus , the golden flangetail , is a species of dragonfly in the clubtail family Gomphidae .
Phacopidae is a family of phacophid trilobites that ranges from the Lower Ordovician to the Upper Devonian , with representatives in all paleocontinents .
Proepipona is an afrotropical genus of potter wasps with seven described species .
Copeina guttata is a one of two fish species in the genus Copeina , which is in the family Lebiasinidae .
Typothoracisinae is a clade of aetosaurs within the subfamily Aetosaurinae .
Callionymus persicus is a species of dragonet native to the western Indian Ocean where it occurs at depths of from 15 to 100 metres ( 49 to 328 ft ) .
Gnathophis tritos was given its species epithet due to its being the third species in its genus discovered in the western Atlantic .
Cutandia is a genus of Asian and Mediterranean plants in the grass family .
Acacia koa is a species of flowering tree in the pea family , Fabaceae .
Rheum webbianum is a species of herbaceous perennials plants in the family Polygonaceae .
Delta dimidiatipenne is a species of Potter wasp from the warmer regions of the Palearctic which specielaises in the hunting of caterpillars and is therefore sometimes known as the caterpillar hunting wasp .
Lepetodrilidae is a family of small , deep - sea sea snails , hydrothermal vent limpets , marine gastropod mollusks in the clade Vetigastropoda ( according taxonomy of the Gastropoda by Bouchet & Rocroi , 2005 ) .
Porcellionides myrmicidarum is a species of woodlouse in the Porcellionidae family that is endemic to Sicily .
Stenodermatinae is a large subfamily of bats in the family Phyllostomidae .
Tangavelleda tanzanicola is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Tangavelleda .
The American soles are a family ( Achiridae ) of flatfish occurring in both freshwater and marine environments of the Americas .
Adelpha bredowii , commonly known as Bredow 's Sister , is a species of butterfly in the family Nymphalidae .
Prothalotia lesueuri , common name Lesueur 's top shell , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Trochidae , the top snails .
Pseudoconorbis is a genus of sea snails , marine gastropod mollusks in the family Conidae , the cone snails and their allies .
Eucalyptus clelandii , commonly known as Cleland 's blackbutt , is a species of eucalypt native to Western Australia .
Distoechodon is a genus of cyprinid fishes that occur in East Asia , one species endemic to mainland China and the other in both mainland China and Taiwan .
Ciliopagurus krempfi is a species of hermit crab from the Indo - Pacific .
Mikadotrochus hirasei , common name the emperor 's slit shell , is a species of large deepwater sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pleurotomariidae , the slit snails .
Brookesia brygooi , commonly known as the leaf chameleon , is a species of chameleon endemic to Madagascar .
Allotoca is a genus of splitfins endemic to central Mexico .
Cornus clarnensis is an extinct species of flowering plant in the dogwood family , Cornaceae , solely known from the middle Eocene sediments exposed in north central Oregon .
Calymene ( meaning beautiful crescent as a reference to the glabella ) is a genus of trilobites in the order Phacopida that are found throughout North America , North Africa , and Europe in primarily Silurian outcrops .
Torilis nodosa is a species of flowering plant in the parsley family known by the common names knotted hedgeparsley and short sock - destroyer .
Amietophrynus buchneri ( common name : Buchner 's toad ) is a species of toad in the family Bufonidae .
Curtimorda maculosa is a species of beetle in the Curtimorda genus .
Volkameria inermis ( glory bower ) is a species of flowering plant in the genus Volkameria of the family Lamiaceae , found in Australia , Asia , Malesia and the Pacific islands .
The Phyllodini are a tribe of moths in the Erebidae family .
Celaenorrhinus is a genus of skipper butterflies which are commonly termed sprites .
Citrus glauca is therefore one of the most resilient Citrus species , and is comparatively heat , drought , and cold tolerant .
Allium eusperma is a plant species native to the provinces of Sichuan and Yunnan in southern China .
The Deferribacteraceae are a family of bacteria , given their own phylum ( Deferribacteres ) .
Heteroclinus kuiteri , Kuiters weedfish , is a species of clinid native to the Indian Ocean coast of Australia .
Marasmius amazonicus is a species of agaric fungus in the family Marasmiaceae .
Hamadryas argentea ( also called Silvery Buttercup ) is a species of plant in the Ranunculaceae family .
Copaifera panamensis , commonly known as the Cabimo is a species of flowering plant in the pea family , Fabaceae , that is endemic to Panama .
Spartina gracilis is a species of grass known by the common name alkali cordgrass .
Paradoxodacna piratica is a species of fish in the family Ambassidae , the Asiatic glassfishes .
The herbaceous perennial plant Gentiana calycosa is a species of gentian known by the common names Rainier pleated gentian and mountain bog gentian .
Strempeliopsis is a genus of plant in family Apocynaceae , first described as a genus in 1876 .
Buddleja axillaris is a shrub endemic to Madagascar , the Comoro Islands , and Tanzania , growing in forests at elevations of 300 - -1400 m. The species was first named and described by Willdenow in 1827
The genus is placed in its own family , Kiwaidae , in the superfamily Chirostyloidea .
Dysdera erythrina is a species of spider in the family Dysderidae .
Brachythemis fuscopalliata , the dark - winged groundling , is a species of dragonfly in the family Libellulidae .
Boechera constancei is a species of flowering plant in the mustard family known by the common name Constance 's rockcress .
Shorea gibbosa ( also called Yellow Meranti ) is a large emergent rainforest tree species in the Dipterocarpaceae family .
Antidesma puncticulatum , known as Mao Luang , is a species of plant in the Phyllanthaceae family .
Platanthera nivea , commonly called the snowy orchid , is a species of orchid native to the Southeastern United States .
Crataegus apiifolia is a name sometimes used for some species of hawthorns .
Myrmecotypus is a spider genus that mimics ants .
Galeandra minax is a species of orchid native to Brazil and Venezuela .
Calamiana illota is a species of goby native to marine , brackish and fresh waters of Singapore , Thailand , Brunei and the Philippines .
Chlamydophila pneumoniae is a species of Chlamydophila , an obligate intracellular bacterium that infects humans and is a major cause of pneumonia .
Asterorhombus is a genus of lefteye flounders native to the Indo - Pacific .
Philometra Costa , 1845 is a genus of nematode , a parasite of marine and freshwater fishes .
Verticordia verticordina is a species of flowering plant in the Myrtaceae family .
Aphthona czwalinae is a species of leaf beetle known as the black leafy spurge flea beetle .
Pronesopupa orycta is a species of small air - breathing land snail , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Pupillidae .
Lupinus arcticus is a species of flowering plant in the legume family known by the common name Arctic lupine .
Deherainia is a genus of plants in the Theophrastaceae family , endemic to Central America .
Meiacanthus fraseri is a species of combtooth blenny found in the western Indian ocean , around Cargados Carajos .
Triplophysa laterimaculata is a species of stone loach endemic to the Tarim Basin , Xinjiang .
The network wobbegong ( Orectolobus reticulatus ) is a recently described species of carpet shark found in relatively shallow waters off Kimberley and Darwin in north - western Australia .
Drymoana blanchardi is a species of sedge moths in the genus Drymoana .
Allium acutiflorum is a plant species in the amaryllis family native to northwestern Italy ( Liguria ) and to southeastern France ( including Corsica ) .
Eresus is a genus of velvet spiders comprising several species .
Paramicrodon is a genus of hoverflies , with eight known species .
Fusiturris undatiruga , common name the wrinkled turrid , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Clavatulidae .
The Tanzanian cheetah ( Acinonyx jubatus raineyii syn . Acinonyx jubatus fearsoni ) , also commonly known as East African cheetah or Kenyan cheetah , is a subspecies of cheetah native to East Africa .
Eccritotarsus is a genus of Miridae .
Minotaurasaurus is a genus of ankylosaurine ankylosaurid dinosaur that lived during the Late Cretaceous .
Sinogastromyzon is a genus of hillstream loaches native to eastern Asia .
Longimactra elongata is a species of large bivalve mollusc in the family Mactridae .
Metalectra tantillus , the Black Fungus Moth , is a species of moth of the Erebidae family .
The Trachypachidae ( or sometimes false ground beetles ) are a family of beetles that generally resemble small ground beetles , but that are distinguished by the large coxae of their rearmost legs .
The species was formally described in 1810 by Scottish botanist Robert Brown The widely cultivated variety known as Hemiandra pungens var . glabra is currently classified under the species name Hemiandra glabra and considered a mere synonym of the nominal species .
Thesprotia brevis is a species of praying mantis found in Paraguay .
Margarites helicinus , common name the helicina margarite or spiral margarite , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Margaritidae .
Anaphe stellata is a species of moth in the family Notodontidae .
Prosellodrilus amplisetosus is a species of earthworm native to Aquitaine in south - western France ; it has also been introduced to a site in County Louth , Ireland .
Askellia is a genus of Asian and North American plants in the dandelion tribe within the sunflower family .
Protobranchia is a subclass of bivalve molluscs .
Astele subcarinata , common name the subcarinate top shell , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Calliostomatidae .
Fayodia is a genus of fungi in the Tricholomataceae family , and the type species of the genus Fayodia .
It contains only one species , Lithopolia confusa , which is found in Taiwan .
Potangaspis is an extinct genus of placoderm fish which existed in China during the Devonian period .
Hoplophthiracarus is a genus of mites in the family Steganacaridae .
Salvia pauciserrata is a variable and widely distributed species of Salvia native to Peru , north to Venezuela and Costa Rica .
The ' Braeburn ' is a cultivar of apple that is firm to the touch with a red / orange vertical streaky appearance on a yellow / green background .
Hibbertia cistiflora , commonly known as Rock Rose Guinea - flower , is a shrub species that is native to eastern Australia .
Logfia is a genus of herbaceous plants in the cudweed tribe of the sunflower family , known as the field cottonrose .
Amegilla dawsoni , sometimes called the Dawson 's burrowing bee is a species of bee that nests by the thousands in arid claypans in Western Australia .
Rana zhengi is a species of frog in the Ranidae family that is endemic to Sichuan , China .
Atrax is a genus of venomous spiders found in Australasia .
Epeoloides pilosulus is one of only two species in the bee genus Epeoloides ; it is cleptoparasitic in the nests of melittid bees of the genus Macropis .
Micropera utriculosa is a species of orchid in the genus Micropera first described by Oakes Ames in 1915 under the name Camarotis utriculosa .
Mytilopsis leucophaeata is a species of small bivalve mollusc in the false mussel family , Dreissenidae .
Euxanthe is a genus of butterflies in the subfamily Charaxinae .
The San Quintin kangaroo rat ( Dipodomys gravipes ) is a species of rodent in the family Heteromyidae .
Ischyromys is an extinct genus of rodent from North America .
Strumigenys trada is a species of ant that was discovered and described by Lin , C. C. & Wu , W. J. in 1996 .
Agoseris apargioides is a species in the sunflower family , is commonly called seaside agoseris or seaside false - dandelion .
Eleutherodactylus montanus is a species of frog in the Eleutherodactylidae family endemic to the Cordillera Central , Dominican Republic , at elevations of 1,270 - -2,424 m ( 4,167 - -7,953 ft ) asl .
The Ariidae or ariid catfish are a family of catfish that mainly live in marine waters with many freshwater and brackish water species .
Oliva caroliniana , common name the carolinian olive shell , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Olividae , the olives .
Stenolemus bituberus is a species of thread - legged insect ( Emesinae ) found across much of Australia .
Tabernaemontana muricata is a species of plant in the Apocynaceae family .
Gondwanothrix halsei is a species of small crustaceans ( ca . 1.0 - -1.3 millimetres or 0.039 - -0.051 inches ) within the order Cladocera , in the suborder Anomopoda , placed in its own family , Gondwanotrichidae .
Quercus aucheri is a species of oak tree in the Fagaceae family .
Eriogonum gracile is a species of wild buckwheat known by the common name slender woolly buckwheat .
Agonoscelis is a genus of stink bugs that are native to the Afrotropics and Australia , but one species is established in the New World .
While the Mississippi kite is not an endangered species , it is protected under the Migratory Bird Treaty Act of 1918 , which protects the birds , their eggs , and their nests ( occupied or empty ) from being moved or tampered with without the proper permits .
Konosirus punctatus is a species of fish in the family Clupeidae , the herrings and sardines .
Arthritica crassiformis is a species of small marine bivalve mollusc in the family Lasaeidae .
Echinothrix calamaris , known commonly as the banded sea urchin or double spined urchin among other vernacular names , is a species of sea urchin in the family Diadematidae .
Chiloglanis normani is a species of upside - down catfish endemic to Côte d'Ivoire where it occurs in the Cavally River system .
Bahiopsis parishii known commonly as Parish goldeneye or shrubby goldeneye , is a North American species of flowering shrubs in the sunflower family .
Corsochelys is an extinct genus of sea turtle that lived in the Late Cretaceous ( Campanian ) .
Praenuculidae is an extinct family of prehistoric bivalves in the superfamily Nuculoidea .
Nemopoda nitidula is a European species of fly and member of the family Sepsidae .
Chlorociboria is a genus of fungi within the subphylum Pezizomycetes .
Notoacmea subtilis is a minute species of sea snail or true limpet , a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Lottiidae , one of the families of true limpets .
Xanthoparmelia pokomyi is a lichen species in the genus Xanthoparmelia .
Aegialia concinna is a species of beetle in family Scarabaeidae .
Phycodnaviridae is a family of large ( 100 - 560 kb ) double stranded DNA viruses that infect marine or freshwater eukaryotic algae .
The Micropholcommatidae are a family of araneomorph spiders with about 66 described species in 19 genera .
The Ngandong tiger ( Panthera tigris soloensis ) , is an extinct subspecies of tiger which lived in what is now the Sundaland region of Indonesia in the Pleistocene epoch .
Piratosaurus is a genus of plesiosaur , a type of marine reptile .
Neololeba is a tropical Asian , Australian , and Papuasian genus of bamboos in the grass family .
Bathornithidae is an extinct family of birds from the Eocene to Miocene of North America .
The genus is named for the first chancellor of the German Empire Otto von Bismarck and the epithet for its only species , Bismarckia nobilis , comes from Latin for ' noble ' .
Triplocephalum is a genus of flowering plants in the Inuleae tribe within the daisy family .
Encalypta is a genus of moss in the family Encalyptaceae ; commonly known as `` extinguisher moss '' .
Stenotus lanuginosus is a species of flowering plant in the aster family known by the common names woolly mock goldenweed and woolly stenotus .
Bathyergoides is an extinct genus of rodent from Africa thought to be related to the modern blesmols .
Saussurea is a genus of about 300 species of flowering plants in the thistle tribe within the daisy family , native to cool temperate and arctic regions of Asia , Europe , and North America , with the highest diversity in alpine habitats in the Himalaya and central Asia .
Vinca major , with the common names bigleaf periwinkle , large periwinkle , greater periwinkle and blue periwinkle , is species of flowering plant in the family Apocynaceae , native to the western Mediterranean .
Conus nobilis , common name the noble cone , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Conidae , the cone snails and their allies .
Afrocarpus gaussenii is a species of conifer in the Podocarpaceae family .
Sorbus thibetica ( Tibetan whitebeam ) is a species of flowering plant in the family Rosaceae , native to south western China and the Himalayas .
Daphnephila truncicola is a species of gall midge first associated with stem galls on Lauraceae species , particularly Machilus thunbergii in Taiwan .
Polyrhachis exercita is a species of ant in the subfamily Formicinae , found in India , Sri Lanka , Bangladesh .
The black - headed lizard , Liolaemus nigriceps , is a species of lizard in the Iguanidae family .
Chrysosplenium wrightii , the Bering Sea Water - carpet , is a plant species native to northwestern North America and northeastern Asia .
Eriochloa contracta is a species of grass known by the common name prairie cupgrass .
Volkameria is a genus of flowering plants in the family ;
The Portulacaceae are a family of flowering plants , comprising about 20 genera with about 500 species , ranging from herbaceous plants to shrubs .
Klarobelia megalocarpa is a species of flowering plants in the family Annonaceae .
Acantholycosa dudkorum is a species of wolf spider only known from the south - central Altai Mountains in Russia .
Arizona mantis is a common name applied to various species of praying mantis native to Arizona , particularly :
Cicadomorpha is an infraorder of the insect order Hemiptera which contains the cicadas , leafhoppers , treehoppers , and spittlebugs .
Adenocarpus decorticans also known as Silver broom , is a species of flowering plant in the Faboideae subfamily which is endemic to Sierra Nevada mountains , in Spain .
Naarda is a genus of moths containing 31 species .
Plagiomnium affine , the many - fruited thyme - moss , is a species of thyme - moss found in old - growth boreal forests in North America , Europe and Asia , growing in moist , but not wet , basic to slightly acidic micro - habitats in woodland and in turf .
Doellingeria infirma is listed as an endangered species by the state of Massachusetts .
Syzygium malaccense is a species of flowering tree native to Malaysia , Indonesia ( Sumatra and Java ) Vietnam , Thailand , New Guinea and Australia .
Delphinium parryi is a species of larkspur known by the common names San Bernardino larkspur and Parry 's larkspur .
Cteniloricaria platystoma is a species of armored catfish endemic to Suriname .
Oxyrhopus is a genus of colubrid snakes that belong to the subfamily Xenodontinae .
The Large - flowered Cypripedium ( Cypripedium macranthos ) is a species of orchid .
The Cheritrini are a small tribe of butterflies in the family Lycaenidae ; they contain the imperials and allies .
Eleocharis montevidensis is a species of spikesedge known by the common name sand spikerush .
Dichanthelium hirstii is a species of grass known by the common name Hirst 's panic grass .
Sphodromantis gracilis is a species of praying mantis found in Gabon , Ghana , Guinea , Nigeria , Senegal , and Central African Republic .
Viverridae is a family of small to medium - sized mammals , the viverrids ( /vaɪˈvɛrɪdz/ ) , comprising 15 genera , which are subdivided into 38 species .
Alamitornis is an extinct genus of basal ornithuromorph bird , possible within the family Patagopterygidae .
Mussaenda villosa is a species of flowering shrub in the Rubiaceae family .
Holaspis is a genus of equatorial african lacertids in the family Lacertidae .
Polygala is a large genus of flowering plants belonging to the family Polygalaceae .
Clathrina angraensis is a species of the genus Clathrina from Brazil .
Aspidites ramsayi , commonly known as Ramsay 's python , woma python , and sand python , is a species of snake endemic to Australia .
It contains only one species , Mantua fulvosericea , which is endemic to Kauai , Oahu , Molokai and Lanai .
Graneledone yamana is a species of octopus in the genus Graneledone .
Vitis silvestrii ( known locally as hu bei pu tao , which means Hubei grape ) is a species of polygamo - dioecious plant in the grape family native to the forested slopes of western Hubei and southern Shaanxi in China from 300 to 1200 meters above sea level .
Macrosemiiformes is an extinct order of bony fish with one family , Macrosemiidae .
Floracarus perrepae is a species of herbivorous mite belonging to the family Eriophyidae , native to Queensland , Australia .
Fritillaria glauca is a species of fritillary known by the common names Siskiyou fritillary and Siskiyou missionbells .
Clathrina sinusarabica is a species of calcareous sponge in the genus Clathrina from Egypt .
Gagea amblyopetala is an Eurasianan species of plants in the lily family , native to Greece , Turkey , Italy , Albania , Yugoslavia , Crimea , Moldova , and Ukraine .
Maja capensis , the Agulhas spider crab , is a species of crab in the family Majidae .
Fritillaria unibracteata is an Asian species of herbaceous plant in the lily family , native to Gansu , Qinghai , Sichuan Provinces in China .
Parazoanthus swiftii , commonly known as the golden zoanthid , is a species of coral in the order Zoantharia which grows symbiotically on several species of sponge .
Aptinus is a genus of ground beetle native to Europe and the Near East .
Carex athrostachya is a species of sedge known by the common name slenderbeak sedge .
Barasaurus is an extinct genus of owenettid procolophonoid parareptile known from the late Late Permian and early Early Triassic of Madagascar .
Borojevia paracerebrum is a species of calcareous sponge in the genus Borojevia from Mexico .
Ceropegia is a genus of plants within the family Apocynaceae , native to Africa , southern Asia , and Australia .
Corallina is a genus of red seaweeds with hard , abrasive calcareous skeletons in the family Corallinaceae .
Pereskia quisqueyana , commonly known as the Bayahibe Rose , is a species of cactus that is endemic to the Dominican Republic .
Kalamantania whiteheadi is a species of air - breathing land snail , terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusks in the family Dyakiidae .
Galinsoga caligensis is a Peruvian species of flowering plant in the daisy family .
Acanthemblemaria exilispinus , the Bluntspine blenny , is a species of chaenopsid blenny found in coral reefs from Costa Rica to Ecuador , in the eastern central Pacific ocean .
Andinobates claudiae ( synonyms Dendrobates claudiae , Ranitomeya claudiae ) is a species of frog in the Dendrobatidae family .
Heliodiaptomus kolleruensis is a species of copepod in the family Diaptomidae .
Stephanorrhina julia is a species of beetles belonging to the Scarabaeidae family , Cetoniinae subfamily , tribe Goliathini .
