The only species that is a member of this genus is Aglaodorum griffithii .
Ranunculus occidentalis , the western buttercup , is a species of buttercup found in the western United States and Canada .
Liljeborgiidae is a family of amphipods , containing the following genera :
Microchrysa polita , the black - horned gem , is a European species of soldier fly .
Mimatybe pauliani is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Mimatybe .
Colletes elegans a species of ground - nesting bee in the genus Colletes , which is found in Israel .
Suaeda taxifolia is a species of flowering plant in the amaranth family known by the common name woolly seablite .
Graphipterus serrator is a species of beetles in the family Carabidae .
Acacia ligulata is a species of Acacia , a dense shrub widespread in all states of mainland Australia .
Pygopleurus hirsutus is a species of beetle from the Glaphyridae family .
Rhus virens is a species of flowering plant in the mango family , Anacardiaceae , that is native to Arizona , southern New Mexico , and Texas in the United States as well as northern and central Mexico as far south as Oaxaca .
Agyneta equestris is a species of sheet weaver found in Central Europe and Ukraine .
Bellemerea is a genus of lichens in the family Lecideaceae .
The Montane African climbing mouse or remarkable climbing mouse ( Dendromus insignis ) is a species of rodent in the family Nesomyidae .
Galeomorphii is a superorder of cartilaginous fishes which includes all modern sharks except the dogfish and its relatives .
Favonius orientalis is an East Palearctic species of hairstreak butterfly found in China , Amur , Ussuri , Kunashir , Japan , and Korea .
Chironius is a genus of New World colubrid snakes , commonly called sipos ( from the Portuguese word cipó for liana ) , savanes , or sometimes vine snakes .
Pantanodon is a genus of poeciliids native to East Africa and Madagascar .
Chaetocnema hortensis is a species of flea beetle from Chrysomelidae family .
Ecsenius bathi , known commonly as the Bath 's comb - tooth , is a species of combtooth blenny found in coral reefs in the western central Pacific ocean .
Emarginula crassa , the thick slit limpet , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fissurellidae , the keyhole limpets .
Poa siphonoglossa is a rare species of grass known by the common names Kauai bluegrass and island bluegrass .
Leucothoe fontanesiana , the highland doghobble , fetter - bush , mountain doghobble or switch ivy , is a species of flowering plant in the family Ericaceae , native to the southeastern United States .
Craugastor yucatanensis , also known as the Yucatan robber frog or Yucatan rainfrog , is a species of frog in the Craugastoridae family .
Streptomyces coeruleofuscus is a bacterium species from the genus of Streptomyces which has been isolated from soil ind Daghestan .
Sandhill Milkweed ( Asclepias humistrata ) is a species of milkweed plant .
Rhamphochromis ferox is a species of piscivorous cichlid endemic to deep waters of Lake Malawi and the upper reaches of the Shire River .
Pterolonchidae is a small family of moths in the superfamily Gelechioidea .
Camellia reticulata ( syn . C. heterophylla ) is a species of Camellia native to southwestern China , in Yunnan Province .
Brachioteuthis is a genus of squid comprising five species .
Tinkerbella is a genus of fairy wasps , containing the single species T. nana from Costa Rica .
Hauerinidae is a large and diverse family of miliolid forams ( Loeblich & Tappan , 1988 ) that includes genera distributed among various subfamilies in the Treatise ( Loelich & Tappan 1964 ) as well as genera named and described since .
Batocera boisduvali , the Great Fig Tree Borer , is a species of flat - faced longhorns beetle belonging to the Cerambycidae family , Lamiinae subfamily .
Oroya aurora is a moth in the Dalceridae family , and the only species in the genus Oroya .
Thymus herba - barona is a species of thyme native to Corsica , Sardinia , and Majorca .
Citharoides is a genus of citharid flounders native to the Indian and West Pacific Oceans .
Istiodactylidae is a small family of pterosaurs .
Shaw Mayer 's water rat ( Baiyankamys shawmayeri ) is a species of rodent in the family Muridae .
Anabarilius macrolepis was a species of ray - finned fish in the genus Anabarilius that was endemic to Yilong Lake .
Rosa davidii also known as Father David 's rose , is a rose species in the Rosaceae family , originating from western to central China and South - East Tibet in altitudes between 1600 and 3000 m above sea level .
Micranthes is a genus of flowering plants in the saxifrage family .
Pheidole purpurea is a dimorphic species of ant found in Mexico and Central America .
Darwinia glaucophylla is a plant species that is endemic to the Gosford area in the Australian state of New South Wales .
Malus sublobata is the botanical name for the yellow autumn crabapple , it is a species of the genus malus in the family Rosaceae , native to Japan .
Thorius schmidti ( common name : Schmidt 's pigmy salamander ) is a species of salamander in the family Plethodontidae .
Plagiobothrys canescens is a species of flowering plant in the borage family known by the common name valley popcornflower .
Lampranthus roseus , the rosy dewplant , is an evergreen species of flowering succulent plant in the Aizoaceae family .
Papilio chitondensis is a species of swallowtail butterfly from the genus Papilio that is found in Angola .
Phacelia cryptantha is a species of flowering plant in the borage family , Boraginaceae , known by the common name hiddenflower phacelia .
The Empire Cave Pseudoscorpion ( Fissilicreagris imperialis ) is a species of arachnid in family Neobisiidae .
Grindelia lanceolata is a species of flowering plant in the aster family known by the common name Narrowleaf gumweed .
Gabanellia is an extinct genus of bony fish from the Late Triassic .
Vesperus jertensis is a species of brown coloured beetle in the Vesperidae family that is endemic to Spain .
Puccinia mariae - wilsoniae , commonly known as the spring beauty rust , is a species of rust fungus found in North America .
The genus Monobaatar ( Kielan - Jaworowska , Dashzeveg & Trofimov , 1987 ) is known from the species Monobaatar mimicus , which itself is very poorly known .
Cyathea apiculata is a species of tree fern native to Sumatra , where it grows in montane rain forest at an altitude of about 1800 m. The trunk is erect and usually 5 m tall or more .
Pouteria villamilii ( also called White Nato ) is a species of plant in the Sapotaceae family .
Astragalus pycnostachyus is a species of milkvetch known by the common name marsh milkvetch .
Potamogeton gramineus is a species of aquatic plant known by the common name various - leaved pondweed , variableleaf pondweed , grass - leaved pondweed or grassy pondweed , native to the northern hemisphere where it grows in shallow , clean water .
Parcoblatta fulvescens , the fulvous wood cockroach , is a species of cockroach endemic to the United States and possibly Canada that measures around 13 mm ( 0.5 in ) long .
Astyris rosacea , common name the rosy northern dovesnail , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Columbellidae , the dove snails .
Zyzzyx is a monospecific genus of sand wasp , containing a brightly colored , medium - sized species , Z. chilensis .
Pericasta virescens is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Pericasta .
Craspedopomatidae is a family of very small land snails with a gill and an operculum , terrestrial gastropod mollusks in the informal group Architaenioglossa belonging to the clade Caenogastropoda ( according to the taxonomy of the Gastropoda by Bouchet & Rocroi , 2005 ) .
Eugnathogobius siamensis is a species of goby .
Dichotomanthes is a monotypic genus of flowering plants belonging to the family Rosaceae .
Lysapsus limellum , sometimes known as the Uruguay harlequin frog , is a species of frog in the Hylidae family found in northern Argentina , Bolivia , Brazil , Paraguay , and Uruguay .
Senecio spartioides is a species of flowering plant in the aster family known by the common name broom - like ragwort .
Rosa blanda , commonly known as the smooth rose , meadow / wild rose , or prairie rose , is a species of rose native to North America .
Penicillium soppii is a psychrotolerant species of the genus of Penicillium which produces cycloaspeptide A.
Nature writer David Quammen has called Argiope appensa `` almost certainly one of the larger species '' which were encountered in vast numbers during his research trip to Guam for the book The Song of the Dodo .
Scissor macrocephalus is a species of characin endemic to Suriname .
Tegenaria abchasica is a spider species found in Russia and Georgia .
Trinacromerum is an extinct genus of sauropterygian reptile belonging to the plesiosaur suborder .
Moray eels or Muraenidae are a family of cosmopolitan eels .
Ardeadoris angustolutea is a species of colourful sea slug , a dorid nudibranch , a shell - less marine gastropod mollusc in the family Chromodorididae .
Onychognathus is a genus of starlings , most of which are found in Africa .
Cerbera is a genus of evergreen small trees or shrubs , native to tropical Asia , Australia , Madagascar , and various islands in the Indian Ocean and the western Pacific Ocean .
Echinodorus emersus is a species of plant in the Alismataceae from South America .
The Cerambyx cerdo , commonly known as great capricorn beetle , is a species of beetle in family Cerambycidae .
Thrichocalydon havrylenkoi is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , the only species in the genus Thrichocalydon .
Psilocybe germanica is a species of psychedelic mushroom in the family Strophariaceae .
Parapeba lyciformis is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Parapeba .
Coccoloba diversifolia , commonly known as pigeonplum , doveplum , pigeon Seagrape or tietongue , is a species of the genus Coccoloba native to coastal areas of the Caribbean , Central America ( Belize , Guatemala ) , southern Mexico , southern Florida ( coastal regions from Cape Canaveral to the Florida Keys ) and The Bahamas .
Pseudepipona is a genus of potter wasps found in the Palearctic , Nearctic , Afrotropical and Australian regions .
Leiopelma auroraensis , known as the Aurora frog , is an extinct species of frog that was found in New Zealand .
In terms of the species itself , Austrolestes colensonis is the largest damselfly in New Zealand , with an average length of 40 to 47 millimeters .
Euconulus fulvus is a species of very small , air - breathing land snail , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Euconulidae , the hive snails .
Chromodoris tenuis is a species of colorful sea slug , a marine gastropod mollusk , a nudibranch in the family Chromodorididae .
Enterococcus avium , a species of Enterococcus , is most commonly found in birds .
It is the sole species of the genus Gomortega and , according to the APG II system of 2003 ( unchanged from the APG system of 1998 ) , of the monotypic family Gomortegaceae , assigned to the order Laurales in the clade magnoliids .
Phacelia inyoensis , the common name Inyo phacelia , is an uncommon species of phacelia .
Protitanichthys is a genus of comparatively large coccosteid arthrodire placoderm from the Middle Devonian of the eastern United States .
The spider species Plebs eburnus is commonly referred to as the Eastern Grass Orb - weaver or the Eastern Bush Orb - weaver , and sometimes more simply the Bush Orb - weaver .
Uroleptus lamella is a species of protozoans .
Pandanus is a genus of monocots with some 750 accepted species .
Jatropha integerrima , commonly known as Peregrina or Spicy Jatropha , is a species of flowering plant in the spurge family , Euphorbiaceae , that is native to Cuba and Hispaniola .
Lewisia longipetala is a rare species of flowering plant in the purslane family known by the common names long - petalled lewisia and Truckee lewisia .
Athous haemorrhoidalis is a species of European and Asian click beetle in the genus Athous .
The Buccinidae are a very large and diverse taxonomic family of large sea snails , often known as whelks or true whelks .
Aploactis aspera , the Dusky Velvetfish , is a species of velvetfish native to the western Pacific Ocean .
Calliprason elegans is a longhorn beetle species in the genus Calliprason .
Heteroponera imbellis is a species of ant , in the genus Heteroponera .
Oecomys phaeotis , also known as the dusky arboreal rice rat or dusky oecomys , is a species of rodent in the genus Oecomys of family Cricetidae .
Tilapia busumana is a species of cichlid native to Lake Bosumtwi , the Bia River Basin , the Pra River Basin and the Tano River Basin in Ghana and Côte d'Ivoire .
Spirobolellus simplex is a species of millipede in the family Spirobolidae .
Argyrotaenia kimballi , Kimball 's Leafroller Moth , is a species of moth of the Tortricidae family .
Matsuichthys aequipinnis is a species of tubeshoulder found only in the Sulu Sea .
Acacia cincinnata , also known as the Daintree wattle , is a species of leguminous trees of the plant family Fabaceae , found naturally in north eastern Queensland .
Arctagrostis is a genus of Arctic and Subarctic plants in the grass family , native to colder parts of Europe , Asia , and North America .
Mentzelia albicaulis is a species of flowering plants in the family Loasaceae known by the common name whitestem blazing star , small flowered blazing star , white stemmed stickleaf .
Mordellistena pontica is a species of beetle in the Mordellistena genus and is in the Mordellidae family .
Apocleinae are a subfamily of assassin fly .
It is so distinct from other species that it was placed in its own genus , Irenomys , in 1919 .
This is a monotypic genus , containing the single species Ascosorus floridanus .
The Niceforo 's wren ( Thryophilus nicefori ) is a species of bird in the Troglodytidae family .
Gephyrostegus is an extinct genus of gephyrostegid reptiliomorph amphibian .
Antennaria corymbosa is a North American species of flowering plants in the daisy family known by the common name flat - top pussytoes or meadow pussytoes .
Penicillium herquei is an anamorph , filamentous species of the genus of Penicillium which produces citreorosein , emodin , hualyzin , herquline B , janthinone , citrinin and duclauxin , .
Conchapelopia seoulpia is a species of fly belonging to the family Chironomidae ( the non - biting midges ) .
Tomistominae is a subfamily of crocodylians that includes one living species , the false gharial .
Euperipatoides kanangrensis is a species of velvet worm of the Peripatopsidae family , described in 1996 from specimens collected in Kanangra - Boyd National Park , New South Wales .
Plagiolirion is a genus of Colombian plants in the Amaryllis family .
Parmenopsis caucasica is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Parmenopsis .
Isodendrion pyrifolium is a rare species of flowering plant in the violet family known by the common name wahine noho kula .
Isophyllia sinuosa , the sinuous cactus coral , is a species of stony coral in the family Mussidae .
Cheilotheca is a small genus of myco - heterotrophic plants in the heath family ( Ericaceae ) .
Zinowiewia costaricensis is a species of tree in the Celastraceae family .
Anthelia glauca , the giant anthelia , is a species of soft coral in the family Xeniidae .
Velocipes ( meaning `` quick foot '' ) is a possible theropod dinosaur genus from the Late Triassic .
Empetrum nigrum , crowberry , black crowberry , or , in western Alaska , blackberry , is a flowering plant species in the heather family Ericaceae with a circumboreal distribution .
This is a monotypic genus , containing the single species Chondroderris nevadensis .
Pelagic pipefish , Syngnathus phlegon , is a pipefish species , inhabits the Mediterranean Sea and closed part of the Atlantic Ocean .
Penicillium polonicum is a species of the genus of Penicillium which produces penicillic acid , verucosidin , patulin , anacine , 3-methoxyviridicatin and glycopeptides .
Boltonia asteroides , the white doll 's daisy , false chamomile , or false aster , is a species of plant native to the United States and Canada .
Sphaeroma is a genus of aquatic isopod crustaceans , part of the family Sphaeromatidae .
Nucula is a genus of very small saltwater clams .
Mimohippopsis inaequalis is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Mimohippopsis .
Adesmia balsamica is a rare species of flowering plant in the legume family , Fabaceae .
Genista canariensis is a species of broom known by the common name Canary broom , or Canary Islands broom .
The Aulacidae are a small , cosmopolitan family , with two extant genera containing some 200 known species .
Orthalicus reses , common name the Stock Island , Florida tree snail , is a species of large tropical air - breathing land snail , a tree snail , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Orthalicidae .
Mycalesis perseoides is a species of Satyrine butterfly ( family Nymphalidae ) found in Asia ( Burma , Thailand , Langkawi Island , Peninsular Malaya , Indochina , Yunnan )
Cochliobolus lunatus is the most commonly reported species in clinical cases of reported Cochliobolus infection .
Diglossopis was a genus of blue flowerpiercers in the family Thraupidae .
Cliona californiana is a species of demosponge belonging the family Clionaidae .
Lamellaria ophione is a species of small , slug - like sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Velutinidae .
Sturisoma robustum is a species of armored catfish native to the La Plata Basin of Argentina , Brazil and Paraguay .
Piptocoma , common name velvetshrub , is a genus of Caribbean and Latin American plants in the evil tribe within the daisy family .
Geissorhiza is a genus of about 80 species of deciduous perennial flowering plants in the iris family first described as a genus in 1803 .
Cerastoderma glaucum , commonly known as the lagoon cockle , is a species of saltwater clam , a marine bivalve mollusc in the family Cardiidae , the cockles .
Archaeamphora longicervia is an extinct species of flowering plant and the only member of the genus Archaeamphora .
Lecanicillium muscarium is the approved name of an entomopathogenic fungus species , that was previously widely known as Verticillium lecanii ( Zimmerman ) Viegas ) , but is now understood to be an anamorphic form in the Cordyceps group of genera in the Cordycipitaceae .
Symphoricarpos guadalupensis , McKittrock 's snowberry , is a rare North American species of plants in the honeysuckle family .
Cheiracanthium punctorium , one of several species commonly known as the yellow sac spider , is a spider found from central Europe to Central Asia .
Cupressus lusitanica , ( cedro blanco ; teotlate , distinctive names used in Mexico ) ; cedro blanco means white cedar and is also known as Mexican white cedar or cedar - of - Goa , is a species of cypress native to Mexico and Central America ( Guatemala , El Salvador and Honduras ) .
Luchuena hachijoensis is a species of air - breathing land snails , terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusks in the family Enidae .
Pseudomunida fragilis is a species of squat lobster in a monotypic genus in the family Chirostylidae .
Qianxisaurus is an extinct genus of pachypleurosaur or alternatively a basal eosauropterygian known from the Middle Triassic ( Ladinian age ) of Guizhou Province , southwestern China .
Laminaria is a genus of 31 species of brown algae commonly called `` kelp '' .
Listerella paradoxa is a slime mould species from the subclass Myxogastria and the only member of its genus as well as the family Listerelliidae .
Ochrobactrum oryzae is an endophytic bacterial species .
Cycloloma is a monotypic genus which contains the sole species Cycloloma atriplicifolium , which is known by the common names winged pigweed , tumble ringwing , plains tumbleweed , and tumble - weed .
Balanophyllia is a genus of solitary corals in the family of stony corals .
The Sphaerosepalaceae are a family of flowering plants including 14 species of trees and shrubs in two genera , Dialyceras and Rhopalocarpus , all of which are endemic to Madagascar .
Spironemidae is a family of heterotrophic flagellates .
Choristoneura parallela , the parallel - banded leafroller moth , is a species of moth of the Tortricidae family .
Arabis serotina is a rare species of flowering plant in the mustard family known by the common name shale barren rockcress .
Psarolepis ( /sæˈrɒlɨpɨs/ ; psārolepis , from Greek ψαρός ' speckled ' and λεπίς ' scale ' ) is a genus of extinct lobe - finned fish which lived around 397 to 418 million years ago ( Pridoli to Lochkovian stages ) .
Campylomormyrus is a genus of elephantfish , one of twenty in the family Mormyridae .
Cytora ampla is a species of small land snail with an operculum , a terrestrial gastropod mollusc in the family Pupinidae .
Stanhopea candida is a species of orchid endemic to southern tropical America ( Bolivia , Brazil , Colombia , Ecuador , Peru and Venezuela ) .
Helenium flexuosum is a North American plant species in the daisy family known by the common name purple sneezeweed .
Eriogonum siskiyouense is a rare species of wild buckwheat known by the common name Siskiyou buckwheat .
Pterotragula leucoloma is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Pterotragula .
Danthonioideae is a mainly southern hemisphere subfamily of grasses , containing the single tribe Danthonieae and three unplaced genera , with altogether roughly 300 species .
Aspidiotus is a genus of armoured scale insects .
Astragalus gilmanii is a species of milkvetch known by the common name Gilman 's milkvetch .
Anastrangalia sanguinolenta is a species of flower longhorn beetles belonging to the family Cerambycidae , subfamily Lepturinae .
Grevillea juncifolia , commonly known as Honeysuckle Grevillea , is a shrub or small tree species that is native to inland Australia .
Pseudunela cornuta is a species of minute sea slug , an acochlidian , a shell - less marine and temporarily brackish gastropod mollusk in the family Pseudunelidae .
Nassarius glans , common name the acorn dog whelk , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Nassariidae , the Nassa mud snails or dog whelks .
Brickellia baccharidea ( resinleaf brickellbush ) is a North American species of shrubs in the sunflower family .
De Brazza 's monkey is a sexually dimorphic species ; males weigh around 7 kilograms , while females weigh around 4 kilograms .
Cardamine breweri is a species of cardamine known by the common name Brewer 's bittercress .
Correa reflexa var . nummulariifolia , also known as Roundleaf Correa , is a variety of Correa reflexa endemic to Tasmania in Australia .
Diandrochloa is a genus of plants in the family Poaceae .
Eriodictyon trichocalyx is a species of flowering plant in the borage family known by the common name hairy yerba santa .
It is a monotypic genus , containing the single species Pegleromyces collybioides , found in Brazil and described as new to science by mycologist Rolf Singer in 1981 .
Rhaphischismatidae is an extinct family of fossil sea snails , marine gastropod mollusks in the superorder Vetigastropoda .
Alcidodes porosus is a species of beetle belonging to the true weevil family .
Huntoniatonia is genus of trilobites , an extinct group of marine arthropods of average to large size ( up to 15 cm long ) .
Neofreocorus novaki is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Neofreocorus .
Chamaebryum is a genus of moss in the family Gigaspermaceae ; it contains the single species Chamaebryum pottioides .
Dolomena plicata , common name the pigeon conch , is a species of medium - sized to large sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Strombidae , the true conchs .
Grevillea buxifolia , commonly known as the grey spider flower , is a species of the family Proteaceae .
Leptotyphlops rostratus , or Bocage 's blind snake , is a species of snake in the Leptotyphlopidae family .
The family Peramuridae is a possible ancestor of early therians .
Chrysosplenium iowense is a species of flowering plant in the saxifrage family known by the common name Iowa golden - saxifrage .
It contains only one species , Brasiliopuntia brasiliensis .
Persicaria bistorta ( bistort , common bistort , or meadow bistort ) is a species of flowering plant native to Europe and north and west Asia .
Valeriana alypifolia is a species of plant in the family Caprifoliaceae .
Penicillium commune is a fungus species of the genus of Penicillium which occurs in dry - cured meat products and cheese .
Menticirrhus americanus , the southern kingfish , southern kingcroaker , the king whiting , the Carolina whiting , or the sea mullet , is a species of marine fish in the family Sciaenidae .
Acronia luzonica is a species of beetle in the Cerambycidae family , that can be found in Asia it is endemic to the Philippines .
The Buffalo sculpin , scientific name Enophrys bison , is a species of saltwater fish , a sculpin .
Commonly known as Philippine downy mildew , this disease is caused by the species Peronosclerospora philippinensis of the fungal - like protist class Oomycetes , which also has members such as water molds and Phytophthora infestans , which caused the potato blight that led to the Great Irish famine .
Radinosiphon is a genus of flowering plants in the family Iridaceae first described as a genus in 1932 .
Anisopodus curvipes is a species of beetle in the Cerambycidae family that was described by Martins in 1974 .
Schiedea stellarioides is a rare species of flowering plant in the pink family known by the common name lau lihilihi .
Brasiliothelphusa tapajoensis is a species of freshwater crabs in the family Pseudothelphusidae , and the only species in the genus Brasiliothelphusa .
Cleome rutidosperma commonly known as Fringed Spider Flower or Purple Cleome is a species of flowering plant in the genus Cleome of the family Cleomaceae , native to Tropical Africa .
Nebria turmaduodecima is a species of black coloured ground beetle from Nebriinae subfamily that is endemic to US state of California .
Magyarus is a spider genus of the Salticidae family ( jumping spiders ) with a single species , described from a single male specimen from Vietnam .
Scaphophyllum speciosum is a species of plant in the family Solenostomataceae .
Ranunculus longirostris , the longbeak buttercup , is a plant species of the genus Ranunculus .
Lophiostoma is a genus of fungi in the family Lophiostomataceae .
Strauzia rugosum is a species of tephritid or fruit flies in the genus Strauzia of the family Tephritidae .
Antrodiaetus is a spider genus in the family Antrodiaetidae with species found in the United States and Japan .
Athroostachys is a Brazilian genus of bamboo in the grass family .
Halodule pinifolia is a seagrass species in the genus Halodule .
Frigidorchis is a genus of terrestrial orchids endemic to the Qinghai region of southern China .
Drimia maritima ( syn . Urginea maritima ) is a species of flowering plant in the family Asparagaceae , subfamily Scilloideae ( formerly the family Hyacinthaceae ) .
Psilocybe cyanescens ( sometimes referred to as wavy caps or as the potent Psilocybe ) is a species of potent psychedelic mushroom .
Bullia annulata , common name the annulated plough shell , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Nassariidae , the Nassa mud snails or dog whelks .
Proustia is a genus of flowering plants in the gerbera tribe daisy family , native to South America and the West Indies .
Psychotria poeppigiana is a plant species in the family Rubiaceae ; a common name is sore - mouth bush , though it is not very often used .
Peristrominous dolosus , the Deceitful velvetfish , is a species of velvetfish endemic to the oceans around Australia .
Eresus rotundiceps is a spider species found in Ukraine and Turkmenistan .
Trachischium guentheri , commonly known as the rosebelly worm - eating snake or Günther 's Oriental slender snake , is a species of colubrid snake , which is endemic to Asia .
Hsisosuchus is an extinct genus of crocodyliform from China .
Packera antennariifolia , the shale barren ragwort , is a species of the genus Packera and family Asteraceae .
Chenopodium pratericola is a species of flowering plant in the goosefoot family known by the common name desert goosefoot .
`` The nautiloid cephalopod order Ascocerida in the British Silurian '' .
The Turkestan rat ( Rattus pyctoris ) is a species of rodent in the family Muridae .
Palpopleura portia , the Portia Widow , is a species of dragonfly in the family Libellulidae .
Calliophis intestinalis , commonly known as the banded Malaysian coral snake , is a species of venomous elapid snake endemic to Southeast Asia .
Archezoa was a kingdom proposed by Thomas Cavalier - Smith for eukaryotes that diverged before the origin of mitochondria .
Draco norvillii , also known as Norvill 's flying lizard , is species of agamid flying lizard endemic to India .
Palaemonidae is a family of shrimp in the order Decapoda .
Diplovertebron is an extinct genus of Anthracosauria ( Labyrinthodont ) that lived in the Late Carboniferous period ( Moscovian ) ( 300 million years ago ) .
Arabis kennedyae , the Troodos Rockcress , is a species of flowering plant in the Brassicaceae family .
Enterobacter is a genus of common Gram - negative , facultatively anaerobic , rod - shaped , non - spore - forming bacteria of the family Enterobacteriaceae .
Missulena torbayensis is a species of spider belonging to the family Actinopodidae .
Microsorum scandens , commonly called fragrant fern is a species of fern within the Polypodiaceae family .
Baphetes is an extinct genus of tetrapod .
Bathyraja leucomelanos or domino skate is a species of softnose skate , closely related to Bathyraja spinicauda .
Alsodes kaweshkari is a species of frog in the Alsodidae family endemic to southern Chile where it is known from two localities ( Puerto Edén and Seno Huemules ) .
Nesticella is a genus of spiders that occurs from Russia to Japan , down to Indonesia and several other islands , including New Guinea .
Boletus barragensis is a species of bolete fungus in the family Boletaceae native to Australia .
Masteria is a genus of mygalomorph spiders that occurs in the tropics of Central to South America , Asia and Micronesia , with one species found in Australia .
Tetrachondra is a plant genus and a member of the family Tetrachondraceae .
Carphophis vermis ( common name western worm snake ) is a species of small , nonvenomous colubrid snake native to the United States .
Ruellia is a genus of flowering plants commonly known as ruellias or wild petunias .
Streptomyces malaysiensis is a streptomycete bacterium species .
Ceratophyllidia papilligera ( commonly referred to as the Black Spotted Nudibranch ) is a species of sea slugs , dorid nudibranch , shell - less marine gastropod mollusc in the family Phyllidiidae .
Clupeonella is a genus of fish in the Clupeidae family .
Plioplatecarpinae is a subfamily of mosasaurs , a diverse group of late Cretaceous marine squamates .
Acheilognathus barbatulus is a species of freshwater ray - finned fish in the genus Acheilognathus .
Acartauchenius desertus is a species of sheet weaver found in Kazakhstan .
Fissurella virescens , common name the green Panama keyhole limpet , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fissurellidae , the keyhole limpets and slit limpets .
Artemisia pallens is a preferred food for the larvae of a number of butterfly species .
Melica bonariensis , is a species of grass in the Poaceae family that is endemic to Argentina where it can be found in such provinces as Buenos Aires ( Bahía Blanca ) , La Pampa , and Rio Negro .
Genista tinctoria ( dyer 's greenweed or dyer 's broom ) is a species of flowering plant of the family Fabaceae , native to meadows and pastures in Europe and Turkey .
Thuarea is a genus of plants in the grass family , native to Asia , Africa , Australia , and various islands of the Indian and Pacific Oceans .
Bossiaea walkeri , also known as Cactus Bossiaea or Cactus Pea , is a species of flowering plant in the pea family ( Fabaceae ) .
Parasicydium bandama is a species of goby native to fast - flowing streams and rivers of Middle Africa and the Ivory Coast .
Musa bukensis is a species of wild banana ( genus Musa ) from the Solomon Islands .
Phyllogobius platycephalops , the Slender spongegoby , is a species of goby native to the western Indian Ocean and the western Pacific Ocean where it occurs on reefs at depths of from 2 to 18 metres ( 6.6 to 59.1 ft ) .
The flowering plant genus Ipheion ( starflower , spring starflower ) belongs to Allioideae subfamily of the Amaryllidaceae family .
Geranium pratense , the meadow crane's - bill or meadow geranium , is a species of hardy flowering herbaceous perennial plant in the genus Geranium and family Geraniaceae .
Okenia leachii is a species of sea slug , a Dorid nudibranch , a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Goniodorididae .
Eastmanalepes primaevus is an extinct species of prehistoric jack fish that lived from the Lutetian epoch , of what is now Monte Bolca , Italy .
Dracula vampira is an epiphytic orchid species , endemic to Ecuador .
Icelastatis galerucoides is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Icelastatis .
Chrysoperla lucasina is a species of Neuropteran belonging to the family Chrysopidae ( subfamily Chrysopinae ) .
Arctomecon merriamii is a species of poppy known by several common names , including desert bearpoppy , white bearpoppy , and great bearclaw poppy .
Geminigeraceae is a family of cryptophytes containing the five genera Geminigera , Guillardia , Hanusia , Proteomonas and Teleaulax .
Aponogeton azureus is a species of plant in the Aponogetonaceae family .
Calosoma elegans is a ground beetle species in the genus Calosoma found in Kazakhstan .
Conus crocatus , common name the saffron cone , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Conidae , the cone snails and their allies .
Gwawinapterus is a genus of Mesozoic animal known from a single fossil specimen , representing the single species Gwawinapterus beardi , from the late Cretaceous period of British Columbia , Canada .
Gnophos dumetata , the Irish annulet , is a species of moth in the family Geometridae .
The family Psittacidae is one of three families of true parrots , and consists of two subfamilies , the Old World or Afrotropical parrots of Psittacinae ) and the New World or Neotropical parrots of Arinae .
Emeryopone is a small genus of ants in the subfamily Ponerinae .
Neotogaria is a genus of moths belonging to the subfamily Thyatirinae .
Nebria lyelli is a species of ground beetle in the Nebriinae subfamily that is endemic to the U.S. state of California .
Mesocapromys is a genus of rodent in the family Capromyidae .
Billia is a genus of two species of tree native to the Americas , from central Mexico to Ecuador .
Botryosphaeria disrupta is a plant pathogen that causes canker and dieback in several important plant species such as mango and avocado .
Excessive economic exploitation as well as the shrinking and degradation of its habitat have made the Polish cochineal a rare species .
Xenotaenia resolanae , the Leopard Splitfin , is a species of splitfin endemic to Mexico where it is found in the Purificación and Marabasco River basins .
Codringtonia neocrassa is a species of air - breathing land snail , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusc in the family Helicidae , the typical snails .
Cheloderus childreni is a species of beetle belonging to the family Oxypeltidae .
Joldagiroceras is an orthocerid genus that lived during the Late Silurian , Ludlovian stage .
Chorthippus scalaris , the Large mountain grasshopper , is a species of ' short - horned grasshoppers ' belonging to the family Acrididae subfamily Gomphocerinae .
Hololepta aequalis is a species of beetle belonging to the Histeridae family .
Reicheltia halsteadi , Halstead 's toadfish , is a species of pufferfish endemic to Australia .
Harpalus apache is a species of ground beetle in the subfamily Harpalinae .
Ribes erythrocarpum is an uncommon North American species of currant known by the common name Crater Lake currant .
Rhinophis tricolorata is a species of snake in the Uropeltidae family .
Eriogonum parvifolium is a species in the Polygonaceae family that occurs on dune formations in the coastal area of Central and Southern California .
The Pseudostigmatidae are a family of tropical damselflies , known as helicopter damselflies , giant damselflies , or forest giants .
Callisia gentlei is a species of flowering plant in the spiderwort family , Commelinaceae , that is native to southern Mexico , Guatemala , Belize , and Honduras .
Arisaema erubescens is a flowering plant species in the genus Arisaema , endemic to Nepal .
Serrivomer is a genus of deep - sea eel in the family Serrivomeridae .
Plagiobothrys arizonicus is a species of flowering plant in the borage family known by the common name Arizona popcornflower .
Dictyoptera ( from Ancient Greek diktuon `` net '' + pteron `` wing '' ) is an insect superorder that includes two orders of polyneopterous insects - the termites and cockroaches ( both order : Blattodea ) along with the mantids ( order : Mantodea ) .
Aralia elata is closely related to the American species Aralia spinosa , with which it is easily confused .
The Cuban high - crested toad or Gundlach 's Caribbean toad ( Peltophryne gundlachi , in Spanish saptito matraca ) is a species of toad in the family Bufonidae that is endemic to Cuba .
Arrhamphus sclerolepis is the only species in the genus Arrhamphus of halfbeak found in coastal waters of the Indo - West Pacific around Papua New Guinea and Australia , and in the freshwaters of adjacent river systems .
Rathbunella is a genus of ronquils native to the eastern Pacific Ocean .
Eimeria maxima is a species of Eimeria that causes coccidiosis in poultry .
Dudleya verityi is a rare species of succulent plant known by the common name Verity 's liveforever .
Pubescibidion pubescens is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , the only species in the genus Pubescibidion .
The Nautilida constitute a large and diverse order of generally coiled nautiloid cephalopods that began in the mid Paleozoic and continues to the present with a single family , the Nautilidae which includes two genera , Nautilus and Allonautilus , with six species .
Metanephrops mozambicus ( commonly known as the African lobster ) is a species of lobster that lives around south - east of Madagascar .
Agnotherium is an extinct genus of large terrestrial carnivores belonging to the suborder Caniformia , family Amphicyonidae ( `` bear dog '' ) , and which inhabited Euroasia and North Africa from the Early Miocene subepoch to the Middle Miocene subepoch 16.9 - -11.6 Mya , existing for approximately 5.3 million years .
Opsilia molybdaena is a species of beetle from a Cerambycidae family , that can be found in North Africa , South and Southeast Europe .
Eimeria bufomarini is a species of coccidium , known to infect the epithelial cells of the intestines of Brazilian Cane Toads .
Paragunnellichthys is a genus of wormfishes native to the Indian Ocean and the western Pacific Ocean .
Campylobacter coli is a Gram - negative , microaerophilic , non - endospore forming , S - shaped bacterial species within genus Campylobacter .
Crataegus jonesae is a species of hawthorn native to New England .
Mitrophyllum is a genus of succulent plants of the family Aizoaceae , indigenous to the arid region around the Richtersveld , on the border of South Africa and Namibia .
The Argentine black and white tegu ( Salvator merianae ) , also called the Argentine giant tegu , is the largest species of tegu lizard .
Papilio paeon is a species of swallowtail butterfly from the genus Papilio that is found in Ecuador , Peru , Bolivia , Costa Rica , Venezuela and Colombia .
Stephanomeria malheurensis , the Malheur wirelettuce , is a species of flowering plant in the family Asteraceae .
Pseudoeurycea tenchalli ( common name : bearded salamander , in Spanish tlaconete con barba ) is a species of salamander in the family Plethodontidae .
Diasparactus is an extinct genus of diadectid amphibians , a group quite closely related to the amniotes , and paralleling some of their features .
Potamogeton octandrus is an aquatic plant species in the genus Potamogeton .
Philodromus lividus is a spider species found in Europe ( Portugal , France , Italy , Croatia ) and North Africa ( Morocco , Algeria ) .
Scaglia 's tuco - tuco ( Ctenomys scagliai ) is a species of rodent in the family Ctenomyidae .
Rhynchocymba is an extinct genus of prehistoric bony fish that lived during the Pleistocene epoch .
Chrysomantis tristis is a species of praying mantis endemic to Nigeria .
Cyathea catillifera is a species of tree fern native to eastern New Guinea , where it grows in montane scrub at an altitude of about 2800 m and above .
Aphyosemion australe ( Cape Lopez lyretail , lyretail panchax ) is a species of freshwater fish belonging to the Nothobranchiidae family .
Senna armata is a species of flowering plant in the legume family known by the common names spiny senna and desert senna .
Juncus breweri is a species of rush known by the common name Brewer 's rush .
Tritrichomonas is a genus of single celled flagellated protozoan parasites , some of whose species are known to be pathogens of the bovine reproductive tract as well as the intestinal tract of felines .
The Transvaal lion ( Panthera leo krugeri ) , also known as Southeast African lion or Kalahari lion is a subspecies of the lion that lives in southern Africa , including Kruger National Park and the Kalahari Region .
Luciopimelodus pati is a South American species of freshwater long - whiskered catfish that inhabits the basin of the Río de la Plata and the Blanco River of Argentina , Brazil and Paraguay .
Atractaspis corpulenta , or the fat burrowing asp , is a species of snake in the Atractaspididae family .
Acroneuria internata is a species of stonefly in the Perlidae family .
Labiatophysa microphthalma is a species of ray - finned fish in the genus Labiatophysa .
The type species is Calmasuchus acri .
The genus Sciurus contains most of the common , bushy - tailed squirrels in North America , Europe , temperate Asia , Central America and South America .
Eucryphia glutinosa ( nirrhe ) is a species of flowering plant in the family Cunoniaceae , native to moist woodland habitats in Chile .
Cytinus visseri is an erect , perennial , and a dioecious species .
Westphaliasaurus is an extinct genus of plesiosaurid from Lower Jurassic ( Pliensbachian stage ) deposits of Westfalia , northwestern Germany .
Hyalella azteca is a widespread and abundant species of amphipod crustacean in North America .
Pseudechis australis , commonly known as the king brown- or mulga snake , or Pilbara cobra , is a species of venomous snake found in Australia .
Geminiviridae is a family of plant viruses .
Anodontosaurus is an extinct genus of ankylosaurid dinosaurs within the subfamily Ankylosaurinae .
Ochrocephala is a genus of Ethiopian flowering plants in the thistle tribe within the daisy family .
Pisidium tenuilineatum , the fine - lined pea mussel , is a species of very small freshwater bivalve in the family Sphaeriidae .
Austromorium flavigaster is a species of ant belonging to the genus Austromorium .
Kuhlia sandvicensis , the Reticulated flagtail , is a species of flagtail native to the waters around several Pacific islands where it occurs in fresh , brackish and marine waters .
Corymbia greeniana , commonly known as Dampier 's Bloodwood , is a species of plant in the myrtle family that is native to northern Western Australia .
The Cambodian striped squirrel ( Tamiops rodolphii ) is a species of rodent in the family Sciuridae .
Cnemathraupis is a small genus of mountain tanagers found in South America .
Emblemariopsis arawak is a species of chaenopsid blenny known from tropical reefs in the Caribbean Sea .
Lucasium byrnei , the gibber gecko or Byrne 's gecko , is a species of small , nocturnal gecko endemic to Australia .
Aluterus schoepfii , the orange filefish , is a species of fish in the Monacanthidae family .
Eriogonum evanidum is a rare species of wild buckwheat known by the common name vanishing wild buckwheat .
Astroloba bullulata is a small , compact species of Astroloba , that reaches a height of about 30 cm . It has a dark green to deep olive - red colour .
Elateropsis lineatus is a species of beetle in the Cerambycidae family , that can be found in South America in countries such as Chile .
Eotyrannus ( meaning `` dawn tyrant '' ) is a genus of tyrannosauroid theropod dinosaur hailing from the Early Cretaceous Wessex Formation beds , included in Wealden Group , located in the southwest coast of the Isle of Wight , United Kingdom .
Osbeckia chinensis is a plant species in the genus Osbeckia .
Crepidula ustulatulina is a species of small sea snail , a slipper snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Calyptraeidae , the slipper snails or slipper limpets , cup - and - saucer snails , and Chinese hat snails .
Papilio veiovis is a species of swallowtail butterfly from the genus Papilio that is found in Sulawesi .
Myrica arborea ( sometimes Morella arborea ) is a species of plant in the Myricaceae family .
Eryngium pendletonensis ( syn . E. pendletonense ) is a rare species of flowering plant in the carrot family known by the common name Pendleton button - celery .
Scardinius graecus , also called the Greek rudd or Yliki rudd , is a species of cyprinid fish , only known from a single lake , Lake Yliki , in Greece .
Spinosaurus ( meaning `` spine lizard '' ) is a genus of theropod dinosaur that lived in what now is North Africa , during the lower Albian to lower Cenomanian stages of the Cretaceous period , about 112 to 97 million years ago .
Myoleja mailaka is a species of tephritid or fruit flies in the genus Myoleja of the family Tephritidae .
The Stephanoberyciformes are an order of marine ray - finned fishes , consisting of about 68 species , the majority ( 61 ) of which belong to the ridgehead family ( Melamphaidae ) .
Syngnathus macrobrachium ( large - fin pipefish ) is a species of the pipefishes , which is common in the southern - eastern Pacific in the coastal waters from Tumbes ( Peru ) to Puerto Montt ( Chile ) .
Hylobittacus apicalis is a species of hangingfly in the order Mecoptera , and the only species within the genus Hylobittacus .
Camarillasaurus is a genus of basal ceratosaurian theropod dinosaur known from the Early Cretaceous of Camarillas , Teruel Province , in what is now northeastern Spain .
Cryptotermes brevis is a species of termite in the Kalotermitidae family , commonly known as the West Indian drywood termite or the powderpost termite .
Astragalus nevinii is a rare species of milkvetch known by the common name San Clemente Island milkvetch .
The Bostrichidae are a family of beetles with more than 700 described species .
Ceratodus ( Greek for `` horned tooth '' ) was a wide - ranging genus of extinct lungfish .
Dissochondrus ( false bristlegrass ) is a genus of Hawaiian plants in the grass family .
Nycteroleter is an extinct genus of nycteroleterid parareptile known from the Middle Permian of European Russia .
It contains only one species , Phryganeopsis brunnea , which is found in California .
The Ericaceae are a family of flowering plants , commonly known as the heath or heather family , found most commonly in acid and infertile growing conditions .
Mahonia japonica is a species of flowering plant in the family Berberidaceae , native to Taiwan .
Agonandra macrocarpa is a species of plant in the Opiliaceae family .
Zarudny 's jird ( Meriones zarudnyi ) is a species of rodent in the family Muridae .
Maaradactylus is a genus of anhanguerid pterosaur known from Lower Cretaceous rocks of northeastern Brazil .
Tabernaemontana undulata , the Becchete or Bëcchëte ( pronounced B'-chéw - teh , a Matis and Matsés word for a medicinal plant ) is a milkwood species in the family Apocynaceae .
Protocalliphora or bird blowflies are a blow fly genus containing many species which are obligate parasites of birds .
Clubiona aducta is a sac spider species found in Portugal and Spain .
Erosaria nebrites , common name the false margined cowry , is a species of sea snail , a cowry , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Cypraeidae , the cowries .
Isocoma tenuisecta , commonly called burroweed , shrine jimmyweed , or burrow goldenweed is a North American species of small , flowering perennial herbs in the sunflower family .
Xyliphius melanopterus is a species of banjo catfish found in Ecuador , Peru and Venezuela where it occurs in the upper Amazon and Orinoco River basins .
Tochisaurus ( meaning `` Ostrich lizard '' ) is a genus of small troodontid theropod dinosaur from the Late Cretaceous Period of Mongolia .
Argyrodendron is a genus of mainly trees in the mallow family Malvaceae .
Haplochromis microchrysomelas is a species of cichlid endemic to Lake Kivu in Rwanda .
Mixogaster is a genus of hoverflies native to North America and South America , with 19 known species .
Echinocereus knippelianus is a species of hedgehog cactus .
Erythronium krylovii is a plant species known only from the Tuva and Krasnoyarsk regions in Siberia .
Trinucleidae is a family of small to average size asaphid trilobites that first occurred at the start of the Ordovician and went extinct at the end of that period .
Allium qasyunense is a Middle Eastern species of onions in the amaryllis family , found in Israel , Palestine , Syria and Jordan .
The Opisthocoelicaudiinae is a clade of titanosaurian dinosaurs from the Late Cretaceous , ranked as a subfamily .
Lactarius cistophilus is a species of fungus of the milk - cap genus Lactarius in the order Russulales .
Eriophora pustulosa , commonly called the garden orbweb spider is a common small species of spider found in Australia and New Zealand .
Argyroxiphium kauense ( Mauna Loa silversword , also commonly known as Kaʻū silversword ) is a rare species of flowering plant in the Asteraceae family .
Adenoviruses ( members of the family Adenoviridae ) are medium - sized ( 90 - -100 nm ) , nonenveloped ( without an outer lipid bilayer ) viruses with an icosahedral nucleocapsid containing a double stranded DNA genome .
Maxwellia gemma , common name : the gem murex , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Muricidae , the murex snails or rock snails .
Terminalia acuminata was a species of plant in the Combretaceae family .
Marrus orthocanna is a species of pelagic siphonophore , a colonial animal composed of a complex arrangement of zooids , some of which are polyps and some medusae .
Blandfordia punicea , commonly known as Tasmanian Christmas bell , is a species of flowering plant which is native to western Tasmania in Australia .
Adiantum aleuticum ( western maidenhair fern , Aleutian maidenhair ) is a species of fern in the genus Adiantum , native mainly to western North America from the Aleutian Islands of Alaska , south to Chihuahua , and also locally in northeastern North America from Newfoundland south to Maryland .
Hypsoblennius is a genus of combtooth blennies found in the Pacific and Atlantic Oceans .
Niphovelleda gracilis is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Niphovelleda .
Dendrobium secundum , also known as the toothbrush orchid , is a species of flowering plant in the family Orchidaceae and in the Dendrobium genus .
Lactuca dissecta ( split - leaf lettuce ) is an Asian species of plant in the dandelion tribe within sunflower family family .
Fender 's blue butterfly ( Icaricia icarioides fenderi syn . Plebejus icarioides fenderi ) is an endangered subspecies of butterfly endemic to the Willamette Valley of northwestern Oregon , United States .
Drymoda is a genus of orchids , with 3 currently accepted species ( as of June 2014 ) .
Olearia algida ( Alpine Daisy - bush ) is a species of flowering plant in the family Asteraceae .
Nine species of hornbill are found in the Philippines , and the Palawan hornbill is endemic to Palawan island , but has also been recorded on the nearby islands of Balabac , Busuanga , Calauit , Culion and Coron .
Microleroides chinensis is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Microleroides .
Nephrops is a genus of lobsters comprising a single extant species , Nephrops norvegicus ( the Norway lobster or Dublin Bay prawn ) , and several fossil species .
Etheostoma duryi , the black darter , is a species of darter endemic to the eastern United States , where it occurs in the drainage of the Tennessee River in the states of Tennessee , Georgia , and Alabama .
Rosa arkansana , the prairie rose or wild prairie rose , is a species of rose native to a large area of central North America , between the Appalachian and Rocky Mountains from Alberta , Manitoba , and Saskatchewan south to New Mexico , Texas and Indiana .
Mediavia agnesa is a species of snout moth in the genus Mediavia .
At present it contains the single species Appianoporites vancouverensis .
It includes one species , Eleoniscus helenae , which is endemic to Alicante province , Spain , where it is known from two caves .
Penicillium brevissimum is a fungus species of the genus of Penicillium which was isolated from Indian soils .
Eostrobilops hirasei is a species of air - breathing land snail , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Strobilopsidae .
Pyura pachydermatina is a sea tulip , a solitary species of tunicate in the suborder Stolidobranchia .
Saccopharyngiformes is an order of unusual ray - finned fish , superficially similar to eels , but with multiple internal differences .
Nebria saurica is a species of ground beetle in the Nebriinae subfamily that is endemic to Kazakhstan .
Mimulus ringens is a species of monkeyflower known by the common names Allegheny monkeyflower and square - stemmed monkeyflower .
Lixus concavus , commonly called the rhubarb curculio , is a species of weevil .
Ophrys fusca , commonly known as the sombre bee - orchid or the dark bee - orchid , is a species of orchid native to the Mediterranean from southwestern Europe and northern Africa to western Asia .
Schneider 's surprise ( Tiradelphe schneideri ) is a species of nymphalid butterfly in the Danainae subfamily .
Festuca ligulata is a species of grass known by the common name Guadalupe fescue .
The Fusulinidae is a family of fusulinacean Foraminifera from the upper Carboniferous ( Lower Pennsylvanian , Morrowan ) to the Upper Permian ( Guadalupian ) , tests of which are fusiform to subcylindrical with walls of two to four layers .
Lilium lancifolium ( syn . L. tigrinum ) is an Asian species of lily , native to China , Japan , Korea , and the Russian Far East .
Pyrrosia is a genus of about 100 fern species in the polypod family , Polypodiaceae .
Nebria lafresnayei is a species of ground beetle in the Nebriinae subfamily that can be found in Andorra , France , and Spain .
Cynohyaenodon is an extinct genus of hyaenodontid afrothere that lived during the Eocene .
Consolea corallicola is a species of cactus known by the common names Florida semaphore cactus and semaphore pricklypear .
Buddleja sessiliflora , commonly known as Rio Grande Butterfly - bush or Tepozán , is a species of flowering plant in the figwort family , Scrophulariaceae .
Vitrea is a genus of small , air - breathing land snails , terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusks in the family Pristilomatidae .
Lepanthes johnsonii is a species of orchid found from Mexico ( Chiapas ) to Guatemala .
Haliplus is a genus of beetle native to the Palearctic ( including Europe ) , the Afro - tropical region , the Near East , the Nearctic and North Africa .
Rana brama is a species of frog .
Manta rays are large rays belonging to the genus Manta .
Xyris laxiflora is a New World species of flowering plants in the yellow - eyed - grass family .
Rhaptopetalum geophylax is a species of plant in the Lecythidaceae family .
Anisopodus strigosus is a species of beetle in the Cerambycidae family that was described by Erichson in 1847 .
Cephalotes mompox is a species of arboreal ant of the genus Cephalotes , characterized by an odd shaped head , and the ability to `` parachute '' by steering their fall if they drop off from a tree .
Scipionyx ( pronounced `` SHIH - pee - oh - nicks '' or `` ship - ee - OH - nicks '' ) is a genus of compsognathid theropod dinosaur from the Early Cretaceous of Italy , around 113 million years ago .
Agave havardiana is a plant species native to the Big Bend area of western Texas as well as Chihuahua and Coahuila .
Astranthium , or Western - daisy , is a North American genus of flowering plants in the daisy family .
Lasioglossum bidentatum , also known as the Lasioglossum ( Sudila ) bidentatum , is a species of bee in the genus Lasioglossum , of the family Halictidae .
Feihyla palpebralis is a species of frog in the Rhacophoridae family , sometimes known as the Vietnamese bubble - nest frog or the white - cheeked small treefrog .
Cyathea acuminata is a species of tree fern native to the islands of Panay and Samar in the Philippines .
The Mucorales is the largest and best studied order of Zygomycete fungi .
Protomyzon is a genus of gastromyzontid loaches endemic to Borneo .
Cambarus bartonii is a species of crayfish native to eastern North America , where it is called the common crayfish or Appalachian brook crayfish .
Pachygaster atra , the dark - winged black , is a European species of soldier fly .
Ornithoctoninae , also known as earth tigers , are a subfamily of Asian tarantulas , which were first erected in 1895 by Reginald Innes Pocock on basis of the genotype Ornithoctonus andersoni described in 1892 from former Burma , now Myanmar .
It contains only one species , Eriocranites hercynicus , which was described from Willershausen in Germany .
The genus Peromyscus contains the animal species commonly referred to as deer mice .
Hierosaurus ( meaning `` sacred lizard '' ) is an extinct genus of nodosaurid ankylosaur which lived during the Cretaceous 87 to 82 million years ago .
Ceanothus cyaneus is a species of flowering shrub known by the common names San Diego buckbrush and Lakeside ceanothus .
Geina integumentum is a species of moth in the genus Geina , known from Puerto Rico and the Virgin Islands .
Eulimidae is a family of very small parasitic sea snails , marine gastropod mollusks in the superfamily Eulimoidea .
Sardinella sindensis ( Sind sardinella ) is a species of ray - finned fish in the genus Sardinella .
Desmopuntius is a genus of cyprinids native to Southeast Asia .
Sigesbeckia is a genus of annual plants in the aster family .
Iniidae is a family of river dolphins containing one living and four extinct genera .
Brachycephalus vertebralis is a species of frog in the Brachycephalidae family endemic to Brazil ; it is known only from Serra da Bocaina National Park and Cunha , São Paulo and occurs at 800 meters above sea level .
Trachelyichthys decaradiatus is a species of driftwood catfish endemic to Guyana where it is found in the Rupununi River basin .
Disporum is a genus of about 20 species of perennial flowering plants , found in Asia from northern India to Japan , south to Indonesia and north into the Russian Far East .
Anobium costatum is a species of beetles in the genus Anobium of the family Anobiidae .
Zamia pumila was the first species described for the genus and hence is the type species for the genus Zamia and the family Zamiaceae .
Akysis bilustris is a species of catfish belonging to the family Akysidae ( the stream catfishes ) , known only from two geographically proximate localities in the Xe Kong drainage , a major subdrainage of the Mekong River , in Laos and Cambodia .
Asterophora mirabilis is a species of fungus that grows as a parasite on mushrooms .
The Kandyan Gecko ( Hemidactylus depressus ) also known as Sri Lanka Leaf - nosed Gecko , is a species of gecko endemic to island of Sri Lanka .
Spicara is a genus of picarels native to the eastern Atlantic Ocean and the western Indian Ocean .
Buddleja hatschbachii is a rare species found only in the wet ravines and rock slopes flanking the east side of the planalto of southern Brazil .
The genus Huernia ( family Apocynaceae , subfamily Asclepiadoideae ) consists of stem succulents from Eastern and Southern Africa , first described as a genus in 1810 .
Salix subopposita is a species of willow native to southern Japan and Quelpaert Island in South Korea .
Judolia cerambyciformis is a species of beetle belonging to the family Cerambycidae , subfamily Lepturinae ( flower longhorns ) .
Acanthodes ( meaning spiny base or thorny base ) is an extinct genus of spiny shark .
Coelacanthus ( `` Hollow Spine '' ) is a genus of extinct coelacanths that first appeared during the Permian period .
Agyneta merretti is a species of sheet weaver found in Angola .
Risbecia nyalya is a species of colourful sea slug or dorid nudibranch , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Chromodorididae .
The Patagonian crested duck ( Lophonetta specularioides specularioides ) , also known as the southern crested duck , or the grey duck in the Falkland Islands , is the nominate of two subspecies of the crested duck .
Rhodichthys regina , the threadfin seasnail , is a species of snailfish native to the Arctic Ocean and the northeastern Atlantic Ocean .
Perirehaedulus richardsi is a species of prehistoric trilobite named after British musician Keith Richards .
Lilium catesbaei requires hot , wet , acidic soil inhospitable to most other lily species .
Ampullinopsis is an extinct taxonomic genus of deep - water sea snails , marine gastropod molluscs in the clade Sorbeoconcha .
The Somali crombec ( Sylvietta isabellina ) is a species of African warbler , formerly placed in the family Sylviidae .
Nassarius conoidalis , common name the cone - shaped Nassa , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Nassariidae , the nassa mud snails .
Terpnomyia bicolor is a species of ulidiid or picture - winged fly in the genus Terpnomyia of the family Tephritidae .
Mycobacterium goodii is an acid - fast bacterial species in the phylum Actinobacteria and the genus Mycobacterium .
Erechtites valerianifolius , common name tropical burnweed is a New World species of plants in the sunflower family .
Conus biliosus , common name the bilious cone , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Conidae , the cone snails and their allies .
Pleurobranchus forskalii is a species of side - gill sea slug , a notaspidean , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pleurobranchidae .
Labeo mokotoensis is one of 103 fish species in the genus Labeo .
Michaelophorus shafferi is a species of moth in the genus Michaelophorus , known from Brazil .
Timbellus bednalli , common name Bednall 's murex , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Muricidae , the rock snails or murex snails .
Flacourtia rukam is a species of flowering plant in the willow family , Salicaceae .
Ectatomma ruidum is a Neotropical species of ant in the subfamily Ectatomminae .
Philoglossa is a genus of South American plants in the dandelion subfamily within the daisy family .
Rathouisia tigrina is a species of carnivorous air - breathing land slug , terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Rathouisiidae .
Ischikauia steenackeri is a species of cyprinid fish endemic to Lake Biwa in Japan .
There is only one known species , Acanthochlamys bracteata , native to Tibet and Sichuan .
Malacoglanis gelatinosus is a species of catfish ( order Siluriformes ) of the family Trichomycteridae , and the only species of the genus Malacoglanis .
Phaedranassa is a genus of South American and Central American plants in Amaryllis family , subfamily Amaryllidoideae .
Salix brachycarpa is a species of flowering plant in the willow family known by the common names barren - ground willow , small - fruit willow and shortfruit willow .
Streptomyces albofaciens is a bacterium species from the genus of Streptomyces which produces oxytetracycline , spiramycin , albopeptin A , albopeptin B and alpomycin .
Pyura praeputialis is an intertidal and shallow water species of tunicate .
Helvetia semialba is a species of jumping spiders only found in Brazil .
Hulsea mexicana , the Mexican alpinegold or Mexican hulsea is a rare North American species of flowering plant in the daisy family It has been found only in a small region straddling the border between Mexico and the United States .
Caulophyllum giganteum , the northern blue cohosh , is a species of flowering plant in the barberry family .
Macrothele cretica is a species of spider in the Hexathelidae family .
Mesonauta acora is a species of cichlid fish native to soft , acidic freshwater habitats in South America .
Beryx is a genus of alfonsinos found in deep oceanic waters .
Hemibagrus wyckii is a species of catfish ( order Siluriformes ) of the family Bagridae .
Cordylogyne is a species of plants in the Apocynaceae first described as a genus in 1838 .
Pyxine is a genus of lichenized fungi in the family Physciaceae .
Brissalius vannoordenburgi is a species of sea urchin in the Family Brissidae .
Pristidactylus torquatus , commonly known as lagarto de bosque , the southern grumbler , or the forest lizard , is a species of lizard in the Iguanidae family .
Atriplex patula L. ( Spear Saltbush ; Common Orache ; Spear Orach ; Spreading Orach ) is a ruderal , circumboreal species of annual herbaceous plants in the genus Atriplex naturalized in many temperate regions .
Cynoglossus arel , commonly known as the Largescale tonguesole is a species of tonguefish .
Although there is no evidence that Tioman virus can cause illness in humans or animals , its close relationship to other disease - causing paramyxoviruses ( Hendra virus , Menangle virus , Nipah virus ) suggests the possibility that it may cause disease upon crossing the species barrier .
Euphilotes battoides , the square - spotted blue or buckwheat blue , is a species of butterfly of the Lycaenidae family .
Encyclia cyperifolia is a species of orchid found in South America .
Acirsa subcarinata is a species of minute deep water sea snail or micromollusk .
Aloe lomatophylloides ( previously Lomatophyllum lomatophylloides ) is a species of Aloe endemic to the island of Rodrigues , in the Indian Ocean .
Cyathea brevipinna is a species of tree fern endemic to the higher parts of Mount Gower ( 875 m ) on Lord Howe Island , where it grows in exposed areas at an altitude of about 790 m. The trunk is erect and may reach 3 m in height .
Dactylagnus is a genus of sand stargazers , found in the eastern central Pacific and western central Atlantic Ocean .
Zygogramma is a large genus of leaf beetles in the subfamily Chrysomelinae , which includes approximately 100 species .
Alsodes nodosus ( common name : black spiny - chest frog ) is a species of frog in the Alsodidae family endemic to central Chile ; records from Argentina are not considered valid .
Lupinus holmgrenianus is a species of lupine known by the common name Holmgren 's lupine .
Jasminocereus ( meaning `` jasmine - like cereus '' , referring to the flowers ) is a genus of cacti .
Pithodia tessellata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Pithodia .
Semicassis royana is a species of medium - sized predatory sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Cassidae , the helmet shells and their allies .
Isochrysis is a genus of haptophytes .
Diphasiastrum tristachyum , commonly known as blue clubmoss or blue ground - cedar , is a North American and Eurasian species of clubmoss .
Lontalius is a genus of butterfly in the family Lycaenidae . It is a monotypic genus . The single species is Lontalius eltus Eliot , 1986 found in Borneo and the Philippines
Adrapsa ablualis is a species of moth in the Noctuidae family , that can be found in Queensland , Australia and Southeast Asia .
Phacelia exilis is a species of phacelia known by the common names Transverse Range phacelia and lavender windows .
Delphinium patens is a species of larkspur known by the common names zigzag larkspur and spreading larkspur .
The Cercopithecinae are a subfamily of the Old World monkeys , which comprises roughly 71 species , including the baboons , the macaques and the vervet monkeys .
Strioterebrum nitidum , common name : the Shiny Pacific Auger , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Terebridae , the auger snails .
A single species is known and has been named Songzia heidangkouensis .
Starksia cremnobates , the Fugitive blenny , is a species of labrisomid blenny endemic to the Gulf of California where it is found at depths of around 60 metres ( 200 ft ) .
Empicoris subparallelus is a species of thread - legged bug found in Cuba and from two Southern US States ( Florida and Texas ) .
Hesychopa is a genus of moths in the family Arctiidae .
Croptilon is a small North American genus of flowering plants in the aster tribe within the sunflower family .
The Pareatinae are a small subfamily of the Colubridae family of snakes .
Wendlandia psychotrioides is a species of shrubs or small trees , constituting part of the plant family Rubiaceae .
Kinyongia ( derived from the species ' name in Kiswahili language ) is a chameleon genus recently established for several plesiomorphic species found in forest and woodland in Kenya , Tanzania , Uganda , Rwanda , and far eastern DR Congo .
Amatitlania is a genus of cichlid fishes from Central America from El Salvador and Guatemala to Panama .
Hyperparachma congrualis is a species of snout moth in the genus Hyperparachma .
Thylacinus is a genus of extinct carnivorous marsupials from the order Dasyuromorphia .
Aruncus is a genus of clump forming herbaceous perennial plants in the family Rosaceae .
Chaenogobius is a genus of gobies native to Asia and the western Pacific Ocean .
Parazoanthus is a genus of anemone - like anthozoans in the order Zoantharia .
Lepidium fremontii ( desert pepperweed ) is a species of flowering plant in the mustard family which is native to the southwestern United States , where it grows on sandy desert flats and the rocky slopes of nearby hills and mountains .
Trifolium macrocephalum is a species of clover known by the common name largehead clover .
Vriesea rubra is a plant species in the genus Vriesea .
Petrotilapia tridentiger is a species of cichlid endemic to Lake Malawi where it prefers shallow waters with rocky substrates .
Hypleurochilus bermudensis , the Barred blenny , is a species of combtooth blenny found in coral reefs in the western Atlantic ocean .
Entada gigas , commonly known as the monkey - ladder , sea bean , Cœur de la Mer or Sea Heart , is a species of flowering liana in the pea family , Fabaceae , that is native to Central America , the Caribbean , northern South America , and Africa .
Lehmannia marginata is species of air - breathing land slug , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Limacidae .
Bogoslovskya is an extinct orthoceroid cephalopod genus that lived in what is now Asia ( Urals and Japan ) from the Devonian to the Permian .
The Prorocentrales are a small order of dinoflagellates .
Triraphis devia is a species of grass endemic to Brazil , the only member of its genus native to the Western Hemisphere .
Sepia erostrata is a species of cuttlefish native to the northwestern Pacific Ocean , specifically off western mainland Japan , from Sagami Bay to the Kii Peninsula .
The phylum Elusimicrobia , previously known as ' Termite Group 1 ' , has been shown to be widespread in different ecosystems like marine environment , sewage sludge , contaminated sites and soils .
Onchidiopsis carnea is a species of small sea snail with a transparent internal shell , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Velutinidae .
The Longdan tiger or Panthera zdanskyi is an extinct species of pantherine known from the Gansu province of northwestern China .
Lepidotrigla guentheri is a species of fish in the searobin family
Claytonia tuberosa , commonly known as Tuberous Spring Beauty , is a species of flowering plant in the family Montiaceae .
Gonialosa is a genus of gizzard shads that are found in the rivers of South and Southeast Asia .
Waltheria is a genus of flowering plants in the mallow family , Malvaceae .
Datanglong is an extinct genus of carcharodontosaurian theropod belonging to the Tetanurae .
Astragalus leptaleus is a species of flowering plant in the legume family known by the common name park milkvetch .
Gibbula hisseyiana is a species of minute sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Trochidae , the top snails .
Carabus sylvestris sylvestris is a subspecies of brown - coloured beetle from Carabidae family , that can be found in Austria , Czech Republic , France , Germany , Italy , Liechtenstein , Poland , and Switzerland .
Sporopipes is a genus of bird in the Passeridae family .
Cyrtodesmidae is a family of millipedes , containing 30 species in 3 genera .
Thomas 's bushbaby ( Galagoides thomasi ) is a species of primate in the family Galagidae .
Melicope is a genus of about 230 species of shrubs and trees in the family Rutaceae , occurring from the Hawaiian Islands across the Pacific to tropical Asia , Australia and New Zealand .
Potamogeton acutifolius is a European species of aquatic plant in the family Potamogetonaceae , known by the common name sharp - leaved pondweed .
The mole salamander ( Ambystoma talpoideum ) is a species of salamander found in much of the eastern and central United States , from Florida to Texas , north to Illinois , east to Kentucky , with an isolated population in Virginia .
It is the only species in the monotypic genus Duncanopsammia .
It contains the single species Lymantriopsis lacteata , which is found in Gabon .
Pegaeophyton nepalense is a plant species reported from Nepal , Bhutan , Sikkim and Xizang (= Tibet ) .
Lythrypnus dalli , the Blue - banded goby , is a species of goby native to the eastern Pacific from Monterey Bay ( California ) to northern Peru , including the Gulf of California .
Synodontis vanderwaali is a species of upside - down catfish native to Angola , Botswana and Namibia where it occurs in the upper Zambezi River , the Okavango River and Delta and the Cunene River .
Astragalus inversus is a species of milkvetch known by the common name Susanville milkvetch .
Conus hybridus , common name the hybrid cone , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Conidae , the cone snails and their allies .
Cebrio gigas is a species of beetle of the subfamily Cebrioninae from a family of click beetles .
Calycolpus australis is a plant species native to the State of Minas Gerais in Brazil .
Astragalus tener is a species of milkvetch known by the common name alkali milkvetch .
The Pteropodinae are a subfamily of megabats .
Pyrgospira tampaensis , common name the Tampa turrid , is a species from sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pseudomelatomidae .
The Mongolian vole ( Microtus mongolicus ) is a species of rodent in the family Cricetidae .
Geniostoma uninervium is a species of plant in the Melmoth family .
Stratioceros princeps is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Stratioceros .
Delavaya ( 茶条木属 , cha tiao mu shu ) is a monotypic genus of shrub or small tree endemic to southwestern China and northern Vietnam .
Eleutherodactylus inoptatus ( common name : Diquini robber frog ) is a species of frog in the Eleutherodactylidae family endemic to Hispaniola ; it is found both in the Dominican Republic and Haiti .
Mammillaria lasiacantha is a species of cactus in the subfamily Cactoideae , with the common name lacespine nipple cactus .
Artemisia tilesii is an Asian and North American species of flowering plant in the aster family .
Pyrgulina alveata is a species of very small sea snail , a pyramidellid gastropod micromollusk .
Black and Mackness(1999 ) suggested that the Hulitherium clade is more closely related to the clade comprising Zygomaturus plus another undescribed genus from Australia , than it is to Kolopsis .
The Henderson fruit dove ( Ptilinopus insularis ) , also known as scarlet - capped fruit dove , is a species of bird in the Columbidae family .
Conicotheca nigrans is a species of benthic Foraminifera that was first identified from samples collected from the Challenger Deep in the Mariana Trench .
Buchanosteidae is a family of arthrodire placoderms that lived from the Early to Middle Devonian .
Connellia nutans is a species in the genus Connellia .
Carex arenaria , or sand sedge , is a species of perennial sedge of the genus Carex which is commonly found growing in dunes and other sandy habitats , as the species epithet suggests ( Latin arenarius , `` sandy '' ) .
Streptomyces griseoaurantiacus is a thermotolerant bacterium species from the genus of Streptomyces which was isolated from marine sediment .
Ceiba is the name of a genus of many species of large trees found in tropical areas , including Mexico , Central America , South America , the Caribbean , West Africa , and Southeast Asia .
Justicia is a genus of flowering plants in the family Acanthaceae .
Phaeocollybia christinae , commonly known as Christina 's rootshank , is a species of fungus in the family Cortinariaceae .
Miltonia cuneata , the Wedge - shaped Miltonia , is a species of orchid endemic to southeastern Brazil .
Bryaninops amplus , known commonly as the Large whip goby or White - line Seawhip Goby , is a species of marine fish in the family Gobiidae .
Papillaria crocea is a species of moss .
Octomeria grandiflora is a species of orchid endemic to Brazil ( São Paulo to Paraná ) .
Amanipodagrion gilliesi is a species of damselfly .
Entomocorus gameroi is a species of driftwood catfish native ( possibly endemic ) to Venezuela and questionably present in Colombia .
The Nepal leopard was proposed as a subspecies of leopard in the Nineteenth Century , native to Nepal , South Asia , with the taxonomic name Panthera pardus pernigra ( J.E.Gray , Hodgson , 1863 ) .
Barremitinae is a subfamily belonging to the Ammonoidea subclass .
Cladium mariscus is a species of flowering plant in the sedge family known by the common names swamp sawgrass , great fen - sedge , saw - sedge or sawtooth sedge .
Sepia subtenuipes is a species of cuttlefish native to the western Pacific Ocean , specifically the East China Sea and the Kii Channel in southwestern Japan .
Salvia lemmonii ( Lemmon 's sage ) is an aromatic species of sage that is native to the United States and Mexico .
