Nematogenys inermis is a species of mountain catfish , the only extant species in the family Nematogenyiidae .
Fritillaria agrestis is a species of fritillary known by the common name stinkbells .
Claudiella ingens is a species of beetle in the family Torridincolidae , the only species in the genus Claudiella .
Miltoniopsis , abbreviated Mltnps in horticultural trade , is a genus of orchids .
Achillea erba - rotta is a polymorphic species , as its physical characteristics clearly vary depending on the variety .
Canis edwardii ( Edward 's wolf ) is an extinct species of Canidae which was endemic to most of North America from the Blancan stage of the Pliocene epoch through to the Irvingtonian stage of the Pleistocene epoch , living 4.9 Mya--300,000 years ago , existing for approximately 4.6 million years .
Odontoglossum constrictum , the Constricted Odontoglossum , is a species of orchid found from Colombia to northern Venezuela .
Lomatium ravenii is a species of flowering plant in the carrot family known by the common names Lassen parsley and Raven 's lomatium .
Monactis is a genus of South American flowering plants in the sunflower tribe within the daisy family .
Fejervarya multistriata ( common name : Hong Kong paddy frog or simply paddy frog ) is a species of frog in the Dicroglossidae family .
Bunium bulbocastanum is a plant species in the family Apiaceae .
Calappa japonica , also known as the Japanese shame - faced crab , is a marine species of box crab in the family Calappidae .
Cupiennius salei , commonly called the American wandering spider or Tiger wandering spider , is a large spider belonging to a group of wandering spiders found in Central America ( also known as banana spiders ) , although this species is specifically from Eastern Mexico , Guatemala , Belize and Honduras .
Barbus callensis , commonly known as the Algerian barb or Tunisian barb , is a ray - finned fish species in the family Cyprinidae .
Malus tschonoskii ( common names Chonosuki crab and pillar apple ) is a species of flowering plant in the family Rosaceae , native to Japan .
Plantago debilis is a species of herb native to Australia .
Phryganistria is a genus of stick insects belonging to the family of giant sticks .
Paluxysuchus is an extinct genus of neosuchian crocodyliform known from the Early Cretaceous Twin Mountains Formation ( late Aptian stage ) of north - central Texas .
Baryphthengus is a genus of birds in the family Momotidae .
Pyrrocoma racemosa is a species of flowering plant in the aster family known by the common name clustered goldenweed .
Copromorpha fossilis is an extinct species of moth in the Copromorphidae family .
Mammillaria rhodantha ( common name rainbow pincushion ) is a plant in the cactus family ( Cactaceae ) and is one of 171 species in the genus Mammillaria which are characterized by having nipple - shaped tubercles or prominences on their surface .
Falsohyagnis preapicemaculata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Falsohyagnis .
Gryllotalpa orientalis is a species of mole cricket in the family Gryllotalpidae , commonly known as the oriental mole cricket .
Amalgaviridae is a family of double - stranded RNA viruses that has one genus :
Pseudo - nitzschia is a marine planktonic diatom genus containing some species capable of producing the neurotoxin domoic acid ( DA ) , which is responsible for the neurological disorder known as amnesic shellfish poisoning ( ASP ) .
Oxybelis is a genus of colubrid snakes , endemic to the Americas , which are commonly known as vine snakes .
Abronia villosa is a species of sand - verbena known by the common names desert sand - verbena and chaparral sand - verbena .
Perittopus yunnanensis is a species of Riffle bug from China .
Chaenactis parishii is a species of flowering plant in the daisy family known by the common name Parish 's chaenactis .
Osmunda greenlandica is an extinct species of ferns in the genus Osmunda .
Bacteriovorax stolpii is a species of bacterium in the family Bacteriovoracaceae .
Apomyelois bistriatella is a species of snout moth in the genus Apomyelois .
Leochilus is a genus of flowering plants from the orchid family , Orchidaceae , native to Mexico , Central America , northern South America , the West Indies and Florida .
Cricetulus is a genus of rodent in the family Cricetidae ( voles and hamsters ) .
Craterellus caeruleofuscus is a species of fungus in the Cantharellaceae family of mushrooms .
Roridomyces austrororidus , commonly known as the austro dripping bonnet , is a species of agaric fungus in the family Mycenaceae .
Mycosphaerella pini is a species of fungus in the family Mycosphaerellaceae .
Toxotes chatareus , sometimes known by the common names seven - spot archerfish or largescale archerfish , is a species of perciform fish in the archerfish genus Toxotes .
Lobocarcinus is a genus of extinct marine crabs that lived in the Eocene and Miocene , containing the following species :
Tickell 's bat ( Hesperoptenus tickelli ) is a species of vesper bat .
Megalopanax rex is a species of flowering plant of family Araliaceae , the only representative of genus Megalopanax .
Rhacophorus verrucopus is a species of frog in the Rhacophoridae family found in China and possibly India .
Leccinum manzanitae is an edible species of bolete fungus in the family Boletaceae .
Spicara maena , the blotched picarel , is a species of ray - finned fish native to the eastern Atlantic Ocean , the Mediterranean Sea and the Black Sea .
Betta persephone is a species of gourami endemic to Malaysia where it is only known from Johor .
Trifolium jokerstii is a rare species of clover known by the common names Jim 's clover and Butte County golden clover .
Andinobates virolinensis ( the Santander poison frog ) is a species of frog in the Dendrobatidae family .
The New World vulture or condor family Cathartidae contains seven species in five genera , all but one of which are monotypic .
Xenacanthus is a genus of prehistoric sharks .
Ischnocnema is a genus of frogs from east Brazil and northeast Argentina .
The Kings River slender salamander , Batrachoseps regius , is a species of salamander in the Plethodontidae family .
Atlantic bonito share Atlantic waters with the striped bonito , Sarda orientalis ( the Atlantic population of which is sometimes considered a separate species , Sarda velox ) .
Anatoma euglypta is a species of very small sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk or micromollusk in the family Anatomidae .
Paphiopedilum fairrieanum is a species of orchid occurring from the eastern Himalaya to Assam .
The Common Rain Frog or Strawberry Rain Frog ( Breviceps acutirostris ) is a species of frog in the Brevicipitidae family .
Oedipina is a genus of lungless salamanders , which is characterized by their absence of lungs ; they instead achieve respiration through their skin and the tissues lining their mouth .
Fritillaria atropurpurea is a species of fritillary known by several common names , including spotted fritillary , purple fritillary , spotted mountainbells , and spotted missionbells .
Megacephala bostockii is a species of ground beetle in the subfamily of Carabinae that was described by Castelnau in 1867 , and is endemic to Australia .
Allobates marchesianus ( common name : dull rocket frog ) is a species of frog in the Aromobatidae family .
Yinotheria is a proposed subclass that contains a few fossil mammals of the Mesozoic and the extant monotremes .
The Brigantiaeaceae are a family of fungi in the Ascomycota , class Lecanoromycetes .
Bhidea is a genus of Indian plants in the grass family .
Barn - owls ( family Tytonidae ) are one of the two families of owls , the other being the true owls or typical owls , Strigidae .
Penstemon caesius is a species of penstemon known by the common name San Bernardino beardtongue .
Dolichoropica unicolor is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Dolichoropica .
Chenopodium leptophyllum is a species of flowering plant in the amaranth family known by the common name narrowleaf goosefoot .
Actinostrobus acuminatus , commonly known as dwarf cypress , creeping pine or Moore cypress pine , is a species of coniferous tree in the Cupressaceae ( cypress family ) .
Vaccinium parvifolium , the red huckleberry , is a species of Vaccinium native to western North America , where it is common in forests from southeastern Alaska and British Columbia south through western Washington and Oregon to central California .
Takakia ceratophylla is a species of moss in the Takakiaceae family .
Ceratitida is an order that contains almost all ammonoid cephalopod genera from the Triassic as well as ancestral forms from the Upper Permian , the exception being the phylloceratids which gave rise to the great diversity of post Triassic ammonites .
Gobius tetrophthalmus is a species of goby endemic to the Atlantic waters around Cape Verde , western Africa where it is found at depths of from 7 to 25 metres ( 23 to 82 ft ) where it prefers areas with coralline algae though it will also inhabit areas with substrates of sand and rock .
It contains the single species Dichrostoptera basilinea , which is found in New Guinea .
Achnatherum lemmonii is a species of grass known by the common name Lemmon 's needlegrass .
The Mentawai langur ( Presbytis potenziani ) is a species of primate in the family Cercopithecidae .
Arcobacter halophilus is a species of obligate halophilic bacteria .
Trimusculus reticulatus is a species of small air - breathing sea snail or false limpet , a pulmonate gastropod mollusc in the family Trimusculidae , the button snails .
Cyathea fuliginosa is a species of tree fern native to the islands of Luzon , Biliran and Mindanao in the Philippines , where it grows in forest at an altitude of 640 - 2400 m. This tree fern has an erect trunk up to 5 m tall or more .
Penstemon sudans is a species of penstemon known by the common name Susanville beardtongue .
Atalaya hemiglauca , commonly known as whitewood or cattle bush , is a species of plant in the soapberry family .
Veradia brisbanensis is a species of beetle in the family Carabidae , the only species in the genus Veradia .
Eugyrinus is an extinct genus of dendrerpetontid temnospondyl .
Bryconella pallidifrons is a species of characin found in the Amazon River basin of Brazil and Peru .
Pandemis limitata , the three - lined leafroller , is a species of moth of the Tortricidae family .
Trachydoras steindachneri is a species of thorny catfish native to the Amazon basin of Bolivia , Brazil , Colombia , Ecuador and Peru .
Musa monticola is a species of wild banana ( genus Musa ) , native to Sabah on the island of Borneo .
Neoscona oaxacensis , known as western spotted orbweaver and zig - zag spider , is a species of spider in the family Araneidae .
Vitreoscilla is a genus of Gram - negative aerobic bacterium .
Festuca filiformis , known by the common names fine - leaf sheep fescue , fine - leaved sheep's - fescue , hair fescue , and slender fescue , is a species of grass .
Berthelinia ganapati is a species of a sea snail with a shell comprising two separate hinged pieces or valves .
Dekeyseria amazonica is a species of armored catfish endemic to Brazil where it is found in the Solimões and Amazon basins .
Kurixalus bisacculus ( common name Taylor 's tree frog and many others ) is a species of frog in the Rhacophoridae family found in Cambodia , China ( Hainan , possibly Yunnan ) , Laos , and Thailand , and possibly in India and Myanmar .
Mochokiella paynei is the only species of catfish ( order Siluriformes ) in the genus Mochokiella of the family Mochokidae .
Werneria ( Smalltongue Toads ) is a genus of fairly small true toads found near fast - flowing steams in Middle and West Africa with the greatest species richness in the Western High Plateau of Cameroon .
Galeodes arabs , common name Egyptian Giant Solpugid or Camel Spider , is a species of solifuges or sun spiders .
Dahlella caldariensis is a species of leptostracan crustacean which lives on hydrothermal vents in the Pacific Ocean .
Morchella deqinensis is a species of fungus in the familyMorchellaceae found in China .
Dicellopyge is an extinct genus of fish from the Triassic .
Lachnaia zoiai is a species of leaf beetles from the subfamily of Cryptocephalinae that inhabits in the southern part of Greece and Crete .
Conasprella ione , common name the ione cone , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Conidae , the cone snails and their allies .
Cycas panzhihuaensis is a rare and endangered species of cycad known in the wild only from Sichuan and Yunnan provinces in China .
Genlisea africana is a species of carnivorous plant in the genus Genlisea .
Habronattus clypeatus is a species of jumping spider which occurs in the United States and Mexico .
Mononchida is an order of nematodes .
The true seal tribe Lobodontini , collectively known as the lobodontine seals , consist of four species of seals in four genera : the crabeater seal ( Lobodon carcinophaga ) , the leopard seal ( Hydrurga leptonyx ) , the Weddell seal ( Leptonychotes weddelli ) , and the Ross seal ( Ommatophoca rossii ) .
Pachydactylus rangei , the Namib sand gecko or web - footed gecko , is a species of small lizard in the family Gekkonidae .
Pagurus hirsutiusculus is a species of hermit crab , commonly called the hairy hermit crab .
Eriogonum gilmanii is a species of wild buckwheat known by the common name Gilman 's buckwheat .
Eremogone cliftoniii is a species of flowering plant in the pink family known by the common name Clifton 's eremogone .
Maxillaria virguncula is a species of orchid endemic to the Venezuelan Antilles and northern Venezuela .
More recently , it has been used as the monotypal species for the genus Nochelesaurus ( it is not clear what the status of Embrithosaurus strubeni is , this may be a further transitional species ) .
The type species is Vinialesaurus caroli , first described as Cryptocleidus caroli by De la Torre and Rojas in 1949 , and redescribed by Gasparini , Bardet and Iturralde in 2002 .
Leptohyphidae is a family of mayflies with some 140 described species in 12 genera .
Melanophryniscus dorsalis is a species of toad in the family Bufonidae which is endemic to the coastal Brazil .
Vandykea tuberculata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , the only species in the genus Vandykea .
Peripsocus bivari is a species of Psocoptera from Peripsocidae family that can be found in Azores and Canary Islands , and sometimes in France and Madeira .
Wittrockia spiralipetala is a species in the genus Wittrockia .
Scorpiodoras heckelii is a species of thorny catfish from the Negro , Orinoco and upper Amazon basins in Brazil and Venezuela .
Myoscolex is an early animal species known from the Cambrian Emu Bay Shale .
Enteropogon is a genus of tropical and subtropical plants in the grass family .
Fragaria moupinensis is a species of strawberry native to China .
Plethodidae is an extinct family of teleost fish that existed during the Late Cretaceous period .
Otospermophilus is a genus of ground squirrels in the family Sciuridae , containing three species .
Limaria fragilis , the fragile file clam , is a species of bivalve mollusc in the family Limidae .
Carex serotina ( little green sedge ) is a species of sedge .
The Himalayan shrike - babbler ( Pteruthius ripleyi ) is a bird species found in the western Himalayas that belongs to the shrike - babbler group .
Gymnogeophagus tiraparae is a species of Geophagine cichlids .
Mastigomycotina is a former polyphyletic taxonomic grouping , a subdivision , of fungi that contained the classes Chytridiomycetes , Hyphochytridiomycetes , and Oomycetes .
Velia caprai , known as the water cricket , is a species of aquatic bug found in Europe .
Ptychoderidae is a family of acorn worms .
Bobasatrania is an extinct genus of prehistoric bony fish that survived the Permian - Triassic extinction event .
Inodrillia acrybia is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Horoclavidae .
Glipostenoda kawasakii is a species of beetle in the Glipostenoda genus .
Uatchitodon is an extinct genus of Late Triassic reptile known only from isolated teeth .
Calathus circumseptus is a species of ground beetle from the Platyninae subfamily that can be found in Albania , France , Greece , Italy , Portugal , Spain , and certain islands .
Ryuthela tanikawai is a species of Ryuthela in the family Liphistiidae .
Ophiclinus pectoralis , the Whiteblotch snakeblenny , is a species of clinid found in reefs around western Australia preferring weedy and sandy areas at depths of about 13 metres ( 43 ft ) .
Hastula hectica , common name the sandbeach auger , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Terebridae , the auger snails .
Conus mustelinus , common name the ermine cone , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Conidae , the cone snails and their allies .
Turbo gruneri , common name the Gruner 's turban , is a species of sea snail , marine gastropod mollusk in the family Turbinidae .
Scartella is a genus of combtooth blennies found in the Atlantic and Indian oceans .
Rugomenes is an Indomalayan genus of potter wasps .
Omnivoropterygidae ( meaning `` omnivorous wings '' ) is a family of primitive avialans known exclusively from the Jiufotang Formation of China .
Aesculus sylvatica ( painted buckeye ) is a species of shrub .
The Platyrhinidae are a family of rays in the order Myliobatiformes , commonly known as thornbacks due to their dorsal rows of large thorns .
In taxonomy , the Thermoplasmataceae are a family of the Thermoplasmatales .
Suaeda is a genus of plants also known as seepweeds and seablites .
Meteoria erythrops is a species of blind cusk eel native to the Atlantic Ocean where it is found at depths of from 4,540 to 5,320 metres ( 14,900 to 17,450 ft ) .
The Azores wood pigeon , Columba palumbus azorica ( Portuguese : pombo - torcaz - dos - açores ) is an endemic subspecies of the common wood pigeon ( Columba palumbus ) , located in the Atlantic Azores islands of Portugal .
Cucumibacter marinus is the only known species of this genus .
Omorgus costatus is a species of beetle of the family Trogidae that occurs in Australia , Tasmania , the Solomon Islands , New Guinea , Vietnam , Java , India , and China .
Allium macleanii is an Asian species of wild onion found at high elevations in Pakistan , Kazakhstan , Turkmenistan , Kyrgyzstan , Afghanistan , Nepal , Tajikistan , and northern India .
Phos senticosus , common name Common Pacific Phos or Thorny Phos , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Buccinidae , the true whelks .
Stlengis is a genus of sculpins native to the northwestern Pacific Ocean where they are only known from the waters around Japan .
Coreopsis rosea is a North American species of tickseeds in sunflower family .
Nyctibatrachus is a genus of frogs endemic to the Western Ghats of southwestern India .
Dinopithecus was an extinct genus of giant baboon ( as big as a grown man ) that lived during the Pliocene of South Africa .
Costentalina elegans is a species of medium - sized tusk shell , a marine scaphopod mollusk in the family Entalinidae .
Stegastes sanctipauli is a species of fish in the Pomacentridae family .
Vagaria is a genus of Mediterranean plants in the Amaryllis family , widely cultivated as an ornamental because of its attractive white flowers .
Mimosaimia fruhstorferi is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Mimosaimia .
Galeandra lacustris is a species of orchid native to Venezuela , Ecuador and Brazil .
It belongs to the sub family Caesalpinioideae and is the only member of the genus Brenierea .
Cicurina japonica is a spider species found in Korea and Japan ( introduced in Europe ) .
Pseudomicrodon is a genus of hoverflies , with 13 known species .
Capetoxotus rugosus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Capetoxotus .
Iteaceae is a flowering plant family of trees and shrubs native to the eastern USA , south eastern Africa , and south and Southeastern Asia .
Dryophiops philippina , also known as the Keel - bellied Whipsnake or simply Philippine Whipsnake , a species of rear - fanged colubrid snake that is endemic to the Philippines .
The origin of the name Neoarius berneyi is Greek , with the genus name Neoarius coming from the words neos meaning new and arios , meaning warlike or hostile , in reference to the well developed fin spines , and the species name , berneyi , comes from the ornithologist F. L. Berney .
Blepharisma is a genus of unicellular ciliate protists found in fresh and salt water .
Aetosauroides ( meaning `` Aetosaurus - like '' ) is an extinct genus of aetosaur from the Late Triassic of South America .
Typha shuttleworthii is a species of cattail found in southern Europe as well as in Iran and Turkey .
Acacia bynoeana , known colloquially as Bynoe 's wattle or tiny wattle , is a species of Acacia native to eastern Australia .
Cheirolepis ( ' hand fin ' ) is an extinct genus of ray - finned fish that lived in the Devonian period of Europe and North America .
Packera ganderi is a rare species of flowering plant in the aster family known by the common name Gander 's ragwort .
Athyma glora is a species of nymphalid butterfly .
Olea capensis ( syn . Olea undulata ) , also known by the common name black ironwood , is an African tree species belonging to the Olive family ( Oleaceae ) .
Rhizomnium dentatum is an extinct species of moss in the family Mniaceae .
Magnolia thailandica is a plant species in the Kmeria section of the genus Magnolia found in Thailand .
Hemidactylus agrius ( Country leaf - toed gecko ) is a species of gecko from the family of Gekkonidae , found in northeastern Brazil .
Grindelia ( gumweed ) is a genus of plants native to the Americas belonging to the sunflower family .
Culex asteliae is a species of mosquito from the Culicidae family that is endemic to New Zealand .
Myrceugenia correifolia is a species of evergreen woody flowering shrub belonging to the Myrtle family , Myrtaceae .
Welcommia is an extinct genus of shark .
Allium daninianum is a species of onion found in Israel , Syria , Lebanon , Palestine and Jordan .
Neoplectrura breedlovei is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Neoplectrura .
Ego zebra is a species of goby native to the Arabian Sea off the coast of Oman where it is found at a depth of about 21 metres ( 69 ft ) inhabiting open waters near small cracks and holes available for refuge .
Viola arborescens is a species of Viola and is also known as the tree violet .
Leurocycloceras is an extinct genus of actively mobile carnivorous cephalopod , essentially a Nautiloid , that lived in what would be North America , Europe , and Asia during the Silurian from 443.7 - -418.7 mya , existing for approximately 25 million years .
Nathalis is a genus of butterflies in the family Pieridae .
Arctostaphylos pungens , with the common name pointleaf manzanita , is a species of manzanita .
Uranophenga lemniscata is a species of sedge moths , and the only species in the genus Uranophenga .
Aspergillus fumigatus is a fungus of the genus Aspergillus , and is one of the most common Aspergillus species to cause disease in individuals with an immunodeficiency .
Procottus gotoi is one of the four species of Procottus , a genus of deepwater sculpins endemic to Lake Baikal , Siberia .
The Somabrachyidae are a family of moths in the order Lepidoptera .
The class Phycomycetes has been abolished and in its place exists Zygomycetes , Chytridiomycetes , Plasmodiophoromycetes , Hyphochytridiomycetes , Trichomycetes ( including Harpellales , Asellariales , Eccrinales and Amoebidiales ) and Oomycetes .
Empusidae is a family consisting of 9 genera of mantises .
Lebia is a genus of predatory ground beetles .
Multilocus allozyme genotype data show that Microphallus turgidus is a single outbred species with high levels of gene flow among South Island populations .
Breizhops is a genus of trilobite in the order Phacopida , which existed in what is now Brittany , France .
Ancula gibbosa , common name Atlantic ancula , is a species of dorid nudibranch .
The Chadwick Beach cotton mouse ( Peromyscus gossypinus restrictus ) is a presumed extinct subspecies of the cotton mouse ( Peromyscus gossypinus ) .
Megazostrodon is the only well - known genus of the family Megazostrodontidae .
Pseudophilautus nanus is an extinct species of frog in the Rhacophoridae family .
Alishewanella is a genus in the phylum Proteobacteria ( bacteria ) .
Canthocamptidae is a family of copepods .
Ascidiella aspersa is a species of solitary sea squirts native to the northeastern Atlantic , from the Mediterranean Sea to Norway .
Endogonopsis is a poorly known fungal genus , provisionally placed in the Diplocystaceae family .
Austrotaxus spicata , the New Caledonia Yew or Southern Yew , is a species of yew , the sole species in the genus Austrotaxus .
Loxococcus rupicola is a species of palm tree , and the only species in the genus Loxococcus .
Halaphritis platycephala is a species of thornfish native to the Indian Ocean waters off of Tasmania where it can be found at depths of from 5 to 13 metres ( 16 to 43 ft ) preferring caves and other low - light habitats .
Erica ventricosa is a species of plant in the Ericaceae family native to South Africa .
Boaedon is a genus of African Lamprophiids consisting of the `` Brown '' House Snakes .
Streptomyces albospinus is a bacterium species from the genus of Streptomyces which has been isolated from soil from the Akita City in Japan .
Eopneumatosuchus is an extinct genus of basal crocodyliform .
Galium grande is a species of flowering plant in the coffee family known by the common name San Gabriel bedstraw .
Inbiocystiscus is a genus of minute sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Cystiscidae .
Bickmorites is an extinct nautiloid cephalopod genus known from the upper Ordovician to the middle Silurian of North America and northern Europe ( Norway ) .
Peltigera aphthosa is a species of lichen known by the common names green dog lichen , leafy lichen , felt lichen , and common freckle pelt .
Acleisanthes parvifolia , common names littleleaf moonpod and Big Bend trumpets , is a plant species native to northeastern Chihuahua and western Texas .
Scincopus is a monotypic genus of skinks , the only accepted species is Scincopus fasciatus .
The Sarcoptidae family of mites contains the genus Sarcoptes .
Polygonum humifusum is an Asian and North American species of plants in the buckwheat family .
South Hills crossbill rarely interbreeds with other call types that move into the South Hills of Idaho yearly , and can be considered to represent a distinct species via ecological speciation .
Ulopa reticulata is the species of bugs from Cicadellidae family .
Acromantis palauana , common name Palau Acromantis , is a species of praying mantis native to Palau .
Purpuradusta fimbriata , common name : the fringed cowry , is a species of sea snail , a cowry , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Cypraeidae , the cowries .
The Papuan parrotfinch ( Erythrura papuana ) is a common species of estrildid finch found in Indonesia 's Papua province and Papua New Guinea .
Hemierana marginata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Hemierana .
Shastasaurus ( `` Mt . Shasta lizard '' ) is an extinct genus of ichthyosaur from the middle and late Triassic , and is the largest marine reptile that has yet been found .
Tanzanonautes tuerkayi is a species of fossil freshwater crab from Tanzania , the only species in the genus Tanzanonautes .
The Sulu pygmy woodpecker ( Picoides ramsayi ) , also known as the Sulu woodpecker , is a species of bird in the Picidae family .
Carex aboriginum is a species of sedge endemic to Idaho in the western United States , known as Indian Valley sedge .
Percina kusha , the bridled darter , is a species of fish in the Percidae family ..
Cedrela fissilis is a species of tree in the family Meliaceae .
Calochortus macrocarpus , also known as sagebrush mariposa lily , is a North American species of bulbous perennials in the Lily family .
Limnonectes is a genus of fork - tongued frogs of about 64 known species , but new ones are still being described occasionally .
The genus Hypsugo contains many bats referred to as pipistrelles or pipistrelle bats .
Antisclerota dicentris is a moth in the Xyloryctidae family , and the only species in the genus Antisclerota .
Rhinactinidia is a genus of Asian plants in the aster tribe within the sunflower family .
Galeichthys ater , the Black sea catfish , is a species of sea catfish found in South Africa and Namibia .
Parastrephia lepidophylla , commonly known as tola or tola tola , is a species of flowering plant in the daisy family .
Quadrula tuberosa , common name the rough rockshell , is a species of freshwater mussel .
Holochilus chacarius , also known as the Chacoan marsh rat or Chaco marsh rat , is a semiaquatic rodent species in the family Cricetidae .
It contains the single species Leucorhodia ragua , which is found in Guatemala .
Macrohammus deyrollei is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Macrohammus .
Compsura is a genus of characins containing two described species .
Nassa serta , common name the sertum rock shell , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Nassariidae , the Nassa mud snails or dog whelks .
Suillus pungens , commonly known as the pungent slippery jack or the pungent suillus , is a species of fungus in the genus Suillus .
Acanthocardia aculeata , common name spiny cockle , is a species of saltwater clams , marine bivalve molluscs in the family Cardiidae .
Nolina greenei , woodland beargrass , is a plant species native to the United States .
It contains only one species , Pareupithecia spadix , which is found in the Russian Far East ( southern Primorje ) , Korea , Japan ( Honshu ) and China ( Shanxi ) .
Cyrtostachys elegans is a flowering plant species in the genus Cyrtostachys .
Psila fimetaria is a European species of fly and member of the family Psilidae .
Panchlora nivea , the Cuban cockroach or green banana cockroach , is a small species of cockroach found in Cuba and the Caribbean , and along the Gulf Coast from Florida to Texas , and has been observed as far north as Summerville , South Carolina .
Cryosophila warscewiczii is a species of flowering plant in the Arecaceae family , endemic to Central America .
Psathyrella spadicea , commonly known as the chestnut brittlestem , is a species of agaric fungus in the family Psathyrellaceae .
Theriodes sandakanensis is a species of loach found only in northern Borneo .
Suillus albidipes is a species of edible mushroom in the genus Suillus native to North America .
Allium massaessylum is a Western Mediterranean species of wild onion native to Spain , Portugal , Morocco , and Algeria .
Calectasia intermedia , commonly known as blue tinsel - lily or eastern tinsel lily is a species of flowering plant in the family Dasypogonaceae , native to the border areas of western Victoria and south - eastern South Australia and flowering in early spring .
Potentilla angelliae is a rare species of flowering plant in the rose family known by the common names Angell cinquefoil and Boulder Mountain cinquefoil .
Brachyopa is a genus of hoverflies whose grey and brown colouration is unusual for this family and these flies can easily be overlooked amongst members of other fly families .
Centaurea phrygia ( wig knapweed ) is a species of Centaurea .
Collinsia linearis is a species of flowering plant in the plantain family known by the common name narrowleaf blue - eyed Mary .
Beringius kenicottii , common name Kenicott 's beringius , is a species of sea snail or true whelk , a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Buccinidae , the true whelks .
The Methylophilaceae are a family of Proteobacteria , given their own order .
Trachyrincus is a genus of rattails in the family Trachyrincidae .
Clypeaster australasiae , the Australasian sand dollar , is a species of sea urchins of the Family Clypeasteridae .
Cardiocondyla zoserka is a species of ant in the genus Cardiocondyla .
The Nerillidae are a family of invertebrates containing these genera :
Glossogobius matanensis is a species of goby endemic to Sulawesi , Indonesia where it is only known from Lake Matano , Lake Mahalona and Lake Towuti .
Conus hyaena , common name the hyena cone , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Conidae , the cone snails and their allies .
Tropaeolum tricolor , the three - coloured Indian cress , is a species of perennial plant in the family Tropaeolaceae .
Cactodera cacti was first discovered in 1932 affecting various species of cactus .
Hoplolaimus is a genus of nematodes known commonly as lance nematodes .
Ardisia solanacea , called shoebutton ardisia in English , is a species of the genus Ardisia in family Primulaceae ( subfamily Myrsinoideae ) .
The Chilostomellacea constitute a superfamily of Foraminifera within the order , Rotaliida .
Megacephala speciosa is a species of ground beetle in the subfamily of Carabinae that was described by Chaudoir in 1860 , and is endemic to Brazil .
Epicrates gracilis , known commonly as the Haitian tree boa , is a species of nonvenomous snake in the Boidae family .
Methanocalculus halotolerans is a species of archaeon , the type species of its genus .
Dalbergia louvelii ( violet rosewood ) is a species of legume in the Fabaceae family .
Florestina is a genus of flowering plants in the sunflower family , native to Texas , Mexico , and Central America .
Ophiotaenia is a genus of tapeworms in the Proteocephalidae family .
Based on differences in bony plates on the head , the presence or absence of gular folds , and head shape , Gambelia sila was reclassified into the genus Gambelia by Smith in 1946 , retaining the species name silus .
The genus Nysius in the insect family Lygaeidae , contains approximately 106 species throughout the world .
Orchis spitzelii is a species of orchid found from Sweden ( Gotland ) , eastern Spain to the Caucasus and northwestern Africa .
The new species was placed in a separate genus , Dinochelus , whose name derives from the Greek roots δεινός ( dinos ) , meaning `` terrible '' or `` fearful '' , and χηλή ( chela ) , meaning `` claw '' .
Diastella is a genus containing seven species of flowering plants , commonly known as `` silkypuffs '' , in the protea family .
Pinus jaliscana , the Jalisco pine , is a species of conifer in the Pinaceae family .
Artemisia absinthium ( absinthium , absinthe wormwood , wormwood , common wormwood , green ginger or grand wormwood ) is a species of Artemisia , native to temperate regions of Eurasia and Northern Africa and widely naturalized in Canada and the northern United States .
Orthotylus halophilus is a species of bug from a family of Miridae that is endemic to the Canary Islands .
Briggera is a genus of diatom known from the fossil record .
Agnosphitys ( /ˌæɡnoʊsˈfaɪtᵻs/ ; `` unknown begetter '' ; sometimes mistakenly called Agnostiphys or Agnosphytis ) is a genus of dinosaur from the Late Triassic of Avon , England .
Scaphopetalum is a genus previously classified under the plant family Sterculiaceae .
Hexagonites is an extinct genus from the nautiloid order , Nautilida which includes the genus Nautilus found living in the tropical western Pacific .
Cassianellidae is a small extinct family of prehistoric bivalves which lived from the Middle Triassic , Ladinian stage through the Late Triassic Norian stage .
Lupinus albicaulis is a species of lupine known by the common name sicklekeel lupine .
Rhabdolepis is an extinct genus of prehistoric bony fish that lived during the Late Permian epoch .
Picea meyeri ( Meyer 's spruce ; Chinese : 白杄 ; pinyin : báiqiān ) is a species of spruce native to Nei Mongol in the northeast to Gansu in the southwest and also inhabiting Shanxi , Hebei and Shaanxi .
Rhodostrophiini is a tribe of the geometer moth family ( Geometridae ) , with about 200 species in 17 genera and five genera tentatively associated with the tribe .
Stein 's rat ( Rattus steini ) , also known as the small spiny rat , is a species of rodent in the family Muridae .
Scopulophila is a small genus of flowering plants in the pink family .
Pristimantis leoni is an endangered species of frog in the Craugastoridae family .
Hippodraco ( `` horse '' ( hippos in Greek ) and `` dragon '' ( draco in Latin ) ) is a genus of herbivorous iguanodontian dinosaur .
Gentiana olivieri ( Chinese : xie wan que qin jiao ) is a plant species in the genus Gentiana found in Asia .
Cerobasis amorosa is a species of Psocoptera from the Trogiidae family that is endemic to Cyprus .
Arthrolycosidae is an extinct family of primitive spiders that bear some resemblance to the wolf spiders .
Anchiceratops ( /ˌæŋkiˈsɛrətɒps/ ANG - key - SERR - ə - tops ) is an extinct genus of chasmosaurine ceratopsid dinosaur that lived approximately 72 to 71 million years ago during the latter part of the Cretaceous Period in what is now Alberta , Canada .
Fucomimus mus , the Mousey klipfish , is a species of clinid found in subtropical waters of the Atlantic Ocean along the South African coast where it occurs in tide pools .
Hemiphlebia mirabilis , commonly known as the ancient greenling , is a species of damselfly in the family Hemiphlebiidae .
Euplica turturina , common name : the turtle dove shell , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Columbellidae , the dove snails .
Chirostoma bartoni , the Alberca silverside , was a species of neotropical silverside endemic to the Lerma River basin of Mexico .
Dissostichus is a genus of cod icefishes found in the southern oceans .
Gagata melanopterus is a species of sisorid catfish endemic to Myanmar where it occurs in the Irrawaddy , Sittang and lower Salween River basins .
Palaemonoidea is a large superfamily of shrimp , containing nearly 1,000 species .
Hyperaulax ridleyi is a species of tropical air - breathing land snail , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Odontostomidae .
Serpula himantioides is a species of fungus that causes damage to timber referred to as dry rot .
Nupserhoglenea cerrutii is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Nupserhoglenea .
Vaccinium hirsutum is a species of flowering plant in the heath family known by the common name hairy blueberry .
Heterophyes nocens is a species of a trematode , or fluke worm , in the family Heterophyidae .
The Deare 's Dendrobium ( Dendrobium dearei ) is a species of orchid of the genus Dendrobium .
Dendrelaphis bifrenalis , commonly Boulenger 's Bronzeback ( Sinhala : පදුරු හාල්දන්ඩා , Paduru Haaldanda in Sinhala ) , is a terrestrial species of diurnal non poisonous snake found in Sri Lanka and southern India .
Hatschbachiella is a genus of South American flowering plants in the daisy family , Asteraceae .
Synodontis congicus is a species of upside - down catfish native to the Democratic Republic of the Congo and the Republic of the Congo where it occurs in the upper and middle Congo Basin .
Myrmecoris gracilis is a species of flightless Hemipteran bug from the family Miridae .
Tapinocephalus ( `` humble head '' ) is a genus of large herbivorous dinocephalian that lived during the Middle Permian Period .
Cleistocactus is a genus of columnar cacti native to mountainous areas - to 3,000 m ( 9,843 ft ) - of Peru , Uruguay , Bolivia and Argentina .
Tibia fusus , common name Spindle tibia or Shinbone Tibia Gastropod , is a species of large sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Strombidae , the true conchs .
Eatonella is a North American genus of plants in the daisy family containing the single known species Eatonella nivea , which is calledby the common name white false tickhead .
Aplocheilichthys sp . nov . ' Naivasha ' was a species of fish in the Poeciliidae family .
Speleophriidae is a family of copepods , comprising seven genera .
Procambarus angustatus was a species of crayfish in the family Cambaridae .
Patagonophorus is a genus of moth in the Pterophoridae family containing only one species , Patagonophorus murinus , which is known from Argentina and Chile .
Rhabdorrhynchus is a genus of weevil found in Central Europe .
Acraea alicia is a member of the Acraea bonasia species group see Acraea .
Jeletzkytes is an extinct genus of scaphatoid ammonite cephalopod mollusc from the Upper Cretaceous ( Maastrichtian ) of North America named and described by Riccardi , 1983 .
Asplundia brunneistigma is a species of largely terrestrial plant ( although sometimes shortly climbing ) belonging to the family Cyclanthaceae .
Pomacea canaliculata , common name the channeled applesnail , is a species of large freshwater snail with gills and an operculum , an aquatic gastropod mollusk in the family Ampullariidae , the apple snails .
Aeger is a genus of fossil prawns .
Phacelia parryi is a species of phacelia known by the common name Parry 's phacelia .
Eragrostis tef , teff , Williams lovegrass , annual bunch grass , taf ( Amharic : ጤፍ ? ṭēff ; Tigrinya : ጣፍ ? ṭaff ) , or xaafii ( Oromo ) , is an annual grass , a species of lovegrass native to Ethiopia and Eritrea .
Squamatoherpia is a genus of pholidoskepian solenogasters , shell - less , worm - like , marine mollusks .
Epidendrum floridense Hágsater ( Florida star orchid ) is a threatened species of orchid native to southern Florida , in the Everglades and in the region around Lake Okeechobee .
Distichodus rufigiensis is a species of freshwater fish in the Distichodontidae family .
Ribes sanguineum , the flowering currant , redflower currant , or red - flowering currant , is North American a species of flowering plant in the family Grossulariaceae , native to western United States and Canada ( British Columbia , Washington , Idaho , Oregon , California ) .
Skimmia laureola is species of shrub grown as an ornamental plant .
The Stenopsychidae are a family of medium to large caddisflies , some of which are noted for their black and gold wing patterns .
Aprosmictus is a genus of parrots in the Psittaculidae family .
Salpa fusiformis , sometimes known as the common salp , is the most widespread species of salp .
Lepas anserifera is a species of goose barnacle or stalked barnacle in the family Lepadidae .
Eurymela is a genus of leafhoppers .
Minaria is a genus of flowering plants formerly belonging to the plant family Asclepiadaceae , now considered to be part of the Apocynaceae , first described as a genus in 2006 .
Masillatrogon is an extinct genus of trogon .
Pseudophistomis pallida is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , the only species in the genus Pseudophistomis .
Onoclea is a genus of plants in the Onocleaceae family , native to moist habitats in eastern Asia and eastern North America .
Megadontognathus is a genus of ghost knifefishes from tropical South America .
Achnatherum nelsonii is a species of grass known by the common names Columbia needlegrass , subalpine needlegrass , and western needlegrass .
Carex rossii , commonly known as Ross 's sedge , is a hardy , monoecious species of sedge that is often a pioneer species in areas with little or no established vegetation , or in places where disturbance has occurred .
Stanhopea avicula is a species of orchid endemic to Panama .
Manorina is a genus of Australian endemic honeyeaters , containing four species : the black - eared miner ( M. melanotis ) the yellow - throated miner ( M. flavigula ) , the noisy miner ( M. melanocephala ) and the bell miner ( M. melanophrys ) .
Megasoma is a rhinoceros beetle genus .
Betta mandor is a species of gourami endemic to the island of Borneo where it is only known from the Indonesian province of Kalimantan Barat where it is found in the Kapuas basin .
Streptococcus iniae is a species of Gram - positive , sphere - shaped bacterium belonging to the genus Streptococcus .
Leptogorgia virgulata , commonly known as the sea whip or colorful sea whip , is a species of soft coral in the family Gorgoniidae .
Agrostis ( bent or bentgrass ) is a large and very nearly cosmopolitan genus of plants in the grass family , found in nearly all the countries in the world .
Bidens cosmoides , commonly known as the cosmosflower beggarticks , is a species of flowering plant in the sunflower family .
Callionymus doryssus is a species of dragonet native to the Pacific waters around Japan .
Bandera virginella is a species of snout moth in the genus Bandera .
Dinoponera lucida is a large queenless species of ant in the subfamily Ponerinae .
Pyrenasaurus is an extinct genus of lizard that includes only one species , the type species Pyrenasaurus evansae , which lived around the Pyrenees mountains during the Late Eocene .
Eonycteris is a genus of megabats found in Asia .
Botrychium boreale , commonly called Northern Moonwort , is a species of fern .
Epischnia thewysi is a species of snout moth in the genus Epischnia .
Scopulariopsis is a genus of anamorphic fungi that are saprobic and pathogenic to animals .
Ogcocephalidae is a family of anglerfish specifically adapted for a benthic lifestyle of crawling about on the seafloor .
Neophrida aurolimbalis is a species of snout moth in the genus Neophrida .
The Black Sea Urchin , Stomopneustes variolaris is a species of sea urchin , the only one in its genus Stomopneustes and only species still alive in its family Stomopneustidae .
Penicillium coprobium is an anamorph fungus species of the genus of Penicillium which produces pyripyropene A , roquefortine C , penicillic acid and patulin .
Rickettsia peacockii is a species of gram negative Alphaproteobacteria of the spotted fever group , identified from Rocky Mountain wood ticks ( Dermacentor andersoni ) .
Sycomacophila is an Afrotropical genus of gall wasps that live on the monoecious fig subgenus , Sycomorus .
It was described by Pribyl and Vanek in 1985 , and the type species is Ibexaspis quattuor , which was originally described under the genus Protopliomerops as the subspecies P. quattuor brevis by Young in 1973 .
Trichalphus pilosus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , the only species in the genus Trichalphus .
Exserohilum inaequale is a species of fungus in the family Pleosporaceae .
Pinus praetermissa , commonly known as McVaugh 's pine , is a species of conifer in the Pinaceae family .
Gonodactylus smithii , the purple spot mantis shrimp , is a species of mantis shrimp of the smasher type .
Lucina pensylvanica , or the Pennsylvania lucine , is a species of bivalve mollusc in the family Lucinidae .
Ranella olearium , common name the wandering triton or the little frog triton or olive trumpet , is a species of large sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Ranellidae , the tritons .
Phyllocladus toatoa , known as Toatoa ( Māori ) or Blue Celery Pine is a species of conifer in the Podocarpaceae family , endemic to New Zealand .
Agaricus californicus is similar in general appearance to many other Agaricus species , especially to A. campestris , A. cupreobrunneus , and A. bisporus , which are commonly collected for the table .
Eulithomyrmex is an extinct genus of ant in the formicid subfamily Agroecomyrmecinae .
Rhododendron wardii ( 黄杯杜鹃 ) is a rhododendron species native to southwestern Sichuan , southeastern Xizang , and northwestern Yunnan in China , where it grows at altitudes of 3000 - -4600 meters .
Cephalanthera , abbreviated Ceph in horticultural trade , is a genus of mostly terrestrial orchids .
Fusinus genticus is a species of predatory sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Fasciolariidae , the spindle snails and tulip snails .
Telema tenella is a species of spider in the family Telemidae .
Vizella is a genus of leaf - inhabiting fungi in the class Dothideomycetes , and the type genus of the family Vizellaceae .
Apocopis is a genus of Asian plants in the grass family , widespread in China , the Indian Subcontinent , and Southeast Asia , including several species endemic to Myanmar ( Burma ) .
Ptecticus is an Old World genus of flies in the family Stratiomyidae .
Chrysomantis cervoides is a species of praying mantis endemic to the Congo River region , formerly called the Zaire River , located in Africa .
Arietitidae is a family of true ammonites that make up part of the superfamily Psilocerataceae .
Actaeomorpha is a genus of crabs in the family Aethridae , containing the following species :
This is a monotypic genus , containing the single species Sphaerodothella danthoniae .
Rosa rubiginosa ( sweet briar , sweetbriar rose , sweet brier or eglantine ; syn . R. eglanteria ) is a species of rose native to Europe and western Asia .
Nausithoe aurea is a species of crown jellyfish found off the southeastern coast of Brazil .
Uramphisopus pearsoni is a species of isopod crustacean in the family Phreatoicidae .
Solanum erianthum is a species of nightshade that is native to southern North America and northern South America .
Bredana is a genus of jumping spiders that occurs in the USA .
Areca gurita is an extant species of single - stemmed palm tree ( genus Areca ) indigenous to the Malaysian state of Sarawak on Borneo .
Proserpinus flavofasciata , the Yellow - banded Day Sphinx , is a species of hawk moth which occurs at the edges of , and in clearings in , boreal and mountain forests across Canada , as far south as Maine and Massachusetts in the east and as far north as Alaska in the west .
Panopea abrupta is an extinct species of large marine bivalve mollusc in the family Hiatellidae .
Soederberghia is a genus of prehistoric lungfish that lived during the late Devonian period .
Dictyostelium is a genus of single- and multi - celled eukaryotic , phagotrophic bacterivores .
Quebecoceras is an extinct genus from the nautiloid order Ellesmerocerida that lived during the Gasconadian Stage at the beginning of the Early Ordovician .
Dolopharoides meruanus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Dolopharoides .
Myrmecium bifasciatum is an ant - mimicking spider species found in Brazil and French Guiana .
Rubus cubitans , the sprawling dewberry , is a rare North American species of flowering plant in the rose family .
Renanthera imschootiana is a species of orchid occurring from the eastern Himalaya to China ( southeastern Yunnan ) and Vietnam .
Edmontosaurus ( /ɛdˌmɒntəˈsɔːrəs/ ed - MON - tə - SAWR - əs ) is a genus of hadrosaurid ( duck - billed ) dinosaur .
Lamprima aenea is a species of beetle in the family Lucanidae , that is found in on Norfolk Island .
Ancylus ashangiensis is a species of very small , air - breathing , freshwater snail or limpet .
Acantholycosa katunensis is a species of wolf spider only known from the Katun Mountain Range in the Russian part of the Altai Mountains .
Buccinoidea is a taxonomic superfamily of very small to large predatory sea snails , marine gastropod mollusks .
Conomurex luhuanus , common name the Strawberry conch , is a species of medium - sized sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Strombidae , the true conchs .
Chronoxenus walshi is a species of ant of the Chronoxenus genus .
Lewisia cantelovii is an uncommon species of flowering plant in the purslane family known by the common name Cantelow 's lewisia .
Paradoxoglanis cryptus is a species of electric catfish endemic to the Democratic Republic of the Congo , where it occurs in the Kagala River .
†Partula callifera was a species of air - breathing tropical land snail , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Partulidae .
Margarites albolineatus is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Margaritidae , the turban snails .
Discosoma ( synonym Actinodiscus ) , commonly known as mushroom coral , sometimes incorrectly as mushroom anemone or disc anemone , are a genus of soft coral native to the Indian ocean , and commonly collected , worldwide , as an easy coral to grow in marine aquaria .
Metopium toxiferum ( poisonwood , Florida poisontree , hog gum ) is a species of flowering tree in the cashew or sumac family , Anacardiaceae , that is native to the American neotropics .
Hanleya is a genus of polyplacophoran mollusc known from Oligocene and Miocene fossils ; it is represented today by a number of species including H. sinica Xu 1990 ( China ) , H. brachyplax ( Brazil ) and H. hanleyi Bean in Thorpe , 1844 ( Chile ) , which feeds on sponges .
Petrotilapia nigra is a species of cichlid endemic to Lake Malawi where it prefers areas with rocky substrates .
Megacephala aequinoctialis is a species of ground beetle in the subfamily of Carabinae that was described by Dejean in 1825 .
Capitulum mitella is the only species in the genus .
`` Candidatus Scalindua '' is a bacterial genus , member of the order Planctomycetes .
Chloris virgata is a species of grass known by the common names feather fingergrass feathery Rhodes - grass and feather windmillgrass .
It consists of only one species , Orthorisma netunaria , which is found in Brunei , Malaysia ( Sabah , Sarawak ) and Indonesia ( Kalimantan , Natuna Islands , Sumatra ) .
Pomaderris vellea , commonly known as Woolly Pomaderris , is a shrub species that is native to the states of New South Wales and Queensland in Australia .
Halesia tetraptera , commonly known as the common silverbell or mountain silverbell ( or Carolina silverbell ; syn . Halesia carolina auct . non L. ) , is a species in the family Styracaceae , native to the southeastern United States .
Hipparion ( Greek , `` pony '' ) is an extinct genus of horse living in North America , Asia , Europe , and Africa during the Miocene through Pleistocene ~23 Mya--781,000 years ago , existing for 22 million years .
Actinomyces radicidentis is a species in the genus of Actinomyces , first isolated from infected root canals of teeth .
Patrobus is a genus of ground beetle native to the Palearctic ( including Europe ) and the Nearctic .
Malasaurus is an extinct genus of therocephalian therapsid which existed in Russia .
It contains the single species Geridixis minx , which is found in Panama .
Thrixspermum saruwatarii is a species of orchid native central and southern Taiwan .
Prolagus osmolskae is an extinct species in the genus Prolagus .
Gemmata obscuriglobus is a Gram - negative , aerobic , heterotrophic , motile bacterium of the phylum Planctomycetes , first described in 1984 as the only described species in the genus Gemmata .
Anakamacops ( meaning `` similar to Kamacops '' in Greek ) is a genus of dissorophid temnospondyl from the early Middle Permian of China .
Paris polyphylla is an Asian species of plants native to China , the Indian Subcontinent , and Indochina .
Arbutus tessellata is a Mexican species of shrubs in the heath family .
Astragalus pauperculus is an uncommon species of milkvetch known by the common name depauperate milkvetch .
Androcymbium is a genus of perennial flowering plants first described as a genus in 1808 .
Thospia permixtella is a species of snout moth in the genus Thospia .
Siparuna is a genus of plants belonging to the family Siparunaceae .
Gaurotinus tenuelineatus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Gaurotinus .
Lucina amiantus , or the decorated lucine , is a species of bivalve mollusc in the family Lucinidae .
Adenia pechuelii is a species of plant in the family Passifloraceae .
Astragalus nutans is a species of milkvetch known by the common name Providence Mountains milkvetch .
Vitex gaumeri ( also called Fiddlewood , Walking Lady , or Yax - nik ) is a species of plant in the Verbenaceae family .
Viola chamissoniana is a species of flowering plant in the violet family known by the common name ' Olopu .
Metanephrops japonicus is a species of lobster found in Japanese waters , and a gourmet food in Japanese cuisine .
Morawanocetus is a genus of extinct primitive baleen whale from the family Aetiocetidae that existed during the Chattian epoch of the late Oligocene period .
Papilio horribilis is a member of the hesperus species - group . The members of the clade are Papilio hesperus Westwood , 1843 Papilio euphranor Trimen , 1868 Papilio horribilis Butler , 1874 Papilio pelodurus Butler , 1896
Pseudoneoponera is a ponerine genus of ants found from India to Australia .
Cathyalia pallicostalis is a species of snout moth in the genus Cathyalia .
Alcyonium digitatum or dead man 's fingers is a species of soft coral in the Alcyoniidae family .
Isoetes toximontana is a plant species native to the Northern Cape and Western Cape regions of South Africa .
Allium yanchiense is a plant species endemic to China , reported from Gansu , Hebei , Nei Mongol , Ningxia , Qinghai , Shaanxi and Shanxi .
Dicranosterna is a genus of beetles of leaf beetle , in the subfamily Chrysomelinae .
Acanthoponera is a Neotropical genus of ants in the subfamily Heteroponerinae .
Nannostomus digrammus , commonly known as the twostripe pencilfish , is a freshwater species of fish belonging to the Lebiasinidae family of characins .
Plesiochelyidae is an extinct family of turtles in the cryptodira suborder .
Arthuria alcatraziensis is a species of calcareous sponge in the genus Arthuria from Brazil .
Mimocornuscoparia chassoti is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Mimocornuscoparia .
Agaricocrinus americanus , the mushroom crinoid , is a species of extinct crinoid , known only from its fossils , which are found in the U.S. states of Indiana , Tennessee and Kentucky .
Acroporidae is a family of small polyped stony corals in the phylum Cnidaria .
Hemiargyrophylax punctilucis is a species of tachinid flies in the genus Hemiargyrophylax of the family Tachinidae .
Thickly snouted pipefish , Syngnathus variegatus , is a pipefish species , inhabits the Black Sea and Sea of Azov .
Ribes amarum is a species of currant known by the common name bitter gooseberry .
Eledone moschata , the musky octopus , is a species of octopus that lives in the Mediterranean Sea .
Pyroteuthidae ( the fire squids ) is a family of squids .
Perileptus areolatus is a species of brown coloured ground beetle in the Trechinae subfamily .
Prionomyrmex is an extinct genus of bulldog ants in the subfamily Myrmeciinae of the family Formicidae .
Orthotylus paulinoi is a species of bug in the Miridae family that is endemic to Portugal .
Perischoechinoidea is a subclass of primitive sea urchins that were abundant in the Palaeozoic seas .
Tudivasum zanzibaricum , common name the Zanzibar tudicula , is a species of large sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the subfamily Vasinae , the vase shells , within the family Turbinellidae .
Phyllostegia parviflora is a rare species of flowering plant in the mint family known by the common name smallflower phyllostegia .
Miomelon alarconi , commonly known as the Alarcon volute is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Volutidae , the volutes .
Croton wigginsii is a species of croton known by the common name Wiggins ' croton .
Pseudobahia bahiifolia is a rare species of flowering plant in the aster family known by the common name Hartweg 's golden sunburst .
Megalachne is a genus of Chilean plants in the grass family , found only on the Juan Fernández Islands in the Pacific Ocean , part of the Republic of Chile .
Procambarus zonangulus , the white river crawfish , white river crayfish or southern white river crayfish , is a species of freshwater crayfish .
Nanorana medogensis ( common name : Medog spiny frog ) is a species of frog in the Dicroglossidae family .
Eleutherodactylus rufescens ( Spanish : Rana - fisgona Roja ) is a species of frog in the Eleutherodactylidae family .
Euglandina singleyana , common name the `` striate glandina '' or `` striate wolfsnail '' , is a species of predatory air - breathing land snail , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Spiraxidae .
Aspidura deraniyagalae , commonly known as Deraniyagala 's rough - sided snake , Sri Lanka rough - sided snake , and කදු මැඩිල්ලා ( kandu medilla ) in Sinhala , is a colubrid species endemic to Sri Lanka .
Apareiodon is a genus of scrapetooths from South America where they are found as far south as Río de la Plata .
Eryma is a genus of fossil lobster - like crustaceans , containing 44 species .
Gooloogongia ( /ɡʊlʉˈɡɒŋɡiə/ GUU - luu - GONG - gee - ə ) is a genus of prehistoric lobe - finned fish which belonged to the group of Rhizodont fishes .
Allium textile ( prairie onion or textile onion ) is a common species of wild onion found in the central part of North America .
Melbournopterus is a genus of prehistoric chelicerate or brachiopod , known from the Upper Silurian of Australia .
Argonauta cornuta is a species of pelagic octopus belonging to the genus Argonauta .
Camptostoma is a small genus of tyrant flycatchers .
The Vedian prickly thrift ( Acantholimon vedicum ) is a species of leadwort that is endemic to central Armenia , and is only found in the Yerevan floristic region , on the limestone massif Erakh between elevations of 900 - -1,000 m , close to the city of Vedi .
Eucrosia is a genus of herbaceous , perennial and bulbous plants in the Amaryllis family ( Amaryllidaceae , subfamily Amaryllidoideae ) distributed from Ecuador to Peru .
Pristurus is a genus of geckos endemic to Arabia and Socotra Island as well as the Middle East and the Horn of Africa .
Ganorhynchus is an extinct genus of prehistoric lungfish from the Devonian period .
Stylidium divaricatum , known by the vernacular name daddy - long - legs , is a species in the genus Stylidium that is endemic to Western Australia .
Syzygium sandwicense is a species of flowering plant in the myrtle family , Myrtaceae , that is endemic to Hawaii .
Tachina discifera is a species of fly in the genus Tachina of the family Tachinidae that is endemic to Maluku province of Indonesia .
Philodendron speciosum is a species of plant in the Araceae family , native to Brazil and Bolivia .
Anthurium andraeanum is a flowering plant species in the Araceae family .
Myrmecodaptria ( meaning `` ant eater '' in Greek ) is an extinct genus of scleroglossan lizard from the Late Cretaceous Djadokhta Formation in Ukhaa Tolgod , Mongolia .
Larocheopsis macrostoma is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk or micromollusk in the family Larocheidae .
Passiflora ligularis , commonly known as the sweet granadilla or grenadia , is a plant species in the Passiflora genus .
Euryoryzomys lamia , also known as the buffy - sided oryzomys or monster rice rat , is a species of rodent in the genus Euryoryzomys of family Cricetidae .
Cotinis beraudi is a species of Cotinis scarab .
Mesonauta is a small genus of cichlids native to soft , acidic freshwater habitats in South America .
Herina palustris is a species of picture - winged fly in the genus Herina of the family Ulidiidae .
Acropora irregularis is a species of acroporid coral found in the northern and southwestern Indian Ocean , the Solomon Islands , the central Indo - Pacific , the East China Sea , and Japan .
Scytodoidea is a taxon of araneomorph spiders , at the rank of superfamily .
Bursera simaruba , commonly known as gumbo - limbo , copperwood , chaca , and turpentine tree , is a tree species in the family Burseraceae , native to tropical regions of the Americas from the southeasternmost United States ( southern Florida ) south through Mexico and the Caribbean to Brazil , Jinotega and Venezuela .
Allium griffithianum is an Asian species of onion found in the high mountains of Pakistan , Afghanistan , Kyrgyzstan , Uzbekistan and Tajikistan .
Lycodon is a genus of colubrid snakes , commonly known as wolf snakes .
Drassodes cupreus is a species of spider in the genus Drassodes , family Gnaphosidae .
Rhagio mystaceus , also known as the down - looker fly , downlooker snipefly and common snipe fly , is a species of flies from the family Rhagionidae .
Phalaris minor is a species of grass native to North Africa , Europe , and South Asia .
Ursinoscorpaenopsis kitai is a species of scorpionfish native to the Pacific Ocean waters around Japan .
Jacquinia pungens ( syn . Jacquinia macrocarpa subsp . pungens ) is a species of flowering plant in the family Theophrastaceae , native to southern Mexico .
Stanhopea graveolens is a species of orchid occurring from Mexico to Honduras .
It contains only one species , Cleptotypodes ledereri , which is found in France , Italy , Romania and Russia .
Anopheles albimanus is a species of mosquito in the order Diptera .
Incilius chompipe is a species of toad in the family Bufonidae , known from several localities near Cascajal in the Cerro Chompipe and in the Reserva Dantas , both in the Cordillera Central of Costa Rica .
Pediocactus knowltonii is a rare species of cactus known by the common names Knowlton 's miniature cactus , Knowlton 's pincushion cactus , and Knowlton 's minute cactus .
Berroa is a monotypic genus of flowering plants in the aster family , Asteraceae , containing the single species Berroa gnaphalioides .
Currently , two species are placed in the recently established genus Nadzikambia ( derived from the species ' name in Chichewa ) .
The genus includes one species , Killikaike blakei , that lived in Argentina during the Early Miocene .
Allium parryi is a North American species of wild onion known by the common names Parry 's onion and Parry 's fringed onion .
Streptomyces collinus is a bacterium species from the genus of Streptomyces which has been isolated from soil in Baden in Germany .
Saiphos is a monotypic genus of skinks .
Ribes hudsonianum is a North American species of currant , known by the common name northern black currant .
Herrania is a genus of flowering plants in the family Sterculiaceae .
Eusphaerium purpureum is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Eusphaerium .
Luidia australiae , the southern sand star , is a species of starfish in the family Luidiidae .
Athous balcanicus is a species of click beetle from Elateridae family which is endemic to Bulgaria .
The Annonaceae are a family , the custard apple family , of flowering plants consisting of trees , shrubs , or rarely lianas .
Euphorbia garberi ( syn . Chamaesyce garberi ) is a rare species of flowering plant in the euphorb family known by the common name Garber 's spurge .
Enteroplax yaeyamensis is a species of air - breathing land snail , terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusks in the family Strobilopsidae .
Malacolimax wiktori is a species of air - breathing land slug , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Limacidae , the keelback slugs .
Hyloscirtus is a genus of relatively large Neotropical frogs in the Hylidae family .
Carpilioidea is a superfamily of crabs containing a single extant family , Carpiliidae and three extinct families .
The superorder Elopomorpha contains a variety of types of fishes that range from typical silvery - colored species , such as the tarpons and ladyfishes of the Elopiformes and the bonefishes of the Albuliformes , to the long and slender , smooth - bodied eels of the Anguilliformes .
Ertzica morosella is a species of snout moth in the genus Ertzica .
Solemydidae is an extinct family of turtles .
Entomophaga nigrohalterata is a species of tachinid flies in the genus Entomophaga of the family Tachinidae .
Populus tremuloides is a deciduous tree native to cooler areas of North America , one of several species referred to by the common name Aspen .
Leptoglossus oppositus is one of a variety of species of leaf - footed bug .
Lycodon cavernicolus , also known as Gua Wang Burma wolf snake , is a species of colubrid snake found in peninsular Malaysia .
Carex mariposana is a species of sedge known by the common name Mariposa sedge .
Artemisia pattersonii , also known as Patterson sagewort or Patterson 's wormwood , is a species of North American plants in the sunflower family .
Macrobaenidae is an extinct family of turtles in Centrocryptodira .
Notoncus is an Australian genus of ants in the subfamily Formicinae .
Holst 's frog ( Babina holsti ) is a species of frog in the Ranidae family .
Jacksonia sternbergiana , commonly known as stinkwood or green stinkwood , is a species of shrub or small tree that occurs in the south - west of Western Australia .
Deinopis longipes is a species of net - casting spider ( family Deinopidae ) .
Aparallactus werneri , or the Usambara centipede - eater , is a species of venomous rear - fanged snake in the Atractaspididae family .
Lupinus shockleyi is a species of lupine known by the common name purple desert lupine .
Hibiscadelphus giffardianus ( Kilauea hau kuahiwi ) is a species of flowering plant in the mallow family , Malvaceae , that is endemic to the Big Island of Hawaii .
Caesalpinia paraguariensis ( the Guayacaú Negro or Ibirá - Berá ) is a species of legume in the Fabaceae family .
The Acroceridae are a small family of odd - looking flies .
The Bougainville bush warbler or odedi ( Horornis haddeni ) is a bird species initially placed in the `` Old World warbler '' assemblage , but nowadays moved with its congeners to the new cettiid warbler family .
Anterhynchium is an afrotropical , indomalayan , Australian and palearctic genus of potter wasps .
Oxydisia hyperythrella is a species of snout moth in the genus Oxydisia .
Mandragora autumnalis , known as mandrake or autumn mandrake , is recognized by some sources as a separate species from Mandragora officinarum , although with different circumscriptions .
Xanthodaphne egregia is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Dahbiah .
Cymbonotus is a genus of flowering plants in the daisy family from southern Australia .
Arene riisei is a species of small sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Areneidae .
Lophopogonius crinitus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Lophopogonius .
The bacterial species Pseudomonas melophthora , can be found in the apple maggot , Rhagoletis pomonella .
Kalophryganeidae was a extinct family in the order Trichoptera .
Restrepia roseola , the Rosy Restrepia , is a species of orchid endemic to Venezuela .
Helix mazzullii , also known as Cantareus mazzullii or Cornu mazzullii , is a species of large , edible , air - breathing land snail , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Helicidae , the typical snails .
Glaphyromorphus is a genus of lizards in the skink family ( Scincidae ) .
Zilla diodia is an orb - weaver spider species found from Europe to Azerbaijan .
Musculium lacustre is a species of freshwater bivalve from family Sphaeriidae .
Xeneretmus is a genus of poachers native to the eastern Pacific Ocean .
The Verapaz shrew ( Sorex veraepacis ) is a species of mammal in the family Soricidae .
Procaris hawaiana is a species of shrimp in the family Procarididae , from Maui , Hawaii .
Alfalfa mosaic virus ( AMV ) , also known as Lucerne mosaic virus or Potato calico virus , is a worldwide distributed phytopathogen that can lead to necrosis and yellow mosaics on a large variety of plant species , including commercially important crops .
Oxyophthalmellus rehni is a species of praying mantis found in Kenya and Somalia .
Aquilonastra conandae is a species of starfish from the Asterinidae family found near the Mascarene Islands in the Indian Ocean .
Belosaepia , occasionally incorrectly Belosepia , is a genus of cuttlefish - like cephalopod known from the Eocene .
Teleocichla is a small genus of cichlid endemic to the Tapajós , Xingu and Tocantins basins , which are part of the Amazon River Basin in South America .
Polemonium occidentale is a species of flowering plant in the phlox family known by the common names western polemonium and western Jacob's - ladder .
Erica carnea ( winter heath , winter flowering heather , spring heath , alpine heath ; syn . E. herbacea , E. mediterranea ) is a species of flowering plant in the family Ericaceae native to mountainous areas of central and southern Europe , where it grows in coniferous woodlands or stony slopes .
Ptychohyla dendrophasma is a species of frog in the Hylidae family found in Guatemala and possibly Mexico .
Brachymenes is a small neotropical genus of potter wasps currently containing two species , the primarily Andean species B. wagnerianus and the lowland species B. dyscherus .
Loeseliastrum depressum ( formerly Ipomopsis depressa ) is a species of flowering plant in the phlox family known by the common name depressed ipomopsis .
Camponotus silvestrii is a species of carpenter ant in the genus Camponotus .
Panicum dichotomiflorum , known by the common names fall panicgrass , autumn millet ( Britain and Ireland ) , and fall panicum is a species of Poaceae `` true grass '' .
Gibberula punctilum is a species of minute sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Marginellidae family , sometimes instead placed in the family Cystiscidae .
Perotis unicolor , common name green jewel beetle , is a species of beetles belonging to the Buprestidae family .
The phylum Bacteroidetes is composed of three large classes of Gram - negative , nonsporeforming , anaerobic or aerobic , and rod - shaped bacteria that are widely distributed in the environment , including in soil , sediments , and sea water , as well as in the guts and on the skin of animals .
Aiphanes eggersii , known locally as Corozo , is a species of spiney , pinnately leaved palm which is endemic to the coastal plain of Ecuador .
Galeichthys is a genus of sea catfishes ( order Siluriformes ) .
Quercus myrtifolia ( myrtle oak ) is a North American species of oaks in the beech family .
Panicum hemitomon is a species of grass known by the common name maidencane .
Schizachyrium condensatum is a species of grass known by the English common names Colombian bluestem , bush beardgrass , and little bluestem , and the Spanish common names aguará ruguay and yerba barbuda .
Neorufalda pullella is a species of snout moth , and the only species in the genus Neorufalda .
Entheus priassus is a species of skipper butterfly from Central and South America .
The Hoplias aimara , also known as Anjumara , Anjoemara and Wolf Fish , is a species of freshwater fish found in the rivers of South America .
Joannesia princeps ( common names : arara nut - tree , andá - açu ) is a species of moderate - sized tree in the Euphorbiaceae family , with a spreading canopy , large alternate and long petioled leaves , and coarse branches .
Lygaeus equestris , common name Black - and - Red - bug , is a species of ground bugs belonging to the family Lygaeidae , subfamily Lygaeinae .
Solenopsidini ( meaning `` pipe - faced '' ) is a tribe of myrmicine ants with about 20 genera .
Cyrtopodion brachykolon is a species of gecko , also known as `` bent - toed gecko '' .
Phyllonotus pomum , common name the `` apple murex '' , is a species of large sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Muricidae , the murex snails or rock snails .
Lyctus brunneus is a species of beetle in the family Bostrichidae .
Hipposcarus longiceps is a species of ray - finned fish in the Scaridae family .
Ceratarges was a genus of Lichidan Trilobite from the Middle to Late Devonian .
The family Castoridae contains the two living species of beavers and their fossil relatives .
Daphne arbuscula is a species of flowering plant in the family Thymelaeaceae , native only to the Slovakia .
Brachycerinae is a weevil subfamily in the family Brachyceridae .
Calamus gibbsianus is a species of Rattan palm in the genus Calamus endemic to the Malaysian States of Sarawak and Sabah on the island of Borneo .
Pseudagrion caffrum , the springwater sprite is a species of damselfly in the family Coenagrionidae .
Cirripectes vanderbilti , the Scarface blenny , is a species of combtooth blenny found in coral reefs in the Hawaiian and Johnston islands in the eastern central Pacific ocean .
Eutaeniichthys gilli is a species of goby native to brackish waters of the northwestern Pacific Ocean from around Japan , the Korean Peninsula and the Yellow Sea .
Micropterix erctella is a species of moth belonging to the family Micropterigidae that was described by Walsingham , Lord Thomas de Grey , in 1919 .
Sphagnum affine , the imbricate bogmoss , is a species of peat moss or sphagnum moss which is exploited to make commercial peat products .
Acatochaeta africana is a species of flies in the family Ulidiidae , and the only species in the genus Acatochaeta .
Polygonum ramosissimum is a North American species of herbaceous annual plants in the buckwheat family , widespread across much of Canada and the United States , where it is commonly called bushy knotweed .
Conolophus marthae , the Galápagos pink land iguana , is a species of lizard of the Iguanidae family .
Marasmodes is a genus of South African shrubs in the chamomile tribe within the daisy family .
Conus cinereus , common name the sunburnt cone , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Conidae , the cone snails and their allies .
Hydrobius is a genus of hydrophilid beetles that contains nine species distributed throughout the Holarctic ecozone .
Campylopus introflexus , the heath star moss , is a species of moss .
Selaginella lepidophylla ( syn . Lycopodium lepidophyllum ) is a species of desert plant in the spikemoss family ( Selaginellaceae ) .
Erythroxylum novogranatense is a neotropical species of Erythroxylum ( Erythroxylaceae ) .
Linnaea amabilis , formerly known as Kolkwitzia amabilis /kɒlˈkwɪtsi.ə əˈmæbᵻlɪs/ is a species of flowering plant in the family Caprifoliaceae .
This is a monotypic genus , containing the single species Retrostium amphiroae , described as new to science from Japan in 1997 .
Microtropis wallichiana is a species of small tree in the Celastraceae family .
Conringia orientalis is a species of flowering plant in the mustard family known by the common name hare 's ear mustard .
Hygrobatoidea is a superfamily of water mites found in North America .
Osteomeles subrotunda is a species of plant native to China and the Ryukyu islands of Japan .
The species Lavocatia alfambrensis is known from the Barremian ( Lower Cretaceous)-age strata of Galve , Spain .
Phaonia pallida is a species of fly which is distributed across parts the Palaearctic .
Trichomycterus anhanga is a species of pencil catfish endemic to Brazil , where it occurs in the Amazon river basin in the state of Amazonas .
It was described by Rebel in 1934 , and contains the species Incurvarites alienella .
Odontesthes is a genus of neotropical silversides .
Hierodula majuscula is a species of praying mantis in the genus Hierodula .
Heliamphora ciliata is a species of Marsh Pitcher Plant endemic to Venezuela .
