The East Atlantic peacock wrasse ( Symphodus tinca ) is a species of wrasse native to the eastern Atlantic Ocean from Spain to Morocco and in the coastal waters of the Mediterranean Sea and the Black Sea .
Callinectes ornatus is a species of swimming crab in the genus Callinectes .
Microdon analis , is a species of hoverfly .
The Apodida is an order of littoral to deep - sea , largely infaunal holothurians .
Phacelia thermalis is a species of phacelia known by the common names heated phacelia and hot spring phacelia .
Leucothecium is a genus of fungi within the Onygenaceae family .
Hololeius ceylanicus is a species of beetle in the family Carabidae , the only species in the genus Hololeius .
Paracanthocobitis aurea also known as the Barred zipper loach is a species of ray - finned fish in the genus Paracanthocobitis .
Ground beetles are a large , cosmopolitan family of beetles , Carabidae , with more than 40,000 species worldwide , around 2,000 of which are found in North America and 2,700 in Europe .
Parexus is an extinct genus of acanthodian fish .
Lactobacillus fermentum is a Gram - positive species of bacterium in the genus Lactobacillus .
Brachyelosoma mindanaonis is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Brachyelosoma .
Elasmosauridae was a family of plesiosaurs .
The Tasmanian emu ( Dromaius novaehollandiae diemenensis ) is an extinct subspecies of the emu .
Glyceria notata , the plicate sweet - grass or marked glyceria , is a species of rhizomatous , tufted , perennial grasses in the mannagrass genus , found in all continents of the world .
Trichocladus goetzei is a species of plant in the Hamamelidaceae family .
Mabuya is a genus of long - tailed skinks restricted to species from the Americas .
The Altai birch mouse ( Sicista napaea ) is a species of rodent in the family Dipodidae .
The Antiguan racer is a snake which belongs to the family Didsadidae , which includes about half of the world 's known snake species .
Rhodanthe anthemoides , commonly known as chamomile sunray , is a perennial species of the daisy family Asteraceae .
Eimeria fraterculae is a species of protist belonging to the family Eimeriidae .
Conasprella rutila , common name the burnished cone , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Conidae , the cone snails and their allies .
Acmispon brachycarpus ( formerly Lotus humistratus ) is a species of legume known by the common name foothill deervetch .
Millieriidae is a small family of insects in the lepidopteran order .
Chromis iomelas is a species of reef dwelling fish in the family Pomacentridae .
Paramoera is a genus of amphipods in the family Pontogeneiidae .
Megachile albonotata is a bee species in the genus Megachile found notably in Spain .
Procolobus is the genus of the red colobus monkeys and the olive colobus .
Cyclosia is a genus of zygaenid moth that has a mimicry complex with the Milkweed butterfly .
Sorbus leyana ( also called Ley 's Whitebeam ) is a species of plant in the Rosaceae family .
Triplophysa furva is a species of stone loach in the genus Triplophysa endemic to China .
Caesio is a genus of fish in the family Caesionidae , the fusiliers .
Hyperothrix orophura is a species of millipede in the family Pyrgodesmidae .
Plectrophenax is a small genus of passerine birds of the longspur family Calcariidae .
Citharinops distichodoides is a species of lutefish found in tropical Africa .
Hemirhabdorhynchus is an extinct genus of prehistoric Actinopterygii , or ray - finned fish , that lived from the early to middle Eocene .
†Anozygidae is an extinct family of fossil sea snails , marine gastropod mollusks in the clade Caenogastropoda .
Strongylopus is a genus of pyxicephalid frogs native to Africa .
Its only described species , Pseudofluda pulcherrima , is found in Brazil .
Palafoxia , palafox , is a genus of North American flowering plants in the Bahia tribe within the ( sunflower family ) .
Sturisoma aureum is a species of armored catfish endemic to Colombia where it is found in the Magdalena , San Jorge and Cesar River basins .
Lindera aggregata is a plant species belonging to the Lindera genus .
The South African giraffe or Cape giraffe ( Giraffa camelopardalis giraffa ) is a subspecies of giraffe native to Southern Africa .
Iris narzykulovi a species of praying mantis found in Tadschikistan .
Synodontis acanthomias is a species of upside - down catfish native to the Congo Basin of Cameroon , the Central African Republic , the Democratic Republic of the Congo and the Republic of the Congo .
Subuluridae is a family of spirurian nematodes which , together with the two species of Maupasinidae , make up the superfamily Subuluroidea .
The Shining Gossamerwing , ( Euphaea splendens ) , is a species of damselfly in family Euphaeidae .
Myrtella is a genus of plants in the Myrtaceae described as a genus in 1877 .
Chilocarpus is a genus of plant in family Apocynaceae , first described as a genus in 1823 .
Carex pellita is a species of sedge known by the common name woolly sedge .
Erigeron vicinus is a North American species of flowering plant in the daisy family known by the common names neighbor fleabane and border fleabane .
Potamochoerus ( meaning `` river pig '' ) is a genus in the pig family ( Suidae ) .
Karotomorpha is a genus of parasite with a flagellum structure .
Lomatium lucidum is a species of flowering plant in the carrot family known by the common name shiny biscuitroot .
Latrodectus elegans is a species of `` widow spider '' endemic to East Asia .
Trivirostra pellucidula , common name the riceys , is a species of small sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Triviidae , the false cowries or trivias .
Cteniopus sulphureus is a species of comb - clawed beetles belonging to the family Tenebrionidae subfamily Alleculinae .
Pratylenchus is a genus of nematodes known commonly as lesion nematodes .
Erigeron serpentinus is a rare species of flowering plant in the daisy family known by the common names serpentine fleabane and serpentine daisy .
Ceroxys munda is a species of picture - winged fly in the genus Ceroxys of the family Ulidiidae found in Hungary , Slovakia , the Czech Republic , Ukraine , and Russia .
It contains only one species , Stryphnodes styracopa , which is found in Sri Lanka .
Rhabdopleura normani is a small , marine species of worm - shaped animal .
The other A. ( Pseudamaltheus ) , sometimes expressed as genus , is a late derivative of ( Amaltheus ) with an early loss of keel and ribbing and an extreme development of strigation .
The mangrove murex ( Chicoreus capucinus ) is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Muricidae , the murex snails or rock snails .
Muhlenbergia racemosa is a species of grass known by the common names green muhly and marsh muhly .
Tremellodendron is a genus of fungi in the family Sebacinaceae .
Neorapana grandis is a species of large predatory tropical sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusks in the family Muricidae , the rock snails .
Dasyhelea is a genus of biting midges and the only genus of its subfamily , the Dasyheleinae .
Lophotriccus is a genus of bird in the tyrant flycatcher family .
Anomiopus howdeni is a species of true dung beetle that can be found in Brazil and French Guiana .
Neominois carmen , the Joboni Satyr , is a species of butterfly in the Nymphalidae family .
Rhododendron alutaceum is a rhododendron species native to Tibet and southwestern China ( western Sichuan , southeastern Xizang , and northwestern Yunnan ) , where it grows at altitudes of 3200 - -4300 meters .
The eremomelas are a genus , Eremomela , of passerines in the cisticola family Cisticolidae .
Triacanthagyna septima , the pale green darner , is a species of dragonfly in the family Aeshnidae .
Chromatium is a genus of photoautotrophic Gram - negative bacteria which are found in water .
Crepidotus versutus , commonly known as the evasive agaric , is a species of fungi in the family Crepidotaceae .
Baniwa is a genus of moths in the Sphingidae family , containing only one species , Baniwa yavitensis , which is known from Venezuela and Amazonas and Pará in Brazil .
Dactyloscopus insulatus is a species of sand stargazer .
Fritillaria pyrenaica is a species of flowering plant in the family Liliaceae , native to the Pyrenees in Spain and France .
Sarcococca hookeriana is a species of evergreen shrub or groundcover , also known as `` Himalayan Sweet Box '' .
Neuwiedia griffithii is a species of orchid that occurs from Vietnam , peninsular Malaysia to northern Sumatra .
The taxonomic order Rhynchonellida is one of the two main groups of living articulate brachiopods , the other being the order Terebratulida .
Rhabdalestes leleupi is a species of fish in the Alestidae family .
Mulgedium is a genus of flowering plants in the dandelion tribe within the sunflower family .
Zabrus oertzeni is a species of ground beetle in the Pelor subgenus that is endemic to Crete .
Gymnolaemata are a class Bryozoans .
Mucronella pendula is a species of fungus in the family Clavariaceae .
Labrisomus jenkinsi , Jenkin 's blenny , is a species of labrisomid blenny endemic to the Galapagos Islands where it seems to inhabit areas with rocky substrates .
Hylarana attigua is a species of true frog in the genus Hylarana native to Laos and Vietnam .
Plantago nivalis is a species of plantain which is found in the Sierra Nevada of Spain .
Selenicereus spinulosus is a cactus species native to eastern Mexico and , possibly , the lower Rio Grande Valley of Texas in the United States .
Ambrosina is a genus in the family Araceae that consists of only one species , Ambrosina bassii , and the only genus in the tribe Ambrosineae .
Conus biancae , common name Bianca 's cone , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Conidae , the cone snails and their allies .
Pinguicula , commonly known as the butterworts , is a genus of carnivorous plants that use sticky , glandular leaves to lure , trap , and digest insects in order to supplement the poor mineral nutrition they obtain from the environments .
Actia infantula is a Palearctic species of fly in the family Tachinidae .
Goya stictella is a species of moth belonging to the family Pyralidae .
Fallugia is a monotypic genus of shrub containing the single species Fallugia paradoxa , which is known by the common names Apache plume and ponil .
Cylindracanthus is an extinct genus of Cretaceous bony fish , belonging to the Actinopterygii .
Lupinus flavoculatus is a species of lupine known by the common name yelloweyes , or yellow - eyed lupine .
Enterovirus D is a species of enterovirus which causes disease in humans .
Solidago buckleyi , Buckley 's goldenrod , is a species of goldenrod native to central North America .
The Rose - Fruited Banksia ( Banksia laricina ) is a species of shrub in the plant genus Banksia endemic to southwestern Western Australia .
It is the sole species in the genus Leucosidea .
Fluminicola nuttallianus , common name dusky pebblesnail , is a possibly extinct species of freshwater snail with an operculum , an aquatic gastropod mollusk in the family Lithoglyphidae .
Colepiocephale is a genus of pachycephalosaurid dinosaur from Late Cretaceous ( middle Campanian stage ) deposits of Alberta , Canada .
Lodderena pulchella is a species of minute sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Skeneidae .
Abdominea minimiflora , or the Tiny - flowered Abdominea , is a very rare monopodial epiphytic orchid species and the only species of the monospecific genus Abdominea .
Carabus gebleri is a species of beetle found in Russia and Kazakhstan .
Ceylonthelphusa is a genus of freshwater crabs endemic to Sri Lanka , where they live in moist lowland forests , swamps and rivers .
Jacobaea maritima ( silver ragwort ) ( formerly known as Senecio cineraria ) is a perennial plant species in the genus Jacobaea in the family Asteraceae , native to the Mediterranean region .
Impatiens walleriana ( syn . Impatiens sultanii ) , also known as busy Lizzie ( United Kingdom ) , balsam , sultana , or simply impatiens , is a species of the genus Impatiens , native to eastern Africa from Kenya to Mozambique .
Cliochloria senegalensis is a species of ulidiid or picture - winged fly in the genus Cliochloria of the family Tephritidae .
The Green green - blooded skink ( Prasinohaema virens ) , sometimes ( ambiguously ) known as `` green tree skink '' , is a scincid lizard species native to New Guinea .
Dendrophorbium is a genus of South American flowering plants in the sunflower family .
Ctenochelys is an extinct genus of Cryptodira , which existed during the Cretaceous period , and lived in shallow waters .
Scutellaria costaricana is a species of flowering plant in the mint family , Lamiaceae , that is native to Costa Rica and Panama .
Pseudotropheus fuscus is a species of cichlid endemic to Lake Malawi where it is known from Nkhata Bay and Lion 's Cove .
Alcolapia latilabris is a species of small fish in the Cichlidae family .
Epitonium humphreysii , common name Humphrey 's wentletrap , is a species of small predatory or ectoparasitic sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Epitoniidae , the wentletraps .
Lariosaurus is an extinct genus of nothosaurid from the Middle Triassic ( late Anisian to late Ladinian stage ) of central and western Europe and China .
Adlerzia is a genus of ant in the subfamily Myrmicinae containing the single species Adlerzia froggatti .
Stenodactylus affinis , common name , Iranian short - fingered gecko , is a gecko species in the genus Stenodactylus found in Iran 's southeastern Khuzestan Province and southern Fars Province ) , Iraq .
Micropotamogale is a genus of small , otter - like tenrecs native to riverine habitats of West African rainforests .
Exocarpos gaudichaudii ( also called Gaudichaud 's Exocarpus or Hulumoa ) is a species of plant in the Santalaceae family .
Craugastor rhodopis , also known as the polymorphic robber frog , is a species of frog in the Craugastoridae family .
Brachylophus gibbonsi is an extinct species of large ( ~1.2 m long ) iguanid lizard from Tonga in the South Pacific Ocean .
Strigocossus is a genus of moths belonging to the family Cossidae .
Taraxia subacaulis is a species of evening primrose known by the common name diffuseflower evening primrose .
Trypodendron a genus of bark beetles of the Curculionidae family .
Actina chalybea is a species of ' Soldier Flies ' belonging to the family Stratiomyidae subfamily Beridinae .
Eucalyptus regnans , known variously as mountain ash , swamp gum , or stringy gum , is a species of Eucalyptus native to Tasmania and Victoria in southeastern Australia and the tallest flowering plant and one of the tallest trees in the world , second to the coast redwood ( Sequoia sempervirens ) .
Artemisia ludoviciana is North American species in the daisy family , known by several common names , including silver wormwood , western mugwort , Louisiana wormwood , white sagebrush , and gray sagewort .
Coregonus is a diverse genus of fish in the salmon family ( Salmonidae ) .
Coniophora is a genus of fungi within the Boletaceae family .
The Onuphidae are a family of polychaete worms .
The European green woodpecker spends much of its time feeding on ants on the ground and does not often ' drum ' on trees like other woodpecker species .
Streblus pendulinus , commonly known as Hawai'i roughbush or aʻiaʻi ( Hawaiian language ) , is a species of flowering plant in the mulberry family , Moraceae , that is native to eastern Australia , Melanesia , Micronesia , and Polynesia .
Yamaceratops is a genus of dinosaur from the Late Cretaceous .
Batillaria mutata is a species of small mudflat saltwater snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Batillariidae , the horn snails .
Erythroxylum vacciniifolium is a flowering plant species in the genus Erythroxylum .
Conophytum stephanii is a small South African species of Conophytum named after the German plant collector Paul Stephan who tended the succulent collection at Hamburg Botanic Garden in Germany .
Oxycetonia jucunda , the smaller green flower chafer , is a species of flower chafer found in Japan .
Marasmiellus ramealis is a species of mushroom - forming fungus of the family Marasmiaceae .
Scopaeocharax is a genus of characins endemic to Peru , where both species are found in the upper and middle Huallaga River basin .
Didia diehli is a species of snout moth in the genus Didia .
The water - plantains ( Alismataceae ) are a family of flowering plants , comprising 11 genera and between 85 and 95 species .
Butyrivibrio is a genus of bacteria in Class Clostridia .
Causus maculatus is venomous viper species found mainly in West- and Central Africa .
Coraebus rubi is a species of jewel beetles belonging to the family Buprestidae , subfamily Agrilinae .
Uramya indita is a species of fly in the genus Uramya of the family Tachinidae that can be found in China , Japan , and Russia .
Kentropyx calcarata , commonly known as the striped forest whiptail , is a species of lizard endemic to South America .
Prunus havardii , called Havard 's plum , is a rare North American species of shrub tree native to western Texas in the United States and to northern Chihuahua across the Río Grande in Mexico .
Stychoparmena spinipennis is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Stychoparmena .
Stachys bullata is a species of flowering plant in the mint family known by the common name California hedgenettle .
Laminacauda diffusa is a species of sheet weaver found in Chile , Argentina and the Falkland Islands .
Eriogonum contiguum is an uncommon species of wild buckwheat known by the common names Reveal 's buckwheat and annual desert trumpet .
Cyperus parishii is a species of sedge known by the common name Parish 's flatsedge .
Allium sikkimense is a plant species native to Sikkim , Tibet , Bhutan , Nepal , India and parts of China ( Gansu , Ningxia , Qinghai , Shaanxi , Sichuan , Xizang , Yunnan ) .
Mendozahippus is an extinct genus of notohippid notoungulate which existed in Mendoza , Argentina , during the late Oligocene .
Beyrichites is an extinct genus in the ammonoid cephalopod , order Ceratitida from the Lower and Middle Triassic of southern Europe , Asia , and western North America .
Crataegus cuneata is a species of hawthorn known by the common names Chinese hawthorn ( Chinese : 山楂 ; pinyin : Shan zha ) or Japanese hawthorn .
Corydalis ambigua is a tuberous early flowering east Asian flowering plant species .
Calamagrostis foliosa is a species of grass known by the common name leafy reedgrass .
Euphoberiidae is an extinct family of archipolypodan millipedes known from the Upper Pennsylvanian of Europe and North America .
Droseridites is a genus of extinct plants of possible droseracean or nepenthacean affinity .
Selachophidium guentheri , the barbed brotula , is a species of cusk - eel found in the Indian and Atlantic Oceans off of the southern coast of Africa where it is found at depths of from 200 to 980 metres ( 660 to 3,220 ft ) .
Zeugophiurina is a suborder of primitive brittle stars with three extinct families .
Trichomanes speciosum , commonly known as Killarney Fern , is a species of fern found widely in Western Europe .
Dravidosaurus ( meaning `` Dravidanadu lizard '' , Dravidanadu being a region in the southern part of India where the remains were discovered ) is a controversial genus of prehistoric reptile .
Prestoniella is a genus of very small sea snails , pyramidellid gastropod mollusks or micromollusks .
A single species is accepted , Ludiortyx hoffmanni .
Rubus cissoides is a species native to New Zealand .
Taxodium mucronatum , also known as Montezuma bald cypress , Montezuma cypress , sabino , or ahuehuete is a species of Taxodium native to much of Mexico ( south to the highlands of southern Mexico ) , and also the Rio Grande Valley in southernmost Texas , USA as well as Huehuetenango Department in Guatemala .
Henriette Gottlieb ( Berlin , 1884 - Łódź Ghetto , 2 January 1942 ) was a German soprano .
Eteri Lamoris ( born 23 May 1971 ) is an operatic soprano and voice teacher .
Anna Deinet ( also Anna von Possart and Anna Deinet - Possart ) ( 22 February 1843 - 18 August 1919 ) was a German operatic soprano who had an active career during the latter half of the 19th century .
Marta Almajano ( Zaragoza ) is a Spanish soprano .
Nazzareno De Angelis ( November 17 , 1881 - December 14 , 1962 ) was an Italian operatic bass , particularly associated with Verdi , Rossini and Wagner roles .
Ron Bottcher ( 11 May 1940 -- 12 April 1991 ) was an American operatic baritone who was actively performing with both the New York City Opera ( NYCO ) and the Metropolitan Opera during the 1960s .
Virginia Zeani , Commendatore OMRI ( born 21 October 1925 ) is a Romanian dramatic coloratura soprano , regarded as one of the great sopranos of the 20th century and one of the great musical personalities in the history of Romania .
Danielle de Niese ( born 11 April 1979 ) is an Australian - American lyric soprano .
Waldemar Kmentt ( Wien , 2 February 1929 -- Ibidem , 21 January 2015 ) was an Austrian operatic tenor , who was particularly associated with the German repertory , both opera and operetta .
Gabriela Beňačková ( also Gabriela Beňačková - Čápová : born March 25 , 1947 ) is a Slovak lyric soprano .
John Braham ( c. 1774 -- 17 February 1856 ) was an English tenor opera singer born in London .
Annette Daniels ( September 10 , 1961 -- April 1 , 2004 ) was an American mezzo - soprano opera singer .
Artyom Melikhov is a Russian tenor singer who was born in Saint Petersburg .
Mathé Altéry ( born Marie - Thérèse Altare , 12 September 1927 ) , is a French soprano singer prominent in the 1950s and 1960s for her singing of operettas and French songs .
Patricia Craig ( née Duncklee ; born July 21 , 1947 ) is an American operatic soprano and voice teacher .
Alice Coote ( born 10 May 1968 ) is a British lyric mezzo - soprano .
Francesca Cuzzoni ( 2 April 1696 -- 19 June 1778 ) was an Italian operatic soprano of the Baroque era .
Mihály Székely ( born Jászberény ; May 8 , 1901 -- March 22 , 1963 ) was a Hungarian bass singer famous for Mozartian roles .
Simon Keenlyside CBE ( born 3 August 1959 ) is a British baritone who has had an active international career performing in operas and concerts since the mid-1980s .
Gregorio Babbi ( 16 November 1708 , Cesena - 2 January 1768 ) was an Italian operatic tenor .
Peter Sliker ( 7 June 1925 -- 25 June 2010 ) was an American operatic bass - baritone who had a lengthy career performing at the Metropolitan Opera from 1961 through 1989 .
Luigia Abbadia ( 1821 - -1896 ) was an Italian operatic mezzo - soprano known for her fine voice , secure technique , and a strong temperament .
Cyndia Sieden ( born September 10 , 1961 ) is an American coloratura soprano on the opera and concert stages .
Wu Pak Chiu ( Pinyin : wǔ bó jiù ; Yale Cantonese : ng5 ba3 jau6 ) ( ca . 1913 -- March 31 , 1974 ) , was a prominent Chinese tenor who sang in Europe under the name of Gregorio Wu Pak Chiu .
Gaëlle Méchaly ( born 15 June 1970 in Marseille , France ) is a soprano .
Renato Zanelli ( April 1 , 1892 in Valparaiso -- March 25 , 1935 in Santiago ) was a Chilean operatic baritone and later tenor , particularly associated with heroic Italian and German roles , notably Verdi 's Otello .
Faith Esham ( born August 6 , 1948 ) is an American soprano and college professor of voice .
Francesco Ceccarelli ( 1752 , Foligno -- 21 September 1814 , Dresden ) was a soprano castrato known for his grace and excellent singing technique .
Marcella Sembrich ( February 15 , 1858 -- January 11 , 1935 ) was the stage name of the Polish coloratura soprano , Prakseda Marcelina Kochańska .
Roxana Briban ( 28 October 1971 -- 20 November 2010 ) was a Romanian operatic soprano .
Marius van Altena , born Marius Hendrikus Schweppe ( born 10 October 1938 in Amsterdam ) is a Dutch tenor .
Lucrezia Aguiari ( sometimes spelled Agujari ) ( Ferrara 1743/1746 -- Parma 18 May 1783 ) was an Italian coloratura soprano .
Donald Bell ( born 19 June 1934 ) is a Canadian bass - baritone and vocal pedagogue .
Diletta Rizzo Marin ( born 1980 in Vicenza ) is an Italian operatic soprano admired for the quality of her voice and her skills in acting .
Marco Arati ( 181 ? - 1899 ) was an Italian operatic bass active during the 1840s through the 1880s .
Carl Heinrich Graun ( 7 May 1704 -- 8 August 1759 ) was a German composer and tenor singer .
Lisa Milne is a Scottish soprano described by the BBC as `` one of RSAMD 's best - known alumni '' , who was among the first artists to be invited to the BBC Radio 3 New Generation Artists scheme in 1999 - 2001 .
Georgy Andreyevich Baklanoff , known as Georges Baklanoff ( sometimes spelled Baklanov ; 4 January 1881 ( O.S. 23 December 1880 ) -- 6 December 1938 ) was a Russian operatic baritone who had an active international career from 1903 until his death in 1938 .
Elisabeth Schärtel ( 6 October 1919 -- 24 August 2012 ) was a German operatic mezzo - soprano and contralto .
Alois Ander ( also Aloys ; August 24 , 1821 -- December 11 , 1864 ) was a German operatic tenor , active in Vienna in the middle of the nineteenth century .
Layla Claire is a Canadian soprano opera singer .
Gré Brouwenstijn ( born Gerda Demphina : 26 August 1915 in Den Helder -- 14 December 1999 in Amsterdam ) was a Dutch soprano singer whose stage career spanned from the early 1940s to the mid-1970s .
Margarete Klose , ( August 6 , 1899 -- December 14 , 1968 ) , was a German operatic mezzo - soprano .
Francesco Meli ( born 1980 in Genoa ) is an Italian operatic tenor particularly associated with the bel canto reportoire .
Antonio Francesco Carli ( fl . 1706 - -23 ) was an Italian bass singer , primarily of operatic roles .
Sophie Braslau ( August 16 , 1892 -- December 22 , 1935 ) was a contralto prominent in United States opera , starting with her debut in New York City 's Metropolitan Opera in 1913 when she was 21 .
Frank Guarrera ( December 3 , 1923 -- November 23 , 2007 ) was an Italian - American lyric baritone who enjoyed a long and distinguished career at the Metropolitan Opera , singing with the company for a total of 680 performances .
Rebecca Evans is a Welsh operatic soprano .
Herbert Heyner ( 26 June 1882 -- 18 January 1954 ) was a noted English baritone .
Pierre - Émile Engel ( February 15 , 1847 -- 1927 ) was a French operatic tenor active on the stages of Brussels , Paris , Monte - Carlo and other European cities where he sang leading roles in several world premieres .
Richard Leveridge ( or Leueridge ) ( 19 July 1670 -- 22 March 1758 ) was an English bass singer of the London stage and a composer of baroque music , including many popular songs .
Karl Schmitt - Walter ( 23 December 1900 - 14 January 1985 ) was a prominent German opera singer , particularly associated with Mozart and the more lyrical Wagner baritone roles .
Francesca Vanini - Boschi ( died 1744 ) was an Italian contralto singer of the 18th century .
Petr Migunov ( Russian : Пётр Викторович Мигунов ; born August 24 , 1974 ) is a Russian opera and classical singer ( bass ) who graduated from the Saint Petersburg Conservatory and was a winner of both the Tokyo and Salzburg Competitions in 1997 and 1999 respectively .
Bernd Weikl ( born Vienna , 29 July 1942 ) is an Austrian operatic baritone , best known for his performances in the operas of Richard Wagner .
Frank Czuri ( born September 8 , 1948 ) is an American vocalist ( tenor ) , entertainer , songwriter and recording artist who has been performing professionally since the age of 14 .
Katarina Dalayman ( born January 25 , 1963 in Stockholm ) is a Swedish soprano who has found critical acclaim singing major operatic roles by composers such as Wagner , Berg , Shostakovich and Bartók , among others .
James Sauvage ( born James Savage ) , ( 9 May 1849 -- 27 November 1922 ) was a Welsh baritone singer .
Darius Campbell ( born Darius Campbell - Danesh , 19 August 1980 ) , also known professionally either as Darius Danesh or Darius , is a Scottish platinum - selling singer - songwriter , a West End stage actor , an operatic baritone , an author , and an Ambassador for The Prince 's Trust .
Fernando del Valle ( né Brian Skinner , 28 February 1964 ) is an American operatic tenor .
Eilene Hannan AM ( 24 July 1946 -- 11 July 2014 ) was an Australian operatic soprano with an international reputation .
Külli Tomingas ( born June 29 , 1972 in Pärnu , Estonia ) , is an Estonian opera singer , mezzo soprano , living in Milano , Italy .
Azer Zeynalov ( Azerbaijani : Zeynalov Azər Zeynalabdin oğlu ) ( born 13 December 1964 ) is Azerbaijani opera singer , ( tenor ) , film composer , actor , and music professor .
Carmen Monarcha ( born August 27 , 1979 in Belém , Pará ) is a Brazilian soprano singer .
Achille De Bassini ( 5 May 1819 -- 3 July 1881 ) was an Italian baritone , particularly noted for his performances in Verdi 's operas .
Jonita Lattimore is an American operatic soprano and a faculty member of Roosevelt University 's Chicago College of Performing Arts .
Ursula Schröder - Feinen ( 21 July 1936 -- 9 February 2005 ) was a German operatic soprano who performed at the Metropolitan Opera and the Bayreuth Festival .
